description.hltext_display: Sino Clean Energy, Inc. Announces Pricing of $28.7 Million Public Offering of Common Stock
description.content:
More Local Headlines
From Our Money Partners
Buying or Selling a Home?
Find the value of your home

Get new home listings alerts
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE Sino Clean Energy Inc.
XI'AN, China, Dec. 21, 2010 /PRNewswire-Asia-FirstCall/ -- Sino Clean Energy, Inc. (Nasdaq: SCEI) ("Sino Clean Energy" or the "Company"), a leading producer and distributor of coal-water slurry fuel ("CWSF") in the People's Republic of China ("China"), today announced the pricing of a public offering of 5,465,000 shares of its common stock at a price of $5.25 per share. The Company has granted the underwriters a 45-day option to purchase up to an additional 819,750 shares to cover over-allotments, if any. The offering is expected to close on December 28, 2010, subject to customary closing conditions.
The Company will receive aggregate net proceeds of approximately $25.6 million after deducting underwriting discounts and commissions and estimated offering expenses payable by the Company, not including the over-allotment option. The Company expects to use the net proceeds from this offering to expand its CWSF production capacity at new and existing facilities throughout China, to pay the remainder of the purchase price under an agreement to purchase land use rights and a production factory in Dongguan, Guangdong Province and for working capital and general corporate purposes.
Rodman & Renshaw, LLC, a subsidiary of Rodman & Renshaw Capital Group, Inc. (Nasdaq: RODM), and Axiom Capital Management, Inc. acted as joint book-running managers for the offering.
The offering of these securities will be made only by means of a prospectus. A registration statement relating to these securities has been declared effective by the Securities and Exchange Commission. Copies of the final prospectus relating to the offering, when available, may be obtained for free by visiting the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission website at http://www.sec.gov. Alternatively, a copy of the prospectus related to this offering may be obtained from Rodman & Renshaw, LLC, Prospectus Department, 1251 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY, 10020, telephone: 212-430-1710 or email: prospectus@rodm.com, or from Axiom Capital Management Inc., Prospectus Department, 780 Third Avenue, New York, NY 10017, telephone: 212.521.3800 or email: prospectus@axiomcapital.com.
This press release shall not constitute an offer to sell or the solicitation of an offer to buy any of the securities, nor shall there be any sale of these securities in any state or jurisdiction in which such offer, solicitation or sale would be unlawful prior to registration or qualification under the securities laws of any such state or jurisdiction.
About Sino Clean Energy, Inc.
Sino Clean Energy is a U.S. publicly traded company and a China-based producer and distributor of coal-water slurry fuel ("CWSF"). With locations in Shaanxi Province and Liaoning Province, Sino Clean Energy is one of the leading CWSF producers in China. For more information about Sino Clean Energy, please visit http://www.sinocei.net/ .
Safe Harbor Statement
This press release contains certain statements that may be deemed to be "forward-looking statements" within the meaning of Section 27A of the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, and Section 21E of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended. All statements, other than statements of historical facts, that address activities, events or developments that the Company expects, projects, believes or anticipates will or may occur in the future, including, without limitation, statements about its business or growth strategy, general industry conditions, future operating results of the Company, capital expenditures, expansion and growth opportunities, financing activities and other such matters, are forward-looking statements. Although the Company believes that its expectations stated in this press release are based on reasonable assumptions, actual results may differ from those projected in the forward-looking statements.

description.hltext_display: Yaralıyı ölü sandılar!
description.content:
Okmeydanı 0-1 Karayolu'nda karşı yöne geçmek isteyen 47 yaşındaki Mehmet İrhan'a otomobil çarptı. Ağır yaralanan İrhan'ın nabzını kontrol eden polis ekipleri öldü diye üzerine gazete örttü.Bir süre sonra olay yerine gelen sağlık ekipleri, yaklaşık 20 dakika kalp masajı yaptıkları yaralıyı hayata döndüremedi.
Ozan URAL İSTANBUL- DHA
Kaza saat 22.00 sıralarında meydana geldi. Beyoğlu Halıcıoğlu'da metrobüsten indikten sonra durağın az ilerisindeki alt geçidi kullanmak istemeyen Mehmet İrhan'a (47),Mecidiyeköy'den Topkapı istikametinde seyir halindeki Koray Kurtuluş'un (23) kullandığı 34 EP 9521 plakalı otomobil çarptı. Plakası düşen otomobilin sürücüsü Koray Kurtuluş olay yerinden hızla uzaklaştı. Kazayı gören vatandaşlar polis ve sağlık ekiplerine haber verdi.
ÖLDÜ DİYE GAZETE KAĞIDI ÖRTÜLER
Sağlık ekiplerinden önce olay yerine gelen polis, yaptığı incelemede Mehmet İrhan'ın öldüğünü belirleyip gazete ile üzerini kapadı ve olay yerine güvenlik şeridi çekti. Bir süre sonra gelen sağlık ekipleri, yaptıkları incelemede İrhan'ın ölmediğini belirleyip, gazete kağıtlarını kaldırdı. Ancak 20 dakika kalp masajı yapılan ağır yaralı İrhan kurtarılamadı. İkinci kez üzerine gazete kağıdı örtülen adam, yaklaşık 2 saat caddenin üzerinde Adli Tıp Kurumu'nun cenaze aracının gelmesini bekledi. Kaza nedeniyle 1 şeridi kapanan Haliç Köprüsü girişinde uzun araç kuyrukları oluştu. Olay yerine güvenlik şeridi çeken polis ekipleri trafiğin kontrollü olarak akmasını sağladı. Araç kuyruğu Okmeydanı Eğitim ve Araştırma Hastanesi önüne kadar uzandı.
2 SAAT SONRA TESLİM OLDU
Kaza sonrası plakasını olay yerinde düşüren otomobilin sürücüsü Koray Kurtuluş, 2 saat sonra Haliç Polis Merkezi'ne teslim oldu. Kaza nedeniyle bir süre trafiğe kapanan yol, cesedin kaldırılması ile normale dönerken, Kurtuluş'un sabah saatlerinde adliyeye sevkedileceği öğrenildi.

description.hltext_display: Rail chaos in England spells more Christmas misery for Scots
description.content:
Kevan Christie Airbles Train Station is left desolate after the snowfall. SCOTLAND's rail network was plunged into more Christmas chaos yesterday by the big freeze.
Power failures on the east coast line in England saw hundreds of passengers evacuated from trains.
And the shutdown had a major knock-on effect across Scotland.
Services were badly disrupted and thousands of travellers were urged to delay their journeys until today.
Passengers were forced to abandon six trains between London and Peterborough following damage to overhead power lines near Huntingdon, Cambridgeshire.
More than a hundred people were stuck for six hours overnight on a train in Kent when lines froze.
Passengers at Edinburgh's Waverley Station were told a bus service would be provided for those travelling to London.
But then the buses were cancelled too and passengers were advised to delay journeys.
The Edinburgh to Perth service was suspended and the Glasgow Central services to Ayr and Ardrossan were badly affected.
Airlines down south were badly hit too, with many remaining closed. Prime Minister David Cameron revealed BAA had been offered the use of troops for snow clearing at Heathrow.
Meanwhile, a 61-year-old female driver was seriously injured in a collision with an articulated lorry on the A90 southbound at Forfar yesterday.
She was rushed to Ninewells Hospital in Dundee by ambulance with head and spinal injuries.

Réunion à l'Elysée sur la Côte d'Ivoire
description.content:
PARIS (AFP) - 22.12.2010 08:39
Le président Nicolas Sarkozy organise ce mercredi à 09H30, avant le Conseil des ministres, une réunion à l'Elysée sur la situation en Côte d'Ivoire, a annoncé la présidence de la République.
Le patron de la commission de l'Union africaine, Jean Ping (G) avec Laurent Gbagbo, le 17 décembre 2010 à Abidjan
Le président Nicolas Sarkozy organise ce mercredi à 09H30, avant le Conseil des ministres, une réunion à l'Elysée sur la situation en Côte d'Ivoire, a annoncé la présidence de la République.
AFP/Archives - Kambou Sia
Le président Nicolas Sarkozy organise ce mercredi à 09H30, avant le Conseil des ministres, une réunion à l'Elysée sur la situation en Côte d'Ivoire, a annoncé la présidence de la République.
Le Premier ministre François Fillon ainsi que Michèle Alliot-Marie (Affaires étrangères), Alain Juppé (Défense), François Baroin (Budget) et le chef d'état-major des armées, l'amiral Edouard Guillaud, participeront à cette réunion, a précisé l'Elysée.

description.hltext_display: Ders almayınca zehirlendiler
description.content:
Tekirdağ’ın Çorlu ilçesinde sobadan sızan karbonmonoksit gazından zehirlenen yaşlı Bulut çiftinden Halil Bulut yaşamını yitirdi, eşi Yadigar Bulut ise yoğun bakımda tedavi altına alındı.
Tedavinin ardından evlerine gönderilen yaşlı çift, tekrar sobayı yakınca zahirlenerek hayatlarını kaybetti.
Yeşiltepe Mahallesi Yaşar Doğu Caddesi Gökçe Sokakta, Halil Bulut (72) ile eşi Yadigar Bulut (71), sobayı yakarak uyudular.
Bir süre sonra uyanan çift sobadan çıkan karbonmonoksit gazından rahatsızlık duymaları üzerine, aynı mahallede yaşayan kızları Medine Gezici’yi arayarak yardım istedi.
Bunun üzerine, eve gelen Gezici anne ve babasını Çorlu Devlet Hastanesine götürdü.
Doktorlar yaşlı çifte soba zehirlenmesi teşhisi koyarak müşahede altına aldı. Yaklaşık 1 saat süren tedavilerinin ardından Halil Bulut ve eşi taburcu edildi. Kızları anne ve babasını alarak tekrar evlerine götürdü.
Bir süre sonra ihtiyar çift, yeniden sobayı yakarak uyudu. Anne ve babasını merak eden ve eve gelen kızları Gezici, kapının açılmaması üzerine camı kırarak içeriye girdi.
Anne ve babasını baygın bulan Gezici, ambulansı arayarak yardım istedi. Olay yarine gelen sağlık ekipleri Halil Bulut ile eşini ambulans ile tekrar Çorlu Devlet Hastanesine götürdü.
Yapılan tüm müdahalelere rağmen Halil Bulut hayatını kaybetti. Eşi Yadigar Bulut ise hastanenin yoğun bakım ünitesinde tedavi altına alındı.

description.hltext_display: Dawa Sangpo Dorjee alleges diplomatic row
description.content: Gangtok, Dec 22 : Dawa Sangpo Dorjee, the third claimant to the Rumtek throne of the Karmapa, has alleged that diplomatic row from the concerned authorities did not allow him to meet His Holiness the Dalai Lama despite requests. ''I want to meet His Holiness the Dalai Lama regarding the 17th Karmapa issue, since this is a very serious and sensitive issue,'' Rinpoche Dawa Sangpo Dorjee, the third claimant to the Rumtek throne of the Karmapa told a press conference yesterday. The Norbu Chholing Monastic Committee, supporters of Rinpoche Dawa, had applied to the Home department on November 30 in order to fix an appointment with the Dalai Lama on the same matter.The Home Secretary Jasbir Singh directly sent the concerned application and file to the ecclesiastical department and the same file was put forward by the said department to the personal secretary of the Dalai Lama with the assurance and commitment to adjust the appointment, after receiving consent from the personal Secretary to the Dalai Lama.Rinpoche Dawa informed this at the conference. ''However, till today we could not get any response on the application from the concerned authority to meet with the Dalai Lama,'' he added. It was further mentioned that Rinpoche Dawa has sent memorandum to President Pratibha Devisingh Patil, Prime Minister Manmohan Singh.

event_or_fact.property: However, till today we could not get any response on the application from the concerned authority to meet with the Dalai Lama

description.hltext_display: Hvor mange klejner har B.T. her?
description.author: CHRISTIAN RUNDAGER
description.content:
Det er d. 22. december, og det er tid til den sidste julegætteleg med fede præmier!
Gæt rigtigt på dagens spørgsmål og vind en af tre gaver! Vi har en spændende gadget, der kan lave dine videobånd digitale fra CoolStuff.dk, et års abonnement på Kaspersky internet security og en Plantronic M100 (trådløst headset).
På billedet ser du to krukker med klejner.
Kan du gætte, hvor mange klejner der er i krukkerne? De tre første der gætter rigtigt, eller dem der kommer tættest på, vinder en af de tre gaver. (Kan du ikke skrive dit bud? Husk at ’synes godt om’ først)
Vinderen findes i morgen klokken 09.00. Det er decembers sidste gætteleg, så har du ikke vundet endnu, er det sidste chance.

description.hltext_display: Kiviniemi: Perustuslakiuudistukseen löytymässä sopu
description.content:
Hallituspuolueet ja SDP ovat löytämässä sovun perustuslakiuudistuksen kiistakohdista.
Pääministeri Mari Kiviniemi vahvisti asian aamun neuvottelun jälkeen.
Lisää myöhemmin.

description.hltext_display: Решения, принятые советом директоров (наблюдательным советом)
description.content:
Открытое акционерное общество "Акционерная компания "Корвет"
1. Общие сведения
1.1. Полное фирменное наименование эмитента Открытое акционерное общество «Акционерная Компания «Корвет»
1.2. Сокращенное фирменное наименование эмитента ОАО «АК «Корвет»
1.3. Место нахождения эмитента Российская Федерация, 640027,
г. Курган, ул. Бурова-Петрова, 120.
1.4. ОГРН эмитента 1024500509714
1.5. ИНН эмитента 4501006138
1.6. Уникальный код эмитента, присвоенный регистрирующим органом 45159-D
1.7. Адрес страницы в сети Интернет, используемой эмитентом для раскрытия информации http://www.korvet-jsc.ru
2. Содержание сообщения
Дата проведения заседания наблюдательного совета акционерного общества, на котором принято соответствующее решение: 22 декабря 2010 года.
Дата составления и номер протокола заседания наблюдательного совета акционерного общества, на котором принято соответствующее решение: Протокол №16/10, составлен 22.12.2010 г.
Содержание решения, принятого наблюдательным советом акционерного общества: «Одобрить крупную сделку, а именно: заключение Договора о предоставлении банковской гарантии с Курганским от¬делением 8599 ОАО «Сбербанк России» на сумму 20 000,00 Евро сроком до 12.05.2011 г. под 8,0% годовых.
Генеральному директору ОАО «АК «Корвет» Чернову Анатолию Васильевичу предоста¬вить право совершать все действия, направленные на заключение и подписание на выше¬указанных условиях Договора о предоставлении банковской гарантии, соглашения к договору банковского счета на право Гаранта на безакцептное списание денежных средств с расчетных счетов».
3. Подпись
3.1. Генеральный директор
ОАО «АК «Корвет» А.В. Чернов
(подпись)
3.2. Дата “ 22 ” декабря 20 10 г. М.П.

description.hltext_display: 12月21日盛泽化纤市...
description.content:
受聚酯原料成本支撑因素以及下游周期性补仓动作显露，今天涤丝交易气氛相比前几天回升，涤丝POY价格止跌企稳迹象明显，据闻，尤其是POY成交气氛好转，个别工厂产销率达300%上方。价格方面，都为大稳小动，但是FDY细旦出货意愿强烈，实际成交与报价差距较大。
从品种走势看，市场上FDY有光丝目前销售平稳，其中，FDY50D/24F产品销售较好一些，同时FDY有光丝150D以上系列产品的销售也还不错，其中，FDY50D/24F产品主要用于色丁、轻盈纺面料生产，目前丝价在17900元/T。DTY产品中100D/36F、150D/48F、75D/36F产品销售尚可，而其它规格品种销售一般，总体看，DTY系列产品中粗旦丝的销售要略好细旦丝。POY产品走货转好，拼用POY的销售一般。
虽然下游织厂和贸易商，对涤丝行情都表现出看淡心理，但是不管是织造厂家，还是加弹企业目前涤丝持有量甚少，再之聚酯原料坚挺向上。短期内涤丝行情将呈现出一个“量升价稳”的趋势，当然也不排除一些偏低价位品种有微幅上翘的可能。
差别化的阳离子丝市场交易量略有放大，报价呈勉强平稳状态，但是实际成交价让幅较大。从品种走势看，相比之下FDY63D积DTY75D动销，整体销售处在弱势状态。上游原料CDP切片市场稳定，其市场一般六个月承兑自提成交价为在12200元/吨左右。预计短期内阳离子丝整体行情还将以适度盘整为主。涤/涤复合丝行情总体维持稳定，涤/涤复合丝（DT平牵+POY）100*100的市场价在13800元/吨。现在下游购买力时隐时现，21日纺丝化纤厂比前几天销售好转，但是库存压力依存。预计后市涤/涤复合丝行情以调整为主。海岛复合丝行情保持动销势头。从销售行情看，225D动销，主要是下游纬麂皮绒，目前麂皮绒系列面料销售较好。预计后市海岛复合丝行情将保持稳定。涤/锦复合丝行情不大，如DTY160D/72F×16的市场价格仍在18800元/吨。从产品销售行情看，销量还是以DTY90D/72F×16瓣为主。由于下游相关面料产品销量不大，因此，对涤/锦复合丝行情拉动较小，后市其行情仍难有起色。
&nbspPTA价格走势继续上调，MEG价格同样稳中有升，半光聚酯切片价格上抬，大有光聚酯切片价格稳中调整状态，CDP切片价格走势盘整，聚酯瓶片价格走势暂稳。市场上半光切片现货成交价为11300元/吨三月承兑送到，现款主流一般在11250元/吨。有光切片现货成交价在11100元/吨三个月短途送到，现款主流一般在11000元/吨。CDP切片市场现货成交价在12200元/吨左右六个月承兑送到。聚酯瓶片市场一般送到成交价在11800元/T。聚酯切片市场上询盘增多，交易量回升。

description.hltext_display: Soudan | El-Béchir, Kaddafi, Moubarak et Ould Abdel Aziz en sommet éclair sur le Sud-Soudan
description.content:
Omar el-Béchir rencontre Hosni Moubarak et le Mouammar Kadhafi, le 21 décembre 2010 à Khartoum. © AFP
L'Égyptien Hosni Moubarak, le Libyen Mouammar Kaddafi et le Mauritanien Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz se sont réunis pour un minisommet avec leur homologue soudanais Omar el-Béchir mardi. Salva Kiir, le président de la région du Sud-Soudan, qui pourrait choisir la sécession lors d'un référendum en janvier, s'est joint aux discussions.
Alors que la situation se tend à l'approche du référendum sur l'indépendance au Sud-Soudan, le président Omar el-Béchir fait appel à ses homologues arabes.
Le président égyptien Hosni Moubarak et le dirigeant libyen Mouammar Kaddafi ont fait le déplacement à Khartoum mardi, pour un mini-sommet sur cette question.
Après avoir été tous deux accueillis à l'aéroport par Omar el-Béchir, ils se sont réunis dans l'après-midi. Ils ont été rejoints par le président mauritanien Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz et Salva Kiir, le président de la région semi-autonome - et probablement prochainement indépendante - du Sud-Soudan.
Victoire symbolique pour Khartoum
Même si Hosni Moubarak et Mouammar Kaddafi ne sont pas restés plus de trois heures sur le sol soudanais, Khartoum est très satisfait du sommet. C'est la première fois que ses deux voisins viennent en visite officielle au Soudan, alors qu'Omar el-Béchir s'est rendu à plusieurs reprises chez ses puissants voisins.
Le symbole est d'autant plus important que le président soudanais avait subit un affront fin novembre, en devant renoncer à se rendre au sommet Afrique-Union européenne de Tripoli.
Des points toujours en discussion
Sur le fond, l'enjeu était de s'assurer que le pays aborde pacifiquement le référendum sur l'indépendance du Sud-Soudan, prévu pour le 9 janvier.
"Le sommet reconnaît la profondeur des liens entre le Nord et le Sud du Soudan et l'importance de bâtir des relations solides fondées sur un bénéfice mutuel, la paix, la stabilité et le développement économique", a déclaré Ahmed Aboul Gheit, le chef de la diplomatie égyptienne, à l'issue de la rencontre.
"Les deux parties se sont engagées à maintenir une relation de coopération fondée sur ces principes" et à "omettre tout événement pouvant perturber la tenue du référendum" a-t-il ajouté.
Il n'a pas précisé si des avancées ont été réalisées sur les quatre enjeux clés que sont la citoyenneté, le partage des ressources naturelles et en particulier du pétrole, la sécurité, et le respect des accords internationaux, y compris sur la répartition des eaux du Nil. La région frontalière d'Abyei reste aussi au centre des discussions.(avec AFP)

description.hltext_display: Nuevas nevadas desde esta tarde cuando el transporte vuelve a la normalidad
description.content:
París, 22 dic (EFE).- Los servicios meteorológicos franceses anunciaban hoy un nuevo temporal de nieve que desde esta tarde barrerá el norte del país de oeste a este, con riesgo de nuevos problemas en los aeropuertos, las carreteras y los trenes que apenas están volviendo a la normalidad tras el último episodio del lunes.
Météo France indicó que las nevadas, que empezarán en Bretaña y llegarán a la región de París al cabo de la tarde, antes de continuar en Champagne, Borgoña y Lorena, podrían dejar espesores de entre cinco y diez centímetros en las zonas llanas en la capital.
Se trata de espesores del mismo orden que los que causaron un tercio de anulaciones de vuelos el lunes en los aeropuertos Charles de Gaulle y Orly, y condujeron a las autoridades a prohibir la circulación de los camiones en la región de París y en varios otros departamentos.
Esta mañana Météo France tenía una veintena de departamentos del norte de Francia en alerta naranja por las nevadas.
Los servicios meteorológicos advirtieron, además, de que el viernes nevará de forma todavía más intensa en particular en el noroeste de Francia, en Auvernia y en la región Ródano-Alpes (con capital en Lyon).
La situación en los aeropuertos de la capital francesa se fueron normalizando ayer, cuando pudieron salir la mayor parte de los viajeros bloqueados -algunos desde el fin de semana-, a excepción de varios cientos que esperaban aviones de otros países, sobre todo el Reino Unido y Alemania, donde la situación era mucho peor.
En los ferrocarriles franceses también iban mejorando las cosas salvo en el Eurostar que conecta París con Londres, donde ayer se tuvieron que suspender un 20% de los trenes habituales, precisamente cuando miles de personas que no podían salir o llegar por avión al Reino Unido habían recurrido a este medio de transporte.
El consorcio que explota el Eurostar anunció que no quedan más billetes hasta después de Navidad y aconsejaba que pospusieran el viaje todos aquellos para los que no fuera imprescindible desplazarse. EFE ac/mcd

description.hltext_display: 近涨远跌 3月棉花创...
description.content:
12月21日(周二)纽约ICE 洲际交易所2011 年3月合约创新高，该合约以159.12 美分开盘，盘中震荡区间在 159.12 －156.70 美分，最终以 159.12 美分收市，大涨 5 美分，成交量 5047 手，空盘量 105747 手；5 月合约报收于 144.69 美分，涨 2.30 美分；7月合约报收于 131.35 美分，涨 2.42 美分。10月以后的远期合约则相继下跌。今日美国股市大型银行股领涨，一系列企业购并消息以及某位中国高官关于欧元区债务危机的讲话提升了市场信心。周二中国副总理王岐山表示中国愿意帮助欧洲维护全球市场稳定之后，全球股市普遍攀升。棉花市场亦受到股市利好影响。
合约
2010年12月22日3月棉花技术展望，今天市场创合约新高。上升随机指标显示超买水平，多头需保持一定的谨慎态度。收市突破9－天平均移动均线，短线趋势向好。日线图缺口给出一个看涨指示，今天的盘面会有更多跟进。收市价突破第二摆动阻力位，显示出走强欲望。下一个上升目标是 165.59 美分。市场正在接近超买水平，相对强弱指标 RSI 超过 70。下一个阻力位在大约 162.19 美分和 165.59 美分，而第一支撑位在今天的 156.05 美分和下方的 153.30 美分。
12月21日现货市场陆地棉成交 3,076 包，本年度成交 331,721 包，相比之下，上年同期成交 468,437 包。
12月20日 NY 认证库存总量 127,759 包，待认证库存 648 包。
12月17日－12月23日全球调整价(AWP)150.13 美分/磅。
12月21日Cotlook棉花展望指数大涨,远东 A指数涨 400 点，报于 182.35 美分/磅,A 指数本周涨 720 点。
12月21日中国郑交所期棉合约CF109合约结算价 28825 元/吨，涨 415 元。中国国家棉花价格 328 棉全国加权均价 27324元/吨，涨 55元。
中国是世界最大的棉花进口国家，中国海关总局周二宣布，中国11月份棉花进口同比增加 12％，达到 126,125 吨，较10月份增加 31％。今年头11个月，中国进口 237 万吨棉花，同比增加 81％。
印度政府终于决定延长棉花出口商最终装船期限，因为出口商无法在12月15日之前完成已经在纺织专员办公室注册的出口棉花数量。印度棉花协会12月18日发布最新的棉花预估，协会预期棉花产量在 3475 万包，最新预估数字低于其10月份预估的 3570 万包。
印度国企印度棉花公司称，2010/11 年印度现货市场棉花到货数量同比增加 1.9％，原因是产量增加，同时，天气晴朗之后采摘进度加速。棉花公司周一说，截止12月19日，到货数量为 1019 万包，每包重量 170 公斤，相比之下，去年同期到货数量 1000 万包。印度棉花年度从10月到次年9月。业内和政府官员都说，印度2010/11 年棉花产量可能超过 3250 万包，大于过去年的 2950 万包。
周二美国股市收高，至此三大股指均创下两年多以来最高收盘价。道指创2008年8月29日以来最高收盘价；标普500指数创2008年9月19日以来最高收盘价；纳指创造了2007年12月28日以来的收盘新高。道琼斯工业平均指数上涨55.03点，收于11,533.16点，涨幅0.48%；纳斯达克综合指数上涨18.05点，收于2,667.61点，涨幅0.68%；标准普尔500指数上涨7.53点，收于1,254.61点，涨幅0.60%。
因越来越多的投资者看好原油明年前景，原油期货周二连续第二个交易日上扬。纽约商业交易所2月份交割的原油期货上涨了45美分，收报每桶89.82美元，涨幅为0.5%。

description.hltext_display: INTERVIEW/Chinesischer Lkw von MAN und Sinotruk rollt erst ab 2012
description.author: Dow Jones Online Redaktion
description.content:
MÜNCHEN (Dow Jones)--Der neue Lkw von MAN und seines Partners Sinotruk für den boomenden chinesischen Markt wird voraussichtlich erst 2012 auf die Straße rollen. "Verkaufsbereit ist die neue Marke erst, wenn die Qualität stimmt", sagte Qing Pan, Vorstandsmitglied von Sinotruk, in einem Interview mit Dow Jones Newswires. (Foto: MAN)
Das werde voraussichtlich erst 2012 der Fall sein.
Die auf Qualitäts-Lkw spezialisierten Münchener hatten sich im vergangenen Jahr für gut eine halbe Mrd EUR mit 25% plus einer Aktie bei den auf günstige Schwerlaster fokussierten Chinesen eingekauft, um mit einem Lkw im mittleren Preis- und Qualitätsbereich auf dem stark wachsenden Markt Fuß zu fassen. Sinotruk baut dazu MANs robusten Schwerlaster TGA in Lizenz. Der ist für den Einsatz auf schlechten Straßen, unter extremen Klimabedingungen sowie für in China häufige Überladungen konzipiert und werde nun an die lokalen Kundenwünsche angepasst, sagte Pan. Sichere und komfortable Lkw westlicher Bauart gelten hier als viel zu teuer.
Bevor das neue Modell, dessen Namen MAN und Sinotruk auf der Automesse in Schanghai verraten wollen, an die ersten Kunden ausgeliefert werde, müssten die Lkw umfangreiche Qualitätsprüfungen über sich ergehen lassen, sagte Pan. Ein Vorgehen, das in China nicht unbedingt Standard ist. "Wir dürfen die Tests nicht auf Kundenseite durchführen", sagte Pan, der in Berlin studiert hat und seine Karriere bei Daimler und Volkswagen begonnen hatte.
Mindestens 50.000 der neuen schweren Lkw wolle Sinotruk nach dem Start der Produktion jährlich allein in China verkaufen und weitere 50.000 in andere asiatische Länder, nach Afrika, Russland oder in den mittleren Osten exportieren, sagte Pan. Derzeit verkaufen die Chinesen nur ein Zehntel ihrer Lkw außerhalb des Landes.
Indem weit mehr als 90% der Teile direkt in der Volksrepublik gefertigt würden, solle der neue Lkw im Reich der Mitte nur etwa ein Drittel eines europäischen Lastwagens von rund 90.000 EUR kosten, sagte Pan. Anders als in Europa oder den USA, wo die Lkw-Kunden vor allem auf die Gesamtkosten, also auch den Verbrauch oder Wartungskosten achten, zähle für chinesische Käufer vor allem der Kaufpreis, erläuterte Pan. "Innerhalb von zwei Jahren muss sich der Lkw für den Kunden amortisiert haben." Dann werde ein neuer gekauft. Pan schätzt, dass chinesische Lastwagen im Schnitt nur fünf Jahre im Einsatz sind.
Große Infrastrukturprojekte und der Wiederaufbau nach den Naturkatastrophen haben in diesem Jahr laut Pan die Verkäufe in China um rund 60% auf rund eine Million Laster über 14 Tonnen steigen lassen, was die Volksrepublik zum größten Markt der Welt mache.
Davon profitiere auch Sinotruks Muttergesellschaft, die China National Heavy Duty Truck Group Corp (CNHTC), die in diesem Jahr 195.000 schwere Lkw verkaufen werde, sagte Pan. Dabei erwirtschafte die mit einer Marge von mehr als 5% profitable Sinotruk den Großteil der Ergebnisse: Die an der Hongkonger Börse notierte Tochter werde mehr als 150.000 Laster an die Kunden bringen, rund 60% mehr als im Vorjahr, sagte Pan. "Ich bin mir sicher, dass Sinotruk damit in diesem Jahr den zweiten Platz unter den chinesischen Herstellern für schwere Lkw zurückerobert." Sinotruk würde dann den Rivalen Dongfeng überholen und hätte unter den heimischen Herstellern nur noch den Volkswagen-Partner FAW vor sich. Weltweite Nummer eins ist Daimler. Langfristig wolle sich Sinotruk weltweit unter den Top fünf behaupten, sagte Pan.
Im kommenden Jahr rechnet Pan angesichts zahlreicher Infrastrukturprojekte mit einer ähnlich hohen Nachfrage nach schweren Lkw in China, auch wenn die knappen Rohstoffe und die gestiegenen Preise den Herstellern zu schaffen machten. "Sinotruk versucht, auch im nächsten Jahr ein gesundes Wachstum zu erreichen", sagte Pan. Ein so gewaltiger Sprung wie 2010 sei jedoch unrealistisch, das Plus werde eher im einstelligen Prozentbereich liegen. Das Ergebnis dürfte angesichts der neuen Produkte und der eingesetzten MAN-Technik 2011 jedoch noch besser ausfallen als 2010, fügte er an.
Neben dem Konzernumbau - Sinotruk strebt eine Mehrmarkenstruktur wie Volkswagen an, mit einer chinesischen Premium-, einer mittleren und einer günstigen Marke sowie Spezialmarken wie leichten Lkw - kommt dem Konzern auch eine aktive industriepolitische Rolle in der Volksrepublik zu. Die Zentralregierung in Peking fordert die Konsolidierung der stark zersplitterten heimischen Autobranche in die "großen Vier" und die "kleinen Vier", um die Wettbewerbsfähigkeit der lokalen Industrie gegenüber der etablierten ausländischen Konkurrenz zu stärken. Sinotruks staatliche Muttergesellschaft ist dabei als einziger reiner Hersteller schwerer Lkw unter den "kleinen Vier" vorgesehen. CNHTC habe im laufenden Jahr bereits zwei Unternehmen aufgekauft, sagte Pan.
MAN sucht seit Jahren nach Wegen, an dem rasanten Wachstum in China teilzuhaben. Die Partnersuche im Reich der Mitte, zumeist in Form eines Gemeinschaftsunternehmens, gestaltet sich für die deutschen Hersteller jedoch meist als schwierig. Nach jahrelangen Verhandlungen und zahlreichen Rückschlägen hat Peking erst kürzlich die bereits vor zwei Jahren vereinbarte Koproduktion zwischen Daimler und dem chinesischen Hersteller Beiqi Foton Motor abgesegnet.
MAN hat nach ersten Enttäuschungen - etwa mit der zuvor anvisierten Zusammenarbeit mit Weichai - mit der direkten Beteiligung an Sinotruk einen anderen Weg gewählt. Alleine in den ersten neun Monaten 2010 trug dieses Engagement 69 Mio EUR zum Konzerngewinn der Münchener bei. MAN ist auch auf anderen Wachstumsmärkten aktiv: 2009 hatte der DAX-Konzern das Lateinamerikageschäft von Großaktionär Volkswagen übernommen. Zudem arbeiten die Münchener seit 2006 in Indien mit Force Motors zusammen.
Webseite: www.man-se.eu
-Von Katharina Becker, Dow Jones Newswires,
+49 (0)69 29725 112, katharina.becker@dowjones.com

description.content:
中国轻纺城2010年12月21日主要长纤布分类销量
一、各类梭织长丝fdy、dty、poy为主，兼部份针织的长丝窗饰布艺（窗帘布、窗纱、账幔纱）、沙发布（包括梭织色织布、梭织色织装饰绒布）等饰用布，总成交量约为129万米；
二、各类针织fdy、dty、poy、亮片丝类长丝饰用布（下半年主要指大圆机纬编拉毛绒及经编刷毛绒类绒面布，包括舞台布艺织物及部分服饰两用网布、花编,针织提花、绣花、烂花、水融布，复合、植绒类布）、服装布，总成交量约为80万米；
三、各类梭织雪纺、佐帻、春亚纺、夏纺绸、水洗绒、提花布等长纤fdy为主的品种(含部分DTY常规及特殊织物)，秋冬型长纤复合丝两用衫布、复合布，总成交量约为50万米；
四、各类梭织里子布、牛津箱包布及里子复合布，梭织春亚纺、夏纺绸类腰袋布等涤纶fdy、dty为主的长丝箱包里辅料布，总成交量约为67万米；
五、各类梭织长丝fdy、dty、poy裤料为主兼部分上衣面料的涤氨弹力布，涤氨弹力复合布（包括厚型、薄型各品种），总成交量约为4.5万米；
六、各类长纤为主的梭织仿毛型西装茄克布，总成交量约为8万米；
七、各类以长丝梭织为主，兼部份长丝针织的优价布、处理布，总成交量约为31万米；
八、各类长纤三角异型丝类梭织(染色及印花、提花、绣花)有光、半光仿真丝布、仿真丝复合布，玻璃丝布(单丝布)、尼龙布（包括部份丙丝布，特种丝类其它品种）等裙装或舞台布艺类服饰两用品种(不包括里子布)，总成交量约为38万米；
九、各类梭织fdy、dty长丝为主的（单、双打线）常规仿麻布、大众仿麻布、印花麻，总成交量约为5.5万米；
十、各类梭织以长纤为主兼部分针织的锦涤、锦棉布(包括锦涤、锦棉绒布)，锦涤、锦棉类涂层布、锦棉复合布，长丝fdy、dty为主的茄克时装休闲布，总成交量约为30万米；
十一、各类长纤梭织网络丝类鞋帮布、老人布（以染色为主兼印花品种及部分色织布，染色桌椅套用布），总成交量约为3万米；
十二、各类长纤及阳离子类服装面料色织布（条格子款式为主，包括色织纯涤类衬衫布），总成交量约3万米；
十三、各类长纤为主的梭织粗纺时装呢绒布、经纬编长短毛绒布，色织毛纺呢绒布，总成交量约为3万米；
十四、各类长纤为底布的服装及装饰用涂层布、刮胶布、滴塑布、轧光布及人造革布、人造革复合布，总成交量约为3.5万米；
中国轻纺城12月21日各类主要长纤布总成交量约为456万米。

description.hltext_display: Eugene Goldwasser, biochemist behind lifesaving drug, dies
description.content:
CHICAGO — Dr. Eugene Goldwasser, 88, a University of Chicago biochemist who identified one of the body's key hormones and helped launch a new drug that revolutionized dialysis treatment, died Dec. 17 in his Hyde Park home of prostate cancer complications, said his family.
In 1977, after nearly 25 years of research, Goldwasser discovered the hormone secreted by the kidneys known as erythropoietin, or EPO, which controls production of oxygen-carrying red blood cells.
He shared his discovery with a California-based biotechnology firm, Amgen Corp., which developed an artificial version of the hormone. In 1989, Amgen won federal approval for the first EPO drug to treat anemia in dialysis and cancer patients. In later years, other drug companies manufactured their own brands of EPO, spawning a billion-dollar industry.
EPO became the third major human hormone to be produced by genetic engineering techniques, after insulin and human growth hormone. Dr. Goldwasser was dubbed "the father of EPO."
"It is one of the great contributions to science or medicine of the 20th century, comparable to the discovery of insulin," said Dr. Donald Steiner, professor of biochemistry and molecular biology at the University of Chicago.
In recent years, the emergence of recombinant EPO has sparked controversy over how much is charged for it and its use by athletes as a performance-enhancing drug.
Goldwasser never profited from the research that led to the lifesaving drug as the university did not file for a patent.
But, his son said, making money meant little to him.
"He was first and foremost a scientist and he was gratified that he was able to make such a great contribution," said James Goldwasser. "He took deep satisfaction in his work and remained excited about the possibilities in the future."
Eugene Goldwasser was born on Oct. 14, 1922, in Brooklyn, N.Y. He spent his first decade there before the Depression forced his father to close a small clothing manufacturing business and move to Kansas City, where his brother ran a similar business.
In high school, Goldwasser developed an interest in science. He won a scholarship to the University of Chicago, where he majored in biological sciences. After the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor, he worked as a research assistant in the university's Toxicity Laboratory, a federally funded program to assess chemical and biological risks. He completed his bachelor's degree in biochemistry in March 1943.
In 1944, he was drafted into the Army and served for two years as a biochemist at Fort Detrick, Md., where he worked on anthrax. In 1946, he returned to Chicago to get his doctorate in biochemistry and started working at the University's Argonne Cancer Research Hospital.
Back in Chicago, he met Florence Cohen, whom he married in 1949. They remained together until her death in 1981. He married Deone Jackman in 1986, and she survives him.
Working under Dr. Leon Jacobson at Argonne, Goldwasser became interested in how the blood-forming process recovered after radiation exposure. In 1955, he began research to find the signal that regulates new red blood cells.
The quest became his life's work.
"The problem was that erythropoietin is present in plasma in very small amounts," Goldwasser said in a 1998 Chicago Tribune interview. "It took us about 15 years just to purify it."
A large amount of serum from anemic sheep enabled him to amass trace amounts of the elusive hormone.
In 1977, Goldwasser published details of his discovery in the Journal of Biological Chemistry. He also filled out the patent disclosure form and submitted it to the university. But school officials did not follow through on the patent process.
"After submitting the form, I promptly forgot about it," Goldwasser wrote years later, "since nothing was ever done about filing for a patent. I believe the rules at the time would have allowed me to file a patent for myself if the agency or the University decided not to - another point to perhaps be rueful about."
When Chicago medical labs took no interest in his finding, Goldwasser shared his results with a fledgling new firm in California, Applied Molecular Genetics, which would become Amgen. In 1986 and 1987, the first reports from clinical studies confirmed that the drug could correct anemia in patients with kidney failure. By 1996, annual sales of the new drug in the United States exceeded $1 billion.
Patients who started treatment with the EPO drug were spared blood transfusions and able to lead longer, more productive lives.
When Goldwasser saw what EPO did for dialysis patients, he was overjoyed.
"It was sheer elation," he said in a 1998 Tribune interview. "All those years. But it helped people."
However, when a scandal involving EPO erupted at the Tour de France in 1998, Goldwasser was crushed. Bicyclists were injecting the drug to boost their red blood cell counts.
"I feel utter dismay," he told the Tribune. "Not only is it being misused, it is being misused in a way that's dangerous to people. Did I ever imagine that could happen? No. No, I didn't."
By the time of his retirement in 2002, Goldwasser had published more than 150 research studies and 60 book chapters - almost all of them about some aspect of erythropoietin. He authored two short books: a biography of Dr. Leon Jacobson and a recently completed history of the quest for erythropoietin, scheduled for release next year.
His family said he was an avid and gifted photographer, sailor and traveler.
He is also survived by two other sons, Thomas and Matthew; two stepchildren, Tom and Tara Jackman; and seven grandchildren.
A memorial service at the University of Chicago is being planned for January.

After submitting the form, I promptly forgot about it
It was sheer elation; All those years. But it helped people.
It is one of the great contributions to science or medicine of the 20th century, comparable to the discovery of insulin
avid and gifted photographer, sailor and traveler

He was first and foremost a scientist and he was gratified that he was able to make such a great contribution; He took deep satisfaction in his work and remained excited about the possibilities in the future.

description.hltext_display: Double fatal death crash driver diagnosed with epilepsy after tragedy
description.content:
Keith Mcleod and Janice Burns city centre car crash Victims: Mhairi Convy (left) and Laura Stewart
THE driver whose Range Rover mounted a pavement, killing two young women, was diagnosed with epilepsy after the crash.
William Payne, 50, did not know he suffered from the condition.
It was picked up when he was examined in hospital the day Mhairi Convy, 18, and Laura Stewart, 20, were killed.
Father-of-three Mark Hopwood, 36, was also hit in the accident in North Hanover Street, Glasgow, but survived.
Payne was last night still in hospital and said to be "devastated" by the tragedy.
His mother-in-law Jane Storrie said: "William was diagnosed with a form of epilepsy. He did not know he had it.
"They found it when they were treating him in hospital.
"He was diagnosed the day he went in, just after the tragedy.
"Anyone who knows him knows what happened is extremely out of character.
"They would know that there had to be some reason for what happened.
"He did not know he had this condition and so could have done nothing to prevent what happened."
Mrs Storrie's daughter Caroline was yesterday at her husband's bedside in Glasgow's Western Infirmary.
Mhairi, of Lennoxtown, near Glasgow, and Laura, of Cumbernauld, were both students at the Central College of Commerce.
They were waiting to cross the road at North Hanover Street, close to Buchanan Galleries, at 11am on Friday when Payne's 4x4 hit them.
Both women were pronounced dead on arrival at Glasgow Royal Infirmary.
The vehicle then hit two posts before coming to a halt.
Payne, of Bishopbriggs, near Glasgow, told hospital staff that he had blacked out.
Victim Mark - now out of hospital - spoke exclusively to the Record on Monday.
He said: "My family and I are very grateful that I'm still here but I think a lot about the two young women who lost their lives.
"Although I never knew them, I feel that for those few seconds we were very close and I still have images of the tragedy in my mind.
"Myself and my family want to offer our deepest sympathies to the families of Mhairi and Laura."
Police are still investigating the circumstances of the tragedy.

event_or_fact.property: William was diagnosed with a form of epilepsy.
Myself and my family want to offer our deepest sympathies to the families of Mhairi and Laura.
My family and I are very grateful that I'm still here but I think a lot about the two young women who lost their lives.

description.hltext_display: Diş hekimlerini sevindiren kanun değişikliği

description.hltext_display: FCC passes new 'net neutrality' rules in close vote
description.content:
Read more: National, News, FCC, Net Neutrality, Federal Communications Commission, New Rules Meant to Prohibit Broadband Companies from Interfering with Internet Traffic, FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski, Julius Genachowski, New Rules, Regulations, Broadband Providers, Let Subscribers Access all Legal Online Content, Prohibit Unreasonable Network Discrimination, Network Neutrality, NN
FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski / AP photo
JOELLE TESSLER, AP Technology Writer
WASHINGTON (AP) — A divided Federal Communications Commission has approved new rules meant to prohibit broadband companies from interfering with Internet traffic flowing to their customers.
The 3-2 vote Tuesday marks a major victory for FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski, who has spent more than a year trying to craft a compromise.
The FCC's three Democrats voted to pass the rules, while the two Republicans opposed them, calling them unnecessary regulation. The new rules are likely to face intense scrutiny on Capitol Hill once Republicans take over the House. Meanwhile, public interest groups decried the regulations as too weak, particularly for wireless systems.
Known as "net neutrality," the rules prohibit phone and cable companies from favoring or discriminating against Internet content and services, such as those from rivals.
The rules require broadband providers to let subscribers access all legal online content, applications and services over their wired networks — including online calling services, Internet video and other Web applications that compete with their core businesses. But the rules give broadband providers flexibility to manage data on their systems to deal with problems such as network congestion and unwanted traffic including spam as long as they publicly disclose their network management practices.
Read more: New net neutrality rules
Ars Technica
PC Magazine
The regulations prohibit unreasonable network discrimination — a category that FCC officials say would most likely include services that favor traffic from the broadband providers themselves or traffic from business partners that can pay for priority. The rules do, however, leave the door open for broadband providers to experiment with routing traffic from specialized services such as smart grids and home security systems over dedicated networks as long as these services are separate from the public Internet.
In addition, the regulations prohibit wireless carriers from blocking access to any websites or competing applications such as Internet calling services on mobile devices, and require them to disclose their network management practices, too. But the rules give wireless companies would get more leeway to manage data traffic because wireless systems have more bandwidth constraints than wired networks.
Genachowski said the regulations will prohibit broadband providers from abusing their control over the on-ramps that consumers use to get onto the Internet. He said the companies won't be able to determine where their customers can go and what they can do online.
"Today, for the first time, we are adopting rules to preserve basic Internet values," Genachowski said. "For the first time, we'll have enforceable rules of the road to preserve Internet freedom and openness."
Still, the final rules came as a disappointment to public interest groups. Even Genachowski's two Democratic colleagues on the five-member FCC were disappointed, though they still voted to adopt the rules after concluding some safeguards are better than none.
They warn that the new regulations may not be strong enough to prevent broadband companies from picking winners and losers on the Internet, particularly on wireless systems, which will have more limited protections. They also worry that the rules don't do enough to ensure that broadband providers cannot favor their own traffic or the traffic of business partners that can pay for priority — resulting in a two-tiered Internet.
"Today's action could — and should — have gone further," said Michael Copps, one of the other two Democrats on the commission. But, he added, the regulations do represent some progress "to put consumers — not Big Phone or Big Cable — in control of their online experiences."
At the same time, the two Republicans on the FCC worried that the rules will discourage phone and cable companies from continuing to upgrade their networks by making it difficult for them to earn a healthy return on their investments. They also insist that the regulations are intended to fix a problem that does not exist, as all the major broadband providers have already pledged not to discriminate against Internet traffic on their networks.
"The Internet will be no more open tomorrow than it is today," said Meredith Attwell Baker, a Republican.
Republicans on Capitol Hill vowed to try to block the new regulations. Kay Bailey Hutchison of Texas, the top Republican on the Senate Commerce Committee, plans to introduce a "resolution of disapproval" to try to overturn what she called "troubling regulatory overreach by the FCC."
Robert McDowell, the FCC's other Republican, predicted that the FCC will face court challenges to its regulatory authority, too. In April, a federal appeals court ruled that the agency had exceeded its existing authority in sanctioning Comcast Corp. for discriminating against online file-sharing traffic on its network — violating broad net neutrality principles first established by the FCC in 2005.
Those principles serve as a foundation for the formal regulations adopted Tuesday.

description.hltext_display: ACS bekommt 5.825 Hochtief-Aktien angedient
description.author: Dow Jones Online Redaktion
description.content:
FRANKFURT (Dow Jones)--Der Actividades de Construcción y Servicios (ACS) sind in Rahmen ihres freiwilligen Übernahmeagebots für die Hochtief AG bis zum 21.Dezember lediglich 5.825 Aktien angedient worden.
Damit liege der Anteil des spanischen Baukonzern nun insgesamt bei 27,26% an Hochtief, teilte ACS am Mittwoch mit.
ACS hatte vergangene Woche ihr Angebot überraschend erhöht und bietet nun neun anstelle von acht eigene Aktien für fünf Hochtief-Papiere. Vorstand und Aufsichtsrat von Hochtief haben die Offerte unter anderem als finanziell unzureichend zurückgewiesen.
Von der angestrebten Schwelle von mehr als 30% ist ACS damit weiterhin noch ein Stück entfernt. Jedoch hat Hochtief-Großaktionär Southeastern Asset Management nach der Nachbesserung durch ACS angekündigt, im Kundenauftrag für 2 Mio Hochtief-Aktien das Angebot annehmen zu wollen.
Die Offerte läuft am 29. Dezember aus.

description.hltext_display: 모아저축은행, ‘홈런은 사랑을 싣..
description.content:
▲ 모아저축은행은 22일 연말을 맞아 SK와이번스와 기부행사인 ‘홈런은 사랑을 싣고’ 행사를 인천 지역 어린이 복지시설 단체인 향진원에서 진행했다. 사진 가운데(SK와이번스 박정권 선수) [서울파이낸스 박영웅 기자] 모아저축은행은 연말을 맞아 SK와이번스와 기부행사인 ‘홈런은 사랑을 싣고’ 행사를 인천 지역 어린이 복지시설 단체인 향진원에서 진행했다고 22일 밝혔다.
이번 행사는 SK 와이번스 구단의 올 시즌 문학구장에서 나온 홈런을 통해 적립된 사랑의 쌀을 전달하는 행사로 SK 와이번스 소속 정근우, 박정권 선수의 팬 사인회와 동시에 진행됐다.
SK 와이번스는 올 시즌 총 66개의 홈런을 문학구장에서 기록해, 80Kg 쌀 1가마 기준 총 1320만원 상당의 사랑의 쌀을 적립해 인천어린이재단에 56가마, 향진원에 10가마를 기부하게 됐다.
모아저축은행은 매월 정기적으로 사내 자원봉사 동아리인 디딤돌을 통해 향진원 아이들과 문화공연 관람 및 견학활동 등을 진행하고 있다. 또한 김상고 회장의 모아재단을 통한 장학사업 전개 및 매년 불우 이웃돕기 후원 행사를 진행하고 있고 이번 연평도 피해주민 성금기탁에도 앞장섰다.
모아저축은행 조재형 은행장은 “앞으로도 다양한 사회공헌활동을 통해 어려운 이웃을 돌볼 수 있는 저축은행이 되겠다” 며 “지속적인 사회공헌활동을 전개해 나갈 것”이라고 밝혔다.저작권자 ⓒ 빠르고 깊이 있는 금융경제뉴스 서울파이낸스 박영웅(기자) dxhero@seoulfn.com

description.hltext_display: Chains hurt local businesses
description.content:
I am baffled on hearing the news of another hotel being built on the east side of Casper. Another chain hotel by the name of Hilton.
Wow! Casper, what's going on? I totally agree with the city on funding $6 million for renovations and restoration to revitalize the Parkway Plaza Hotel, and my hats off to Pat Sweeney for all he has done for the community at large.
My point is: the slices of pie are getting smaller and smaller, and the competition larger and larger. My heart goes out for all the small business owners when big chain corporations smother up the market. I am a firm believer that development is good for the community, but in moderation with the economy, population, and a smart growth concept the City Council is trying to achieve in all areas of development.
The Parkway Plaza is ideal in many ways, close to the downtown area with walkability access for local downtown business. I feel the hospitality for travelers staying one night or a few days near our beautiful historical downtown and Old Yellowstone District area, get the true Western heartland of Casper and its local Wyoming welcome.
MONTE HENRIE JR., Casper

description.hltext_display: Total de endividados cai para 58,3% em dezembro
description.content:
O total de consumidores endividados diminuiu em dezembro, segundo a Confederação Nacional do Comércio (CNC), de acordo com a Pesquisa de Endividamento e Inadimplênciado Consumidor (PEIC) divulgada hoje. O levantamento ouviu 17.800 consumidores em todos os Estados e no Distrito Federal. O total de endividados recuou de 59,8% em novembro para 58,3% em dezembro.
Segundo a pesquisa, o porcentual de consumidores que afirmam ter dívidas ou contas em atraso também recuou, passando de 24,8% para 23,5%. A parcela de endividados que informaram não ter condições para pagar suas dívidas também diminuiu no período, de 9% para 8,3% no período.
Para a CNC, houve uma injeção de recursos na economia com o pagamento do décimo terceiro salário, o que contribuiu para saldar dívidas. Além disso, houve uma manutenção no crescimento da renda e do emprego, o que continuou a elevar o poder aquisitivo dos consumidores.
No entanto, a entidade fez uma ressalva: ao se analisar os desempenhos trimestrais dos níveis de Inadimplência, o saldo não é tão positivo. Do terceiro para o quatro trimestre, o total de consumidores pesquisados que se classificam como endividados saltou de 58,7% para 58,9%. Os consumidores entrevistados que afirmaram não ter condições de saldar dívidas também cresceu no período, de 8,9% para 9% - embora tenha ocorrido um recuo nos pesquisados que informaram ter dívidas ou contas em atraso, no período (de 24,1% para 23,9%).
Na pesquisa por faixas de renda, o porcentual de famílias endividadas com ganho mensal de até dez salários mínimos recuou de 62,2% para 60,6%, de novembro para dezembro. Já as famílias endividadas com renda acima de 10 salários mínimos aumentaram de 45,1% para 45,2%.
Cartão de crédito
A principal modalidade de dívida entre as famílias brasileiras continuou a ser o cartão de crédito em dezembro, na análise da CNC. Na pesquisa, 71,2% das famílias endividadas apontaram o cartão de crédito como um de seus principais tipos de dívida.
Na análise por faixas de renda, o cartão de crédito representou o principal débito entre famílias com ganhos até 10 salários mínimos mensais, sendo citado por 71,5% do total de famílias endividadas nesta faixa de renda. Nos consumidores com ganhos mensais acima de 10 salários mínimos, o porcentual para esta resposta foi menor, de 68,6%.
Ainda segundo a CNC, entre as famílias endividadas, a segunda modalidade de dívida mais lembrada foram os carnês (21,9% dos consumidores endividados pesquisados); seguida por financiamento de carro (9,8% dos consumidores endividados).
Intenção de consumo
A intenção de consumo das famílias brasileiras atingiu em dezembro nível recorde pelo terceiro mês consecutivo, de acordo com a CNC. Calculado dentro de uma escala que vai até 200 pontos (sendo que resultados acima de 100 são considerados positivos), o Índice de Intenção de Consumo das Famílias subiu 3,1% de novembro para dezembro, saltando de 139,1 pontos para 143,4 pontos no período. Na análise da CNC, o resultado comprova que 2010 será o ano de maior crescimento nas vendas do varejo da década, superando a alta de 9,7% apurada em 2007.
Para a CNC, o desempenho reflete um cenário de crescente confiança das famílias brasileiras em relação ao consumo. Na avaliação da entidade, ocorre uma manutenção das condições favoráveis de emprego, renda e crédito. Todos os sete indicadores componentes do índice de intenção apresentaram crescimento de novembro para dezembro. O destaque ficou por conta dos crescimentos, de novembro para dezembro, apontados em nível de consumo atual (5,1%); perspectiva profissional (4,9%); e perspectiva favorável para aquisição de bens duráveis (3,1%).

description.hltext_display: Bovespa encerra pregão em alta de 1,41%
description.content:
O avanço das bolsas mundiais contagiou o mercado brasileiro e a Bolsa de Valores de São Paulo (Bovespa) encerrou os negócios desta terça-feira acima dos 68 mil pontos.
O índice Ibovespa teve valorização de 1,41%, aos 68.214 pontos. O giro financeiro atingiu R$ 6,911 bilhões.
Entre os ativos de maior peso, Vale PN subiu 1,10%, a R$ 50,35; Petrobras PN ganhou 0,78%, a R$ 25,77; Itaú Unibanco PN avançou 2,31%, a R$ 38,53; BM&FBovespa ON teve desvalorização de 1,79%, a R$ 12,59; e OGX Petróleo ON se depreciou em 1,63%, a R$ 18,63.

description.hltext_display: Wolf recovery wastes money
description.content:
It has been said that the life of one endangered species is worth more than one life of the human race. Judging by the money ($400,000 per wolf) spent on the Mexican wolf program, federal and state governments seem to agree with this extremist viewpoint. It was estimated that over $18.1 million had been spent on this effort in 2008 and hit just under $20.5 million in 2009. Wolves are of little commercial benefit and the taxpayer shells out $200,000 to $1 million per wolf for their recovery.
By the 1940s the wolf was almost eradicated. No one missed them and life was good! Then the wolf was put on the endangered species list and the reintroduction program was started. Everything went to hell in a hand basket. The U.S. is in debt so far, what's another $100 million for the wolf programs, nothing, just peanuts when compared to the government’s trillion-dollar spending spree.
The Yellowstone elk population is down 50 percent; records show that the wolves’ prey is 77 percent to 97 percent elk. The fill-in diet is usually sheep and other domesticated animals including cattle and dogs.
It is too bad that people on Capitol Hill have no concept of reality.

description.hltext_display: Acordo prevê 'reserva' para possível aumento do salário mínimo
description.content:
Um acordo construído na Comissão Mista de Orçamento (CMO) pode permitir que o Executivo amplie o salário mínimo em 2011 para além dos R$ 540 que constam na proposta de Orçamento do próximo ano. O aumento seria possível graças a uma espécie de "reserva especial" de R$ 6,6 bilhões, apelidada de colchão, que, no entanto, não terá apenas esta finalidade.
Segundo o vice-líder do governo no Congresso, Gilmar Machado (PT-MG), R$ 1 bilhão desta reserva está separado para atender a uma possível ampliação ou reajuste dos benefícios do Bolsa Família. O restante ficaria para outras demandas como o pagamento de dívidas judiciais com aposentados e pensionistas, que são estimadas em até R$ 2 bilhões.
Estamos acertando com as centrais e com os sindicalistas que vai se poder usar o colchão para dar o aumento do salário mínimo. Nós vamos abrir essa possibilidade e aí eles vão tentar convencer o Executivo, afirmou Machado, ressaltando que na peça orçamentária permanecerá o valor de R$ 540.
Caso os R$ 5,6 bilhões da reserva "colchão" fossem realmente investidos em um aumento do salário mínimo, seria possível ampliar o valor para cerca de R$ 560. O presidente da Força Sindical e deputado federal, Paulinho da Força (PDT-SP), porém, adianta que as centrais continuarão a defender o valor de R$ 580. Ele afirmou que a possibilidade de a reserva destinar recursos pode ajudar na tarefa de convencer o Executivo.
Não houve negociação, então nós não vamos abrir mão destes R$ 580. É a primeira vez que o presidente Lula não nos chamou para negociar, afirmou o deputado sindicalista.
Mesmo se for cumprido o cronograma e o Orçamento for aprovado até esta quarta-feira, o governo terá de editar uma Medida Provisória para que o reajuste seja concedido a partir de janeiro. Paulinho já adianta que quando ela chegar ao Congresso receberá uma emenda de sua autoria para tentar elevar o valor para R$ 580.
Outra polêmica futura que o deputado já adianta é em relação ao reajuste para aposentados e pensionistas que recebem mais de um salário mínimo. O reajuste previsto no Orçamento é apenas da inflação, de 5,5%, mas Paulinho quer elevar o percentual para 10%.
O cronograma dos trabalhos prevê a votação do Orçamento ainda nesta terça-feira na comissão, mas existe a possibilidade de que tudo fique para a quarta-feira, último dia de trabalho no Congresso neste ano.

description.hltext_display: Impasse sobre remanejamento do PAC adia votação do Orçamento
description.content:
Um impasse entre governo e oposição acabou frustrando a previsão de votação do Orçamento de 2011 nesta terça-feira na Comissão Mista de Orçamento (CMO). Ficou marcada para a manhã desta quarta-feira uma nova reunião da Comissão para tentar votar o projeto. A expectativa é votar o Orçamento em plenário no Congresso Nacional também na quarta, última de trabalho do Congresso em 2010.
O problema que travou a votação foi a possibilidade de o governo remanejar livremente 30% dos recursos destinados ao Programa de Aceleração do Crescimento (PAC). Desta forma, recursos destinados a saneamento podem acabar em obras de ferrovias ou rodovias, por exemplo. A oposição não concorda e exige que o remanejamento seja feito somente dentro da mesma área. O texto em votação prevê investimentos de R$ 40,15 bilhões no PAC, podendo chegar a R$ 43,5 bilhões se for desejo do executivo.
A posição da oposição é essa. Não dá para aceitar isso. A nossa posição vai ser a mesma agora ou depois, então se não houver acordo nisso pode acontecer de não votar o Orçamento, afirmou o deputado Rogério Marinho (PSDB-RN), líder do partido na comissão.
O vice-líder do governo no Congresso, deputado Gilmar Machado (PT-MG), destacou que esta discussão já foi feita outras vezes na Casa, mas concordou em adiar a votação para se tentar um acordo.
Machado afirmou que outros impasses já foram superados, como cortes de verbas nos ministérios da Educação e de . Neste caso, segundo o petista, haverá recomposição do Orçamento.

description.hltext_display: Tommy Sheridan Perjury Trial: "This is persecution, not a prosecution"
description.content:
Chris Musson Tommy Sheridan TOMMY Sheridan told a jury "My life is at stake" as he began the most important speech of his career yesterday.
In the closing address of his perjury trial,the former MSP said: "I've got a wee girl at home, I've got a lovingwife and if you decide to convict me I'll be separated from them for avery long time.
"I have to do all I can to convince you that there's far too much reasonable doubt for you to find me guilty."
And the former MSP said the case against him was "persecution, not prosecution" as he tore into the Crown's handling of the case and the lack of any forensic evidence produced during his 12-week perjury trial.
During an impassioned closing speech, which resumes this morning, the socialist firebrand sought to mock the prosecution evidence brought before the High Court in Glasgow.
He said despite four years of investigation, the Crown case against him was "not only weak - it's verging on pathetic".
He claimed the Crown were trying to rely on liars, adding: "What was carried out against myself and my family was not a prosecution, it was a persecution."
The former Scottish Socialist Party chief, 46, resigned as party convener in 2004 amid adultery allegations made by the News of the World.
He was charged with perjury following his successful 2006 libel action against the newspaper.
Yesterday, on the 46th day of the trial, Sheridan began a point-by-point rebuttal of the closing speech made by advocate depute Alex Prentice QC on Monday.
He spoke to the 12 women and two men - one juror has been excused - for three hours yesterday.
Sheridan highlighted the absence of any forensic report on a video tape which was said to show him making a series of incriminating admissions.
Several witnesses in the trial have said the off-camera voice is him, others have said it is not. Sheridan has argued the person on the tape was a scripted impersonator.
He said: "You've been asked to conclude that I am on the tape, and if you think it's me, you are going to send me to jail.
"I think the Crown has let you down. If it's going to ask you to make a decision of that enormity - where's the voice expert? Where's the voice expert report?"
He continued: "I'm suggesting it's an actor. I'm suggesting it's a mimic."
Sheridan said radio presenter Des McLean was a well known impersonator of him, adding: "Why haven't you been presented with a mimicking expert report?"
Sheridan said there was also no report into the handwritten notes of an SSP xecutive meeting on November 9, 2004, when he is said to have made sex confessions.
He told the jury: "Where is the forensic evidence to show when the notes were written? There is none. You may want to ask yourself why there is none."
On the November 9 meeting - the focus of three of six remaining allegations against Sheridan - he said 16 SSP members who had testified to say he made admissions there had lied.
He said: "The Crown's problem is they are seeking to rely on liars. They are seeking to rely on witnesses who lack both credibility and reliability."
Sheridan went on to say police should be "ashamed of themselves" for a raid on his family home on December 16 three years ago, during which items including their two-year-old daughter's anorak were searched.
He also mocked advocate depute Mr Prentice, who said on Monday he had conducted the prosecution in a "fair" manner.
Sheridan said: "Ladies and gentlemen, this has been a fair and even-handed prosecution from the start - and as we all know the Moon is made of cheese."
He said trial judge Lord Bracadale should order an inquiry into "incompetency" by the Crown, who have dropped a series of allegations against him during the trial.
He said charges had been "dropped like confetti" and the prosecution case was "melting away like snow".
Sheridan referred the jury to the charge sheet and asked them to consider whether it was "written in disappearing ink".
The former MSP claimed he and wife Gail had been unfairly targeted by Lothian and Borders Police after the judge at the 2006 defamation trial asked for an inquiry into witnesses lying under oath.
He claimed a string of SSP witnesses had lied or provided inconsistent evidence, but were not pursued by detectives, as the police had already made up their minds.
Sheridan decided to speak from the dock yesterday, despite arguing earlier in the trial he should be allowed to address the court from the lawyer's lectern.
Referring to other people he claims committed perjury in the 2006 trial, he said: "Look at this dock. I'm the only one left in it. Where are they? Why haven't they been investigated?"
He went on to say police's pursuit of his wife Gail Sheridan - who had the perjury charge against her dropped last week - was part of a "vendetta".
He told how the former airline hostess's name was "blackened" after she was accused of theft of alcohol miniatures recovered in the house raid. The charge was later dropped.
And he pointed out the Home Office's major inquiry system was used by police for the perjury investigation - but not for the royal phone hacking scandal involving the News of the World.
Sheridan attempted to rubbish Mr Prentice's argument that the News of the World were not behind the case.
He said: "The News of the World are at the heart of this case, no matter how stridently the advocate depute tries to deny it."
He said the so-called McNeilage video tape - said to be a secret-tape showing Sheridan confessing - was bought by the newspaper for s200,000.
Photographs, names and phone records had all been provided to the police by the newspaper, he said, adding they had paid or offered to pay eight witnesses in the case.
Sheridan claimed Anvar Khan and Katrine Trolle, who both alleged extra-marital affairs with him, were liars. He said sex columnist Khan lied on the witness stand by claiming she had not asked for money or more responsibilities at the News of the World in exchange for her testimony at the 2006 trial.
He said both women had given different dates for the alleged visit with Sheridan to Manchester swingers' club Cupid's.
The jury are expected to retire to consider their verdict today or tomorrow.

description.hltext_display: adidas-CEO sieht derzeit keine Gefahr einer Übernahme - BöZ
description.author: Dow Jones Online Redaktion
description.content:
FRANKFURT (Dow Jones)--Der Vorstandsvorsitzende der adidas AG sieht gegenwärtig keine Gefahr einer Übernahme. Wie Herbert Hainer der "Börsen-Zeitung" (BöZ - Mittwochsausgabe) sagte, rechnet er gegenwärtig nicht mit Avancen eines strategischen Investors. (Foto: adidas)
Er sehe momentan niemanden, der den Sportartikelhersteller aus Synergieeffekten heraus kaufen würde. "In unserer Industrie kommt niemand in Frage", sagte Hainer. Für Großhändler wie Wal-Mart oder Metro gebe es keine Synergien, und der Marke Adidas würde es "wahrscheinlich nicht gut tun, bei Discountern verkauft zu werden". Wenn ein Finanzinvestor Interesse hätte, "ehrt uns das". Bislang habe er aber keine Offerten bekommen, fügte Hainer hinzu.
Der DAX-Konzern habe bislang auch noch nicht daran gedacht, einen Ankeraktionär zu suchen. Hainer erklärte, dass er dazu eine differenzierte Meinung habe. Übernahmen müssten nicht per se schlecht sein, wie sich am Beispiel Reebok gezeigt habe - ein Unternehmen, das zehn Jahr lang Marktanteile verloren habe. Letztlich müsse immer das Interesse der Aktionäre im Vordergrund stehen. Auf Dauer könne man sich vor Übernahmen nicht schützen, und dies müsse auch nicht immer das Ziel sein. Sein Ziel als Manager sehe er darin, nachhaltige Wachstumsperspektiven aufzuzeigen, so Hainer.
Hainer geht davon aus, dass die Herzogenauracher in den kommenden Jahren mit gegebener Kostenstruktur so wachsen können, dass hohe Skaleneffekte erzielt werden können. "Eine halbe oder eine Milliarde mehr Umsatz könnten wir schon heute mit unserer bestehenden Personalstruktur stemmen, das schlüge dann direkt auf die Marge durch", so Hainer. Der Konzern steht derzeit für eine operative Marge von 7,5%, die 2015 mindestens 11% betragen soll. Hainer stellte zudem Effizienzgewinne im Marketing-Budget in Aussicht.
Aktienrückkäufe stehen laut Hainer vorerst nicht auf der Agenda. Er sei "kein Fan davon", sagte Hainer mit Blick auf die Wirkung des zurückliegenden Aktienrückkaufprogramms.

description.hltext_display: Concert will help band
description.content:
The Wyoming Blues and Jazz Society wishes to thank everyone who helped make our Nov. 27 fundraiser concert a success.
Another Kind of Magick, a very talented teen band from Cheyenne, will be representing Wyoming in the International Blues Challenge. The competition takes place Feb. 1-5 in Memphis, Tenn. All proceeds from the concert and raffles went to help pay their travel expenses, joining other musicians from 41 states and 13 countries.
Special thanks to Pat Sweeney, Jason Beck, The Parkway Plaza, Poor Boys, Nora Fagan Jewelry, AMS Photography, The Art of Coffee, Donnell's Candy, IceBerg Productions, Sonic Rainbow and several individuals who generously donated items for the raffles. To everyone who purchased a raffle ticket or attended the concert and made a donation, we thank you ! Also the Casper Journal and Star-Tribune for their interest and publication of this unique story.
Wyoming has not been represented in this prestigious event before, and it is even more exciting for them to be sent with such enthusiastic support.
LOU MORRIS, JEFF BRYDEN, JODY MURRAY and DEB CHEATHAM, Casper
Officers, Wyoming Blues & Jazz Society

entity.property: The Wyoming Blues and Jazz Society

description.hltext_display: U.S. depends on growth
description.content:
There is a lot of discussion about why millionaires need to be included in the tax relief bill. It is generally accepted that growth of employment depends on growth of small business for hiring. Small business is classified as a business which employs 1,000 people or has an income of $500 million.
Let us take for example a business with 500 employees and an income of $50 million. If it is a corporation it would pay income tax of 35 percent, the highest in the world except Iceland, and the owner would pay 35 percent on his salary and 15 percent on his dividends depending how he chooses to pay himself. This would leave $25 million or less to grow and maintain the business.
If the business is a sub S corporation, the owner or owners would pay 35 percent on the income and have the rest to reinvest in the business and their own profit. There are thousands of this type of businesses in the U.S. and millions of employees.
There is also discussion about when does an owner have enough or too much. What should he do if at this undetermined point? Should he quit or sell or perhaps just coast along and not make a profit. The U.S. was built by growth and depends on growth for the increasing number of jobs for the growing population. We have always had entrepreneurs who built businesses and kept them growing and improving. If Bill Gates had stopped at a few hundred million we could still be using version 2 of Windows and had multiple competing software systems, or if Henry Ford stopped, we could still be buying Model A Fords.
It is the nature of our society to continually improve our lifestyle and that improvement demands a continually increasing economy which begets more wealth for those who are smart enough to develop new ideas.
On a separate point to those who think Bill Clinton balanced the budget, it was only because of the Republican Congress that it happened.
DON THORSON, Newcastle

description.hltext_display: 12月22日棉副行情:谨...
description.content:
12月20日，国内棉籽价格稳定。目前棉农惜售籽棉心理较浓，收购难度较大，为了维持生产，部分棉厂被迫上调收购价格。不过，近期棉籽下游需求不佳，油厂采购积极性降低，使整体行情基本稳定。
12月20日，国内棉油行情基本稳定。目前北方产区3级棉油与1级豆油价差已扩大至750-850元/吨，3级棉油价格较24度棕榈油低250-450元/吨，有利于棉油价格回暖。不过，受国家调控政策影响，国内油脂价格上涨受阻，牵连到棉油市场，大部分油厂出货意愿较强，使棉油价格上涨乏力。
12月20日，国内棉粕购销清淡，行情延续弱势。目前，国内养殖业需求疲软，饲料厂入市谨慎。另一方面，近来棉粕销售进度缓慢，大部分油厂开机率较低，库存较少，加之棉籽收购成本较高，油厂多无降价意愿，使棉粕市场行情维持稳定。
12月20日，棉短绒市场人气不足，行情略显低迷。目前，粘胶、短纤、棉浆、人棉纱等下游产品销售仍无起色，部分产品价格持续下跌，中下游生产企业入市非常谨慎，采购规模较小，同时，棉短绒市场供应稀少，购销双方呈对峙状态。(Z05)

description.hltext_display: '트레이드 SOS' 中企 수출..
description.content:
올 8,600곳 3만여건 상담… 컨설팅 받은 업체 수출 늘어
한국무역협회가 중소기업의 수출지원을 위해 지난 2월 설립한 종합무역컨설팅지원단 '트레이드 SOS'가 국내 중소 무역인들의 수출 도우미로 성공적으로 자리매김하고 있다.22일 무역협회에 따르면 올 2월 '트레이드 SOS' 출범 이후 지난 11월까지 상담건수를 집계한 결과 8,600개의 중소기업이 총 3만5,728건의 컨설팅 서비스를 이용한 것으로 나타났다. 하루 평균 42개 기업이 174건의 상담을 받은 셈이다.
컨설팅 유형별로는 각 지역마다 배정된 컨설턴트가 직접 현장을 찾아가 상담을 해주는 현장컨설팅(1만5,283건)이 전체의 43%를 차지하며 가장 큰 인기를 끌었다. 또 영어ㆍ중국어ㆍ일본어 등 18개국 언어로 수출입 거래를 돕는 외국지원컨설팅(1만2,768건), 자유무역협정(FTA) 원산지증명과 국제특허ㆍ해외인증, 세무ㆍ회계 등 전문 분야에 대한 무역전문컨설팅(7,677건)이 그 뒤를 이었다.
특히 올해 서비스를 이용한 기업 8,600곳의 수출실적을 보면 '트레이드 SOS'의 효과는 더욱 빛난다. 지난해까지만 해도 수출실적이 전혀 없던 기업의 수가 6,087곳이었지만 올 1~10월에는 5,893곳으로 줄어들었다. 이에 따라 수출실적 1,000~100만달러의 기업은 지난해 1,843개에서 올해 1,989개로 늘었고 같은 기간 100만달러 이상의 수출실적을 거둔 기업도 670곳에서 718곳으로 48개사나 증가했다.이는 '트레이드 SOS'가 수출의지는 있지만 방법을 몰라 고민하던 수출 초보 기업들에 대한 컨설팅 서비스가 실제 수출성과로 이어지고 있다는 증거라는 점에서 눈길을 끌고 있다. 더욱이 아직 집계되지 않은 11~12월 실적을 더할 경우 수출실적 증가업체 수는 지난해보다 더욱 늘어날 것으로 무역협회 측은 예상하고 있다.
컨설팅 서비스를 받은 기업들의 만족도 역시 높은 편이다. 수출 초보 기업에 필요한 1대1 밀착지원으로 수출에 대한 자신감을 불어넣어줌으로써 중소기업의 수출 자생력을 기르는 데 큰 도움이 되고 있는 것으로 전해졌다. 일본 도시바, 미국 GE와 거래를 하는 한국차폐기술㈜의 관계자는 "트레이드 SOS의 도움으로 거래처와의 의사소통이 원활해진 덕분에 현지 바이어의 만족도가 크게 높아지며 메일 회신율도 두 배 이상 늘었다"고 말했다.이재형 무역협회 고객서비스본부장은 "내년 미국ㆍ유럽연합(EU)과의 FTA가 본격 발효되면 중소 수출업체들은 FTA를 활용하는 데 필수적인 원산지 관련서류 작성 등에서 많은 어려움을 겪게 될 것"이라며 "이에 따라 내년에는 중소기업들의 FTA 활용도를 극대화하기 위해 FTA 전문 컨설팅을 더욱 강화할 계획"이라고 말했다.한편 무역협회는 '트레이드 SOS'가 진행한 총 70건의 생생한 컨설팅 사례가 담긴 수출현장지원 성공사례를 책으로 발간해 지방 중소기업들에 무료로 배포하기로 했다.
김현상기자 kim0123@sed.co.kr
[ⓒ 인터넷한국일보(www.hankooki.com), 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: A virtual elk camp?
description.content:
Great news, I was able to find our elk camp on Goggle Earth. I guess I will be able to share the vast beauty of this area with my grandchildren over the next six or seven years until they are old enough to hike in.
Thanks to the Forest Service and Game and Fish this is the only way they will see it: on a computer. Oh yeah I forgot, I can buy a horse or hire an outfitter.
RICK BODILY, Casper

description.hltext_display: SK, 홈런·탈삼진 적립 성금 전달
description.content:
김광현, 23일 월드비전에 사랑의 탈삼진 성금 기부
(서울=연합뉴스) 장현구 기자 =
프로야구 한국시리즈 정상을 2년 만에 되찾은 SK 와이번스가 올해 홈런과 탈삼진 기록에 적립한 성금을 기부하고 이웃과 훈훈한 정을 나눴다.
SK는 22일 인천 어린이재단과 어린이 복지시설단체인 '향진원'에 1천320만원 상당의 쌀(80㎏)을 각각 56가마, 10가마씩 전달했다.
SK는 올해 모아저축은행과 함께 홈경기에서 기록한 홈런 수만큼 사랑의 쌀을 적립, 어린이 단체를 후원하기로 했다. SK 타자들이 홈경기에서 터뜨린 홈런은 한국시리즈까지 포함해 66개였다.
이날 행사에서는 SK 간판타자인 박정권과 정근우가 참석, 사인회도 여는 등 어린이들과 오붓한 시간을 보냈다.
23일에는 팀 에이스 김광현이 나선다.
김광현은 이날 오후 2시 영등포구 여의도동 월드비전 사무실을 방문, '사랑의 탈삼진' 적립금 915만원을 기탁한다.
2008년부터 '사랑의 탈삼진' 성금을 마련해 온 김광현은 첫해에는 탈삼진 적립금과 추가 부담금을 합쳐 1천만원을 안산시청에 기부했고 지난해에는 월드비전에 탈삼진 적립금 560만원을 전달했다.
탈삼진 1개당 5만원씩 모은 김광현은 올해 삼진 183개를 낚았다.
월드비전은 김광현의 기부금을 결식아동과 독거노인, 장애인들에게 식사를 제공하는 '사랑의 도시락' 프로그램에 사용할 예정이다.
김광현은 구단을 통해 "나눔은 이어달리기라고 생각한다. 내가 바통을 넘기면 그 사람이 다른 사람에게 나눔을 전해주고 이를 통해 또 다른 나눔을 낳게 돼 정말 뜻 깊다. '사랑의 탈삼진'이 나눔 이어달리기에 작은 바통이 됐으면 좋겠다"고 말했다.

description.hltext_display: Different types of primaries
description.content:
Joan Barron's column ("Opening primary trend," Dec. 19) about the California vote in June to change the primary system, misunderstands what California voters did. California voters passed a "top-two" primary, not an open primary. Top-two systems exist only in Louisiana and Washington state, and now in California.
An open primary is a system in which each party has its own primary and its own nominees, but any voter on primary day is free to vote in any party's primary. By contrast, a top-two system says parties no longer have nominees, and don't have their own primary.
Top-two systems are not good for independent voters. In Washington and Louisiana, the system in practice leaves us with only Democrats and Republicans on the November ballot.
RICHARD WINGER, San Francisco, Calif.
Editor, Ballot Access News
