description.hltext_display: Pedophilia Guide Author Denies Book Is Obscene
description.content:
Phillip Greaves Charged With Violating Fla.'s Obscenity Law
UPDATED: 5:06 pm EST December 21, 2010
Email Print
Author Of Pedophilia Guide Faces Charges In Fla.
Embed this Video
Facebook
Digg
Twitter
Yahoo Buzz
Reddit
Delicious
Link
BARTOW, Fla. -- A Colorado man who wrote a how-to guide for pedophiles said Tuesday that his book is not obscene.
Phillip Greaves, 47, of Pueblo, Colo., arrived at the Polk County jail in central Florida on Tuesday morning and is due in court Wednesday afternoon, officials said.
He was arrested Monday in Colorado and charged with violating Florida's obscenity law, a third-degree felony. If convicted, he faces a maximum of five years in state prison.
Speaking to reporters outside the jail Tuesday, Greaves denied the book is obscene and said he plans to fight the charge.
"I characterize it as a book of showing people who have been improperly represented," he said. "And also telling people how they can go about to improve their own lives and so that these people that are being incarcerated now can possibly be rehabilitated."
Polk County Sheriff Grady Judd claims jurisdiction because Greaves sold and mailed the book to undercover deputies who had written him requesting a copy.
Florida's obscenity law prohibits the "distribution of obscene material depicting minors engaged in conduct harmful to minors."
The book was briefly for sale on Amazon.com but was yanked in November after it prompted online outrage.

description.hltext_display: Johanna Sturesson: I en diktatur rätt nära dig
description.content:
Minsk ligger mindre än 100 mil från Malmö, fågelvägen. I andra avseenden är det betydligt längre än så. I söndags hölls presidentval i Vitryssland och utgången var allt för bekant.
Aleksandr Lukasjenko, som styrt landet sedan 1994, fick 80 procent i valet som var allt annat än fritt. EU:s förhoppningar om att klimatet för landets oppositionella skulle ha blivit bättre kunde inte bli sämre bemötta. Sju av tio presidentkandidater greps, en slogs medvetslös av polis och arresterades. Regimen uppger själva att 600 demonstranter har dömts till upp till 15 dagars "administrativ arrest" sedan protesterna mot söndagens val.
Europas sista diktatur är en vanlig benämning av Vitryssland. Under Sovjettiden investerades mycket pengar i vitrysk industri och till skillnad från många andra ockuperade länder innebar Sovjettiden ekonomisk framgång för landet.
När Lukasjenko 1994 ställde upp i landets första presidentval efter Sovjets fall lovade han att sätta stopp för det förfall som hade påbörjats efter upplösningen av unionen. Med väst som det onda och marknadsekonomi som fördärv lovade Lukasjenko folket ekonomisk trygghet. Låt vara till ett högt pris.
Under de två senaste decennierna har oppositionella och regimkritiker fängslats, misshandlats och frihetsberövats. Med censur och statliga mediekanaler har Lukasjenko under hela sin tid vid makten förmedlat sitt budskap och sin sida av historien. Väldigt sällan den sanna.
EU trodde uppenbarligen, en aning optimistiskt, att omständigheterna höll på att förändras nu. Man hade lyft på de sanktioner som infördes efter förra presidentvalet som inte heller det gick rätt till. Men efter söndagens val kan varken Europas utrikeschef Catherine Ashton eller utrikesminister Carl Bildt beskriva det skedda i några fina ordalag. Agerandet fördöms helt av stat efter stat. Men det är ju inte direkt något som den vitryska regimen inte haft med i beräkningarna.
Problemet är att Aleksandr Lukasjenko vet vad han gör och han gör det bra. Det geografiska läget gör att Vitryssland är viktigt för Rysslands gas- och oljeexport. Det innebär en ekonomisk fördel för Vitryssland som har subventionerade priser på både olja och gas. Och framförallt - det är en maktfaktor mot Ryssland, har det visat sig vid ett flertal tillfällen.
Vad har ledningen av en totalitär regim som Vitryssland att vinna på goda relationer med väst? Det finns inget ekonomiskt beroende av EU och med Ryssland bakom sig har man inga problem med att fördömas av europeiska stater. De ryska relationerna är ekonomiskt viktiga, inte minst eftersom att de inte sätter några krav på regimen. Vitryssland är så strategiskt viktigt för Ryssland att de inte har råd med dåliga relationer till sin granne i väst.
EU:s möjligheter att sätta press på Aleksandr Lukasjenkos regim har visat sig vara begränsade. Ryssland där-emot skulle i större grad kunna utkräva förändring av det vitryska styret.
Tydligt är att Ryssland vinner på sina relationer till Vitryssland och att uteblivandet av att ställa krav på regimen är en förutsättning för att de ska behållas goda. Till synes verkar det som att det ryska styret låter ekonomiska intressen gå före demokratiska. Kanske borde EU satsa sina ansträngningar på Ryssland i stället?

description.hltext_display: BBP Bursa İl Başkanı Kahveci: Büyükşehir Belediyesi ...
description.content:
Büyük Birlik Partisi (BBP) Bursa İl Başkanı Tahir Kahveci, "Recep Altepe başkanlığındaki Bursa Büyükşehir Belediye yönetiminde laf var icraat yok dönemini görmekteyiz." dedi.
BBP Bursa İl Başkanı Kahveci, açıklamasında, kamuoyuna tanıtılan projelerin lafta kaldığını iddia etti. Kahveci, "Üretilen projeler, kamuoyuna duyurulan projeler ve bilboardlarda reklamı yapılan projelerin 10'da 1'i yapılsa veya yapılmaya başlansa o bile yeter diyeceğiz. O bile başarıdır diyeceğiz. Ama maalesef her proje havada kalıyor veya bir başlangıç yapılıyor, gerisi gelmiyor." şeklinde eleştirdi.
Projeler arasında yapılması gereken ilk iş olarak, 'Bursa Kent Stadyumu'nda henüz kazma vurulmadığını ifade eden Kahveci, şunları söyledi: "Eski halin yerinin ne olacağını iki yıl sonra ancak öğrenebildik. Ne zaman yapılacağını ise bu hızla düşünmek bile istemiyorum. Eski tabakhanelerdeki kentsel dönüşüm projesi son 10 yıldır Bursa'nın gündeminde ama hala bir adım atılamadı. Bu gidişle torunlarımız da bu kentsel dönüşümü konuşur. Teleferiğin oteller bölgesine çıkma projesi hep konuşulan bir projeydi, henüz yeni bir adım ilerledik. Bursa rayın Kestel'e uzanması ne zaman başlayacağını merakla bekliyoruz."
Bütün bunlara rağmen şimdi de Gölyazı-Uluabat Gölü ile Marmara Denizi'ni Bağlama projesinin gündeme getirildiğini anımsatan Tahir Kahveci, "Elbette böyle bir proje tarihi yapısı ve doğal güzelliğiyle potansiyel turizm yeri olan Uluabat Gölü için güzel bir proje olur. Fakat bu projenin de hayata geçirilmesi ne zaman olur bilemem." diye ifade etti.
Bursa'nın kış ve yaz turizmi, inanç turizmi ve kaplıcalarıyla Türkiye ve dünyanın cazibe merkezi olabileceğine dikkat çeken Tahir Kahveci, şöyle devam etti: "Fakat bu görüntü ve bu karmaşıklığı ile şehir içi ve şehirler arası ulaşım sıkıntılarıyla bu şansını her geçen gün kaybetmektedir. Havayolu ve demir yolu konusunda Bursa'nın sıkıntısı had safhadadır. Maalesef Bursa, yavaş, bazı konularda da yanlış yönetiliyor. Bursa, sanayisiyle, tarımıyla, doğal güzellikleriyle ve tarihi misyonuyla bu yönetimi hak etmiyor." (Cihan Haber Ajansı) 6 dakika önce.. [2430118]

description.hltext_display: En su alegato, Videla reivindicó la represión y atacó al Gobierno
description.content:
El dictador aseguró en el juicio de Córdoba que "los enemigos de ayer, hoy gobiernan el país" y habló de una "guerra justa".
Votá(1)
A sus 85 años, Jorge Rafael Videla hizo una detallada defensa de la dictadura que encabezó. (Télam)
Notas relacionadas
Las polémicas palabras de Videla
Marta Platía - Especial para Los Andes
En sus últimas palabras antes de la sentencia de hoy, el represor Jorge Rafael Videla volvió a reivindicar el terrorismo de Estado y justificó los crímenes de lesa humanidad que se le imputan: dijo que libró "no una guerra sucia, sino una guerra justa que aún no ha terminado".
También repitió lo que viene afirmando desde que comenzó el juicio el 2 de julio: que "los enemigos derrotados ayer cumplieron su propósito y hoy gobiernan el país". Un claro ataque para el Gobierno.
En su discurso de 48 minutos, en el marco del juicio que se le sigue por el asesinato de 31 presos políticos en Córdoba durante la dictadura, Videla no se refirió ni a los desaparecidos ni a los bebés robados mencionados durante el juicio. Y repitió aquello de la "necesaria crueldad" de la dictadura más sangrienta de la historia argentina, que se jacta de haber conducido.
Vestido con un traje azul, camisa blanca y corbata roja, el ex dictador de 85 años exhibió un sorprendente estado físico. Ni bien arrancó -con el timbre claro, marcial de otros tiempos- cuestionó el alegato del querellante Hugo Vaca Narvaja, de quien, dijo, "hizo un peligroso revisionismo histórico".
Es que Vaca Narvaja -quien defiende la causa de su padre torturado y fusilado en la UP1- le apuntó "al lastimoso papel del Ejército Argentino" desde la Conquista del Desierto, pasando por los fusilamientos de obreros de la Patagonia; el Proceso y la Guerra de Malvinas.
En tren de una defensa que negó como tal, Videla no se privó de hacer su propio repaso de la historia: "El Estado de caos del país desde octubre de 1975"; la firma del decreto de "Aniquilación del terrorismo" suscripto por la ex presidente Estela Martínez de Perón e Italo Lúder -a quien primero le elogió el "coraje cívico" y luego deploró su "posterior interpretación semántica del término aniquilar"-; y no dejó títere con cabeza a la hora de arrojar responsabilidades acerca del accionar del Ejército.
Desde Juan Domingo Perón, cuando "echó a los Montoneros de la Plaza diciéndoles imberbes"; su Documento Reservado, luego del asesinato de José Rucci, y las palabras de un diputado de entonces, de apellido Stocco, que "les daba vía libre a las FFAA para perseguirlos a guaridas como a ratas porque no merecen vivir en este suelo".
Pero, sin dudas, una de las grandes sorpresas fue cuando Videla relató, "a modo de anécdota", una supuesta reunión con el líder radical Ricardo Balbín "en casa de un amigo común" a "exactos 45 días del inicio del Proceso. Me expresó su preocupación por la situación caótica que vivía el país y sin mediar palabra me dijo: 'Frente a esta situación, van a dar el golpe ¿sí o no?'. Le respondí que sí por dar el golpe, sabíamos fecha y hora de su ejecución. Me interrumpió y me dijo: 'Si esto es así, háganlo cuanto antes, evítenle al país, una larga agonía'".
Ya embarcado en presuntas revelaciones, Videla aseguró que hubo "dentro de ésa orgía de violencia" unos "seis atentados" contra su vida, y aseguró que "el primero fue en marzo de 1976 comandado por (el periodista Horacio) Verbitsky". Según la versión del represor, "el Perro"-tal como lo llamó- luego habría sido "enjuiciado severamente" por los Montoneros "por no haberse quedado a comprobar los resultados de la operación".
Otro de sus blancos fue el actual Procurador General de la Nación, Esteban Righi, a quien señaló como "inspirador del decreto que dejó libres a mil quinientos terroristas con la amnistía de (Héctor) Cámpora, a su llegada al gobierno, el 25 de mayo de 1973".
Videla tampoco quiso dejar afuera a la mismísima "sociedad argentina". La calificó de "protagonista de la guerra antisubversiva", otorgándole en el devenir de sus razonamientos, calidad de cómplice en lo sucedido durante la dictadura.
Antes de descalificar, una vez más, al Tribunal Oral Federal número 1 que lo juzgó y condenaría hoy, repitió lo que había dicho en otra de sus intervenciones: que "los enemigos derrotados de ayer cumplieron su propósito y hoy gobiernan el país e intentan un régimen marxista a la manera de Gramsci", el pensador italiano que impulsaba la revolución a través de la cultura.
A punto de recibir su segunda condena (ya fue enjuiciado por el robo de bebés durante el Proceso), el jerarca no se arrepiente de nada. Nombró al Papa, a Dios y a la Biblia cuantas veces pudo, y felicitó a todos sus compañeros de juicio. A todos excepto al cabo Miguel Angel Pérez -el hombre que se arrepintió de haber asesinado a Raúl Bauducco y pidió perdón-, a quien con desprecio calificó de "inoperante". CC

description.hltext_display: 현대차, '365일 찾아가는 시승..
description.content:
현대자동차(회장 정몽구)는 업계 최초로 '365일 찾아가는 시승서비스'를 오는 31일까지 시범운영 후 내년 1월3일(월)부터 본격적으로 실시한다고 22일 밝혔다.'365일 찾아가는 시승서비스'는 ‘Any time, Wherever you are (언제든 당신이 어디에 있든)’을 서비스 콘셉트로 고객이 원하는 시간과 장소에 전문 담당직원이 예약한 차를 가지고 방문하는 고객 맞춤형 시승 서비스다.
현대차는 수입차 업체에서도 유례를 찾아볼 수 없는 파격적인 ‘365일 찾아가는 시승서비스’를 시작으로 2011년 한 해 동안 ‘고객의 생각을 먼저 생각한다’는 콘셉트로 다양한 고객감동 마케팅을 지속적으로 실시 할 계획이다. '365일 찾아가는 시승서비스'를 희망하는 고객은 현대차 홈페이지(www.hyundai.com) 및 전국 12개의 시승센터를 통해 신청할 수 있으며, 차량 반납 역시 담당 직원이 시승이 종료되는 장소에서 차를 인수해 고객 편의성을 극대화시키는 방식으로 진행된다.
현대차는 오는 31일까지 서울, 부산, 인천, 대구, 광주, 대전 등 6대 광역시 12개 대형 시승센터를 위주로 '365일 찾아가는 시승서비스'를 시범운영하고, 개선점을 보완해 내년 1월 3일부터 본격적으로 시행하는 한편 시승센터도 전국 30개로 확대할 예정이다.
현대차 관계자는 “이번 ‘365일 찾아가는 시승서비스’는 평소 차에 관한 고객의 생각을 고려해 철저히 고객의 입장에서 준비한 프로그램이다”며 “현대차는 앞으로 ‘고객만족 최우선’의 가치를 실현하는 혁신적인 마케팅을 통해 프리미엄 브랜드로 도약할 것”이라고 밝혔다.
(대한민국 중심언론 CBS 뉴스FM98.1 / 음악FM93.9 / TV CH 412)저작권자 ⓒ CBS 노컷뉴스( www.nocutnews.co.kr ) 무단전재 및 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: Ophthalmic Imaging Systems' Abraxas EMR Receives ONC-ATCB 2011/2012 Certification
description.content:
Ophthalmic Imaging Systems (OIS) (OTCBB: OISI), a leading ophthalmic digital imaging and informatics company, today announced that Abraxas EMR VERSION 4.1.7 is 2011/2012 compliant and was certified as a Complete EHR on December 17, 2010 by the Certification Commission for Health Information Technology (CCHIT®), an ONC-ATCB, in accordance with the applicable ELIGIBLE PROVIDER certification criteria adopted by the Secretary of Health and Human Services. The 2011/2012 criteria support the Stage 1 meaningful use measures required to qualify eligible providers and hospitals for funding under the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act (ARRA). Abraxas EMR was developed and is distributed by Abraxas Medical Solutions, Inc., a wholly owned subsidiary of OIS.
"With ONC-ATCB certification, we are well positioned to capitalize on anticipated momentum in the EMR market," said OIS CEO Gil Allon. "Abraxas clients are assured that they have a complete ambulatory EHR solution that meets or exceeds the government's 'Meaningful Use' requirements for the first stage of the stimulus incentive program. Further, we believe this certification provides a level of confidence that the Abraxas EMR solution is on a pathway toward compliance for future stages of Meaningful Use."
The ONC-ATCB 2011/2012 certification program tests and certifies that Complete EHRs meet all of the 2011/2012 criteria and EHR Modules meet one or more -- but not all -- of the criteria approved by the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS) for either eligible provider or hospital technology.
"CCHIT is pleased to be testing and certifying products so that companies are now able to offer these products to providers who wish to purchase and implement certified EHR technology and achieve meaningful use in time for the 2011-2012 incentives," said Karen M. Bell, M.D., M.S.S., Chair, CCHIT.
Abraxas EMR Version 4.1.7, certification number is CC-1112-793895-1. ONC-ATCB 2011/2012 certification conferred by CCHIT does not represent an endorsement of the certified EHR technology by the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services nor does it guarantee the receipt of incentive payments.
The clinical quality measures to which Abraxas EMR Version 4.1.7 has been certified include: NQF 0421, NQF 0013, NQF 0028, NQF 0041, NQF 0024, NQF 0038, NQF 0031, NQF 0052, NQF 0055.
The additional software Abraxas EMR Version 4.1.7 relied upon to demonstrate compliance include: Intuit Health Patient Portal and NewCrop RX.
Abraxas EMR Version 4.1.7 is also certified in CCHIT's separate and independently developed certification program. Abraxas EMR Version 4.1.7 is a CCHIT Certified® 2008 Ambulatory EHR. Abraxas has certified its EHR technology in both programs to provide greater assurance to its customers.
About CCHIT
The Certification Commission for Health Information Technology (CCHIT®) is an independent, 501(c)3 nonprofit organization with the public mission of accelerating the adoption of robust, interoperable health information technology. The Commission has been certifying electronic health record technology since 2006 and is approved by the Office of the National Coordinator for Health Information Technology (ONC) of the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) as an Authorized Testing and Certification Body (ONC-ATCB). More information on CCHIT, CCHIT Certified® products and ONC-ATCB certified electronic health record technology is available at http://cchit.org.
About ONC-ATCB 2011/2012 certification
The ONC-ATCB 2011/2012 certification program tests and certifies that EHR technology is capable of meeting the 2011/2012 criteria approved by the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS). The certifications include Complete EHRs, which meet all of the 2011/2012 criteria for either eligible provider or hospital technology and EHR Modules, which meet one or more -- but not all -- of the criteria. ONC-ATCB certification aligns with Health Information Technology: Initial Set of Standards, Implementation Specifications, and Certification Criteria for Electronic Health Record Technology published in the Federal Register in July 2010 and strictly adheres to the test procedures published by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) at the time of testing. ONC-ATCB 2011/2012 certification conferred by the Certification Commission for Health Information Technology (CCHIT®) does not represent an endorsement of the certified EHR technology by the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services nor does it guarantee the receipt of incentive payments.
"CCHIT®" and "CCHIT Certified®" are registered trademarks of the Certification Commission for Health Information Technology.
About Abraxas Medical Solutions, Inc.
Abraxas Medical Solutions, Inc. (Abraxas), located in Irvine, Calif., focuses on developing and delivering electronic medical records (EMR) and practice management (PM) software to medical offices of different specialties nationwide. Abraxas' EHR software, Abraxas EMR Version 4.1, is a CCHIT Certified® 2008 Ambulatory EHR. For more information, please visit: www.abraxasmedical.com.
About Ophthalmic Imaging Systems
Ophthalmic Imaging Systems (www.oisi.com) is the leading provider of ophthalmic digital imaging and informatics systems. The Company designs, develops, manufactures and markets digital imaging systems, image management and integrated EMR and PM solutions for the eye care market. With more than 25 years in the ophthalmic imaging business, the Company has consistently introduced new, innovative technologies. Through its wholly owned subsidiary, Abraxas Medical Solutions, the Company provides EMR and PM software to OB/GYN and orthopedic physicians. The Company markets and supports its products through an extensive network of dealers, distributors and direct representatives.
Statements in this press release which are not historical data are forward-looking statements which involve known and unknown risks, uncertainties, or other factors not under the Company's control, which may cause actual results, performance, or achievements of the Company to be materially different from the results, performance, or other expectations implied by these forward-looking statements. These factors include, but are not limited to, those detailed in the Company's periodic filings with the Securities and Exchange Commission.

description.hltext_display: A shot of momentum is Roths role at IU
description.content:
Indianas junior guard describes the process as finding a way, whether open or not, to stay in his teammates vision. Roth wants to make sure a teammate who is driving to the rim can see him. Roth will keep moving, and if the defense gets drawn to the ball, he will be open for a three-point shot.
If executed properly, the results are similar to what happened Sunday against South Carolina State.
Roth made four three-pointers and finished with 14 points in the Hoosiers 102-60 victory Sunday in the second game of the Las Vegas Classic at Assembly Hall. You always know Matt can shoot the ball, IU sophomore forward Christian Watford said. Thats nothing new with Matt. If you find him, he will knock it down. Roth entered the game with 10 points. He topped the figure in just 11 minutes. You can see what happens whether its with the crowd or its with his teammates, him making a three is as exciting as someone catching an alley-oop dunk. People want to see that, IU coach Tom Crean said. We want to see that. It makes our team that much better. Roths first three, off an assist from Jordan Hulls with 4:08 left in the first half, helped spark a 20-4 Hoosiers run that put the game away. Its great for a team. It really gives you a lot of momentum, Roth said. You get an offensive rebound and you are able to put a three in. It really kind of kills the defensive energy for the other team. We were able to build off that and get a nice run there to end the first half and start the second half off with a lot of energy. IU (9-2) looks to carry that momentum to Vegas. The four-game event concludes with games today against Northern Iowa (7-3) and Thursday against either Colorado or New Mexico. A victory today would put the Hoosiers in the championship game of a regular-season tournament for the first time since the 2007 Chicago Invitational Championship.

description.hltext_display: Pınar Karşıyaka Saat 13.45 te İzmir de Olacak
description.content:
'nde çirkin saldırılara maruz kalan Pınar Karşıyaka Basketbol Takımı, Türkiye'ye dönmek üzere ayrıldı. Kafilenin, saat 13.45 sıralarında Adnan Menderes Havalimanı'nda olacağı öğrenildi. Pınar Karşıyaka, Basketbol FIBA Erkekler EuroChallenge (G) Kupası'nda, dün (21 Aralık) Apoel ile yaptığı maçtan sonra taraftarların çirkin saldırılarına maruz kalmıştı. Pınar Karşıyaka Kulübü yetkilileri, kafilenin havayoluyla Atina'ya hareket ettiğini, oradan saat 13.05'te ayrılarak İzmir'e geleceğini açıkladı.
Saldırıyla ilgili olarak Pınar Karşıyaka'nın internet sitesine de bir açıklama koyuldu. Açıklamada, şu görüşlere yer verildi: "Son günlerde art arda yaşadığımız büyük üzüntü ve stresin ardından, dün akşam 'nde yaşanan olaylar nedeniyle mahsur kalan takımımızı karşılamak üzere tüm Karşıyakalıları, İzmir Adnan Menderes Havalimanı'na davet ediyoruz. Pınar Karşıyaka Basketbol Takımı ve Karşıyakalıların tek yumruk olduğunu göstermek adına, saat 13.45 sularında alana iniş yapması beklenen takımımızı karşılamak üzere saat 13.00'te, Karşıyaka İskele'de taraftar konvoyu oluşturulacaktır.'' (Cihan Haber Ajansı) 6 dakika önce.. [2430117]

description.hltext_display: Директорът на ОД на МВР- Кюстендил поздрави служителите на Гранична полиция за техния празник
description.content:
Днес е професионалния празник на служителите от Гранична полиция и се навършват 123 години от създаването й. Директорът на ОДМВР комисар Георги Джоглев изпрати поздравление до служителите на РДГП - Кюстендил,в което се казва:
УВАЖАЕМИ КОМИСАР ДЕМИРЕВСКИ,
ПОЗДРАВЯВАМ ВИ ПО СЛУЧАЙ ПРОФЕСИОНАЛНИЯ ПРАЗНИК НА БЪЛГАРСКИТЕ ГРАНИЧНИ ПОЛИЦАИ И 123-ГОДИШНИНАТА ОТ СЪЗДАВАНЕТО НА СТРУКТУРАТА ЗА ОПАЗВАНЕТО НА БЪЛГАРСКИТЕ ДЪРЖАВНИ ГРАНИЦИ.
БЛАГОДАРЯ ВИ ЗА ПОЛЗОТВОРНОТО СЪТРУДНИЧЕСТВО И УСИЛИЯТА НИ ДА ГАРАНТИРАМЕ СИГУРНОСТТА И СПОКОЙСТВИЕТО НА ГРАЖДАНИТЕ, ЗА ОБЩИТЕ НИ ОХРАНИТЕЛНИ ДЕЙСТВИЯ ПО ВРЕМЕ НА ЧЕРЕШОБЕРА В КЮСТЕНДИЛСКО. БЛАГОДАРЯ ЧРЕЗ ВАС И НА СТАРШИ ПОЛИЦАЙ ВЕРОНИКА ДИМИТРОВА, КОЯТО ОКАЗА МЕТОДИЧЕСКА И ПРАКТИЧЕСКА ПОМОЩ НА СЕКТОР В ОДМВР ЗА ДОКУМЕНТИРАНЕ И ФИНАЛИЗИРАНЕ НА РАЗСЛЕДВАНЕ, ИЗИСКВАЩО ДАННИ ОТ МЕЖДУНАРОДНА ЦЕНТРАЛА.
ЖЕЛАЯ НА ВАС И ВСИЧКИ КОЛЕГИ ОТ РДГП - КЮСТЕНДИЛ, ЛИЧНИ И ПРОФЕСИОНАЛНИ УСПЕХИ В ОПАЗВАНЕТО НА ДЪРЖАВНАТА ГРАНИЦА И УПРАЖНЯВАНЕТО НА ГРАНИЧНИЯ КОНТРОЛ НА ВЪНШНАТА ЕВРОПЕЙСКА ГРАНИЦА. ВИЕ ВЕЧЕ ДОКАЗАХТЕ, ЧЕ СТЕ РАВНОСТОЙНИ ПАРТНЬОРИ НА ЕВРОПЕЙСКИТЕ СЛУЖБИ В ГАРАНТИРАНЕТО НА ДЪРЖАВНАТА СИГУРНОСТ В СЪОТВЕТСТВИЕ С ДЕМОКРАТИЧНИТЕ СТАНДАРТИ! ЧЕСТИТ ПРАЗНИК!

description.hltext_display: Local Roundup: Troy boys earn road victory over Albany High
description.content:
ALBANY — The Troy boys’ basketball team improved to 4-1 in the Big 10 after capturing a 74-56 road victory over previously unbeaten Albany High Tuesday night.
Shadell and Devonte Millinghaus combined for three 3-point field goals each for 19 and 11 points respectively for the Flying Horses.
Javion Ogunyemi scored 15 points and Raheem Felder added 14 for Troy.
Jakei Turman connected on three triples of his own for a team-high 19 points for the Falcons (3-1, 3-1).
Bishop Maginn 53, La Salle 49: Antoine Johnson scored 16 points and Cammeron Womack-Buish finished with 15 to lead the Griffins (1-3, 1-4) to the Big 10 victory.
Liam Doyle scored 13 points to lead the Cadets (0-6, 0-6), while Ralph Erickson and Tyler Reed scored 11 points apiece.
Rushon Young also scored 11 points for Bishop Maginn.
CBA 50, Schenectady 44: The Brothers needed a late game rally in a Big 10 tilt at Schenectady to remain unbeaten at 6-0.
The Patriots held a 43-32 lead after three periods but the Brothers turned it on in the final frame, outscoring Schenectady 18-10 en route to the win.
Max Weaver netted 13 points while Galal Cancer chipped in with 12 for the Brothers. Continued...
Reader Comments »
View reader comments (0) » Comment on this story »
Eddie Stanley had 11 points and Anthony Richardson added 10 points for Schenectady (3-2, 3-2).
Shaker 46, Guilderland 34: Jeff Hoffman and Ryan Polsinello combined for 23 points to lead the Blue Bison (3-2) to the victory.
Cameron Dobbs scored a game-high 17 points in the loss for the Dutchmen.
Bethlehem 67, Saratoga 48: Jordan Sperber keyed a huge 25 point second quarter for Bethlehem and the Eagles never looked back to earn the Suburban Council victory. Sperber scored nine of his game high 22 points in the crucial second quarter in which the Eagles rebounded from a slow start and outscored the Blue Streaks 25-9. Mike McLeer and AJ Generali each added 11 points for the Eagles.
Mikey McElroy scored a team high 20 points and Erik Tallman added 12 for the Blue Streaks.
Columbia 62, Burnt Hills 52: The Blue Devils (4-1, 5-2) had four players score in double digits, including a team high 17 points from Kelly Davis, to top the Spartans (1-4, 1-4) in Suburban Council action. Corey Gibson had 13 points while Tyler Hart and Christian Brown each added 11 for Columbia.
Robbie Knights scored a game high 24 points in a losing effort for the Spartans.
Watervliet 72, Ichabod Crane 46: Jordan Gleason nailed four triples for a game-high 30 points as the Cannoneers cruised to a Colonial Council victory. Devonte Gleason chipped in with 14 and Dan Nittinger had 10 for Watervliet (4-0, 5-1).
Joe Fey scored 18 and Ricky Pallozzi dropped in 11 to lead the Jesters (2-3, 3-5).
Schalmont 65, Cohoes 59: Anthony Metzold scored a team high 16 points, including nine from behind the arc, to give the Sabres (3-2, 3-4) the Colonial Council victory. Continued...

description.hltext_display: DAX auf Schlussniveau erwartet
description.content:
Autor: Scoach (Frankfurt)
Der Leitindex DAX dürfte am Mittwoch mit leichten Gewinnen in den Handel starten. Darauf deuten die vorbörslichen Indikatoren. Der DAX-Future, der durch den X-DAX berechnet wird, notiert zur Stunde bei 7.081 Punkten. Dies entspricht einem Zuwachs von 3 Punkten gegenüber dem gestrigen Schlusskurs. Am Dienstag kletterte das Börsenbarometer um 0,85 Prozent auf 7.078 Punkte.
Widerstände: 7.075 + 7.101 + 7.135/7.140 + 7.163/7.190
Unterstützungen: 7.060/7.065 + 7.043
Die Vorgaben von den internationalen Börsen sind gemischt. An der Wall Street verbesserte sich der Dow Jones am Dienstag um 0,48 Prozent auf 11.533 Zähler. In Asien ging der Nikkei am Morgen hingegen mit einem Minus von 0,23 Prozent bei 10.346 Punkten aus dem Handel.
Der Euro zeigt sich im frühen Handel etwas fester. Die europäische Gemeinschaftswährung kostet zur Stunde 1,3130 US-Dollar. Das sind 0,24 Prozent mehr als am Dienstag.
Der Ölpreis ist am Morgen über die Marke von 90 US-Dollar gestiegen. Ein Barrel der US-Sorte WTI für die Auslieferung im Februar kostet zur Stunde 90,03 US-Dollar. Das sind 21 Cent mehr als gestern Abend.

description.hltext_display: Tribun Biz : AXIS Sponsori Jakarta International Java Jazz 2011
description.content:
BANDUNG, TRIBUN - Operator GSM dan 3G AXIS kembali menjadi title sponsor pada AXIS Jakarta International Java Jazz Festival 2011. Dengan penetapan ini berarti AXIS sudah tiga kali menjadi sponsor salah satu pergelaran jazz kelas dunia ini.
Eric Mallia, Chief Marketing Officer AXIS, mengatakan, AXIS ingin selalu mendukung berbagai kegiatan yang memberikan pengaruh positif bagi perkembangan industri musik di Indonesia. "AXIS tentu bangga menjadi bagian festival jazz internasional ini. Di satu sisi kami ingin membuktikan bahwa musik jazz dapat dinikmati semua segmen masyarakat," kata Eric melalui rilis berita yang diterima Tribun, Rabu (22/12) siang.
AXIS memberikan sebuah penawaran yang sangat menarik untuk tiket masuk harian hanya Rp 99.000 (termasuk pajak), dengan membeli isi ulang pulsa AXIS seharga Rp 100.000. Penawaran istimewa yang terbatas ini berlaku mulai 22 hingga 31 Desember 2010.
Mulai 1 Januari 2011, AXIS juga akan memberi penawaran menarik berupa potongan harga 50% dari harga normal untuk tiket masuk harian dengan pembelian pulsa AXIS senilai Rp 100.000. (rry)

description.hltext_display: Salud: una nueva oferta del Gobierno interesa más a los gremios
description.content:
El Ejecutivo propuso una suba de 15% que se acerca más a las pretensiones de ATE y Ampros. El paro sigue hoy y el lunes se definirá si la aceptan en una asamblea.
Votá(0)
Así definió la propuesta oficial Raquel Blas (centro), que lidera la protesta junto a Del Pópolo (izquierda). (Los Andes)
Notas relacionadas
Felipe Acevedo - facevedo@losandes.com.ar
El Gobierno efectuó un nuevo ofrecimiento, esta vez del 15 por ciento remunerativo y bonificable a partir de enero, a los profesionales y no profesionales de la salud. Lo hizo en la tercera reunión entre las partes en seis días.
De esta forma, el Ejecutivo mejoró la oferta. Inicialmente había planteado un plus no remunerativo en los primeros meses del año y luego un aumento del 18%, también no remunerativo, que se efectivizaría en tres etapas.
Ante el no rotundo de los gremios, Ampros (Asociación de Profesionales de la Salud) y ATE (Asociación de Trabajadores del Estado), al día siguiente llevó una propuesta del 11% remunerativo a partir de enero y reabrir la discusión en abril, también rechazada en asamblea el lunes.
La nueva oferta oficial será analizada en la asamblea interhospitalaria que se reunirá el lunes, a las 12, en el hospital Notti y a las 17 nuevamente se encontrarán los representantes del Ejecutivo y los trabajadores para que estos transmitan la decisión del plenario.
La sensación ante la nueva propuesta es que está más cerca de ser aceptada teniendo en cuenta algunos aspectos como que el aumento es a partir de enero cuando otros años ha sido desde abril; que hay una serie de puntos reclamados por los gremios que están en el ofrecimiento como la equiparación de las asignaciones familiares con las nacionales, el pase a planta de contratados desde 2006 y la regularización este año de mayores dedicaciones y categorización de centros de salud.
Por otra parte, el 15% es una base "aceptable", según admitieron referentes de los sindicatos, para discutir en mayo un nuevo incremento que tanto Ampros como ATE sostienen que debe ser del 35%.
Los funcionarios del Gobierno aclararon que el aumento salarial es hasta abril inclusive, ya que en la segunda quincena de mayo deberá reanudarse la paritaria para analizar el impacto de la inflación.
Pero, además, se mantuvo el ofrecimiento ya realizado en el encuentro de negociación anterior de equiparar las asignaciones familiares provinciales con las nacionales en un cronograma dispuesto hasta diciembre del próximo año.
También se reiteró que se elaborará un cronograma conjunto para lanzar un plan de recuperación de las cirugías suspendidas en los hospitales por el prolongado paro médico. A ello se suma la promesa de continuar analizando los aspectos del convenio firmado entre el Gobierno y Ampros en 2007 que no se han cumplido.
Al efectuar el anuncio, Mario Granado, subsecretario de Hacienda, sostuvo que es "la última oferta que hace el Poder Ejecutivo" y que hay que "tener racionalidad".
"Estamos proponiendo un 15% de aumento en la asignación de la clase (el básico) para ambos sectores. Esto implica respetar la proporcionalidad de todas las clases que el régimen tiene. También proponemos una nueva reunión para rediscutir salarios en función de las nuevas variables que haya en la segunda quincena de mayo", afirmó el funcionario.
Tanto Raquel Blas, titular de ATE, como Isabel Del Pópolo, secretaria general de Ampros, se mostraron cautas en las declaraciones que formularon sobre el ofrecimiento, indicando ambas que había que esperar hasta el lunes las respuestas de las bases.
"Si pensamos que de un 11 se ha llevado a un 15 %, hay un leve aumento. Son las bases las que van a decir si están en condiciones de aceptar la propuesta o no", indicó Del Pópolo.
"Fue una propuesta superadora, nada más. Los trabajadores tendrán que resolver si se acepta; y si no se acepta deberán definir cómo se continúa con el plan de lucha. Ha sido un conflicto muy largo, muy doloroso para todos, por lo tanto es fundamental que cada trabajador tenga voz y voto en la decisión; eso es lo que vamos a respetar, porque los trabajadores han dejado mucho en este conflicto", sostuvo Blas.
Junto al anuncio del nuevo porcentaje, los funcionarios del Gobierno entregaron a ambos gremios las respectivas simulaciones de sueldos, en base a lo pagado en octubre, como una muestra de la predisposición para que el conflicto se solucione antes de que termine el año.

description.hltext_display: Two at Dr. Reddy's die after gas leak: reports
description.content:

Tuesday’s biggest gaining and declining stocks (Dec. 21)

Story Quotes Comments Screener

Recommend
TEL AVIV (MarketWatch) -- Two workers at Dr. Reddy's Laboratories Ltd. /quotes/comstock/13*!rdy/quotes/nls/rdy (RDY 35.36, -2.35, -6.23%) were killed after gas leaked at a Hyderabad manufacturing facility, Wednesday media reports say. The company confirmed the deaths of the two people, one a staffer and one a contract worker, the reports say. The Economic Times reported that the plant produces active pharmaceutical ingredients. The police are awaiting medical tests to identify the gas that leaked, the newspaper reported.

description.hltext_display: Mowag liefert an Bundeswehr
description.content:
Die internationalen Einsätze der Bundeswehr schlagen sich im deutschen Rüstungsprogramm nieder: Das Heer braucht gepanzerte Fahrzeuge, damit seine Soldaten auf Patrouillenfahrten vor Angriffen geschützt sind. In diesem Segment hat sich die Kreuzlinger Mowag mit ihren Eagle-Fahrzeugen gut positioniert, wie der neuste Auftrag der Bundeswehr zeigt. Die Mowag kann weitere 195 Eagle-Fahrzeuge nach Deutschland liefern, wie das Mutterhaus General Dynamics gestern mitteilte. In Deutschland montiert Das Auftragsvolumen beläuft sich auf 125 Mio. Euro. Davon fliesst allerdings nicht alles nach Kreuzlingen. Hier werden die Eagles fahrbereit fertiggestellt. Die Endmontage übernimmt das General-Dynamics-Werk im deutschen Kaiserslautern. Dort werden die Fahrzeuge mit den von der Bundeswehr verlangten Spezifikationen wie etwa Funkgeräten ausgestattet. Wie sich das Auftragsvolumen auf die beiden Werke aufteilt, behält der Rüstungskonzern für sich. Ein guter Anteil entfalle aber auf Kreuzlingen, sagte Urs Engeli, Mowag-Verkaufsleiter für den deutschen Markt. Ein Weihnachtsgeschenk «Für Mowag ist der Auftrag ein schönes Weihnachtsgeschenk», sagt Engeli. Das Werk sei damit gut ausgelastet. Die Eagles werden 2011 und 2012 gefertigt und ausgeliefert. Damit steigt der Eagle-Bestand der Bundeswehr auf 473 Fahrzeuge. Seit 2008 beliefert die Mowag die Bundeswehr damit. Erst im April hatte die Bundeswehr eine Tranche von 60 Eagles bestellt. Dass die Bundeswehr immer mehr Eagles bestellt, nimmt Engeli als Zeichen der Zufriedenheit mit der Qualität. Es sei möglich, dass noch weitere Aufträge kommen. Entsprechende Optionen bestünden bereits.
Deutsche Soldaten nehmen in mehreren internationalen Militäreinsätzen teil. Das mit 4500 Soldaten grösste Kontingent ist in Afghanistan stationiert, wo die Taliban immer offensiver auftreten. Offenbar ist das mit ein Grund für den Bedarf an gepanzerten Fahrzeugen. Der Eagle bietet hohen Schutz vor Minen und einfachen Sprengfallen, wie sie in Afghanistan häufig sind. 70 neue Duros Für die Mowag war der Dezember ein guter Monat. Das Rüstungsprogramm für die Schweizer Armee wurde von den eidgenössischen Räten um zusätzliche 70 Duro-Mannschaftstransporter aufgestockt, die ebenfalls in Kreuzlingen produziert werden. Der Auftrag werde aber erst nächstes Jahr gestellt, sagt Mowag-Vertreter Engeli. Über das Volumen könne daher noch nichts gesagt werden.

description.hltext_display: Louisville tops Southern Miss in Beef 'O' Brady's Bowl
description.author: FRED GOODALL
description.content: ST. PETERSBURG, Fla. - Justin Burke threw for a pair of touchdowns and Jeremy Wright scored on a 95-yard kickoff return Tuesday night to help Louisville beat former Conference USA rival Southern Mississippi 31-28 in the Beef 'O' Brady's Bowl. Burke tossed scoring passes to 11 yards to Cameron Graham and 10 yards to Josh Chichester while the Cardinals (7-6) erased a 14-point first-half deficit, then produced a go-ahead field goal in the fourth quarter. Austin Davis threw 205 yards and two touchdowns to become Southern Mississippi's career TD pass leader, moving ahead of Brett Favre and Lee Roberts in the Golden Eagles record book with 53 in three seasons. The Southern Miss quarterback also scored on a 17-yard reception from receiver Quentin Pierce. Wright's long kickoff return made it 28-all early in the fourth quarter. Chris Philpott's 36-yard field goal gave the Cardinals their first lead with 6:30 remaining. Davis completed 19 of 32 passes, including TD throws of 32 yards to Pierce and 8 yards to Zeke Walters for the Golden Eagles (8-5). In addition to becoming the Southern Miss career TD pass leader, the junior moved into second place on the school's career passing list with 7,396 yards - 299 short of the 7,695 Favre threw for from 1987-90. Meanwhile, Desmond Johnson scored on a 62-yard run and finished with 107 yards rushing. The win enabled Louisville to finish Charlie Strong's first season as a head coach with the Cardinals' first winning record since 2006. Bilal Powell rushed for 75 yards for Louisville - well below his season average of 120.9 - however the 215-pound senior was instrumental in helping the Cardinals exhaust most of the clock after finally taking the lead. Southern Miss scored on its first two possessions, taking a quick 14-0 lead on Pierce's TD reception and Johnson's long run that left Louisville's defense looking sluggish and bewildered. The Cardinals didn't flinch, though, methodically climbing back into the game with help from linebacker Antwone Canady's fumble recovery, which set up Powell's 6-yard touchdown run and enabled Louisville to pull even at 21-all late in the first half. Original Print Headline: Louisville tops Southern Miss BEEF 'O' BRADY's BOWL

description.hltext_display: Retail sector to see 25% fall in Christmas sales
description.content: The arctic weather is adding to the worries of the crippled retail sector, as would-be Christmas shoppers stay at home.The value of sales for 2010 is already expected to be down 25% on figures for 2007.Retailers had been hoping to end the year on a high, but the wintry weather has had a negative impact on expected footfall.Torlach Denihan from Retail Ireland said there is a limited window of opportunity to capitalise on the Christmas market.Mr Denihan said: "We're up against a cut-off at Christmas Eve and things have to happen in terms of Christmas shopping. If it doesn't happen this week, it won't happen at all. That is why it is so, so serious." More breaking news

event_or_fact.property: there is a limited window of opportunity to capitalise on the Christmas market

description.hltext_display: カネカ、塩ビペースト樹脂を増産へ＝１２年末にマレーシアで年６万トンに
description.content:
時事通信社（12月22日 13時57分）
カネカ〈４１１８〉は２２日、壁紙や床材などに使われる塩化ビニールペースト樹脂をマレーシアで増産すると発表した。設備投資額は約３０億円で、２０１２年末にも、生産能力を現在の約３万５０００トンから６万トンに引き上げる。
［時事通信社］

description.hltext_display: Policeman held in sex crime probe
description.content:
A serving Merseyside Police officer has been arrested following allegations he has committed sex crimes.
A force spokeswoman said the 42-year-old from Wirral was arrested earlier this month on suspicion of offences under the Sexual Offences Act.
He was questioned by detectives before being released later the same day on police bail pending further inquiries.
The officer has been suspended while the allegations are investigated, the force said.

description.hltext_display: '5G 그랜저' 세계최초로 4..
description.content:
현대자동차(회장 정몽구)는 신형 그랜저 사전마케팅의 일환으로 3D영화 ‘아바타’ 촬영팀과 손잡고 '5G 그랜저 4D 극장용 광고'를 세계 최초로 선보인다고 밝혔다.'5G 그랜저 4D 극장용 광고'는 최근 각광받고 있는 3D 입체영상에 진동과 바람, 향기 등을 부가해 시청각 외에도 촉각과 후각 등 오감을 자극, 관람자가 실제 그랜저를 직접 운전한다는 가상체험을 제공한다.
또한, 극장 관람석 의자의 진동과 움직임을 통해 차간거리 자동 유지 기술인 ‘어드밴스드 스마트 크루즈 컨트롤(ASCC, Advanced Smart Cruise Control)’을 체험할 수 있도록 했으며, 광고에서 운전자가 썬루프를 열었을 때는 관람석에 바람과 향기를 불어넣어 가상 운전 체험을 극대화하였다.이번 '5G 그랜저 4D 광고'는 극장용 광고로는 동종 업계는 물론 세계최초로 선보이는 것으로 기존의 틀에서 벗어나 획기적이고 차별화된 마케팅을 선보이려는 현대차의 의지가 담겨있다.
특히 이번 광고제작에는 3D영화의 바람을 몰고 온 영화 ‘아바타’ 촬영팀, 2008년 북경올림픽 개막식 영상제작에 참여한 세계적인 첨단영상 제작업체인 ‘Spinifex Group(스피니펙스 그룹)’과 CGV 4Dplex 기술/프로그래밍팀이 함께해 고품질의 완성도 높은 4D영상을 제작했다.
또한 현대차는 극장 광고로는 드물게 대규모 제작비를 투입해 2분 30초 길이의 단편영화급으로 제작해 관람객들에게 본영화 상영전 또 하나의 미니 블록버스터급 영화를 추가로 볼 수 있는 재미를 제공하고 있다.'5G 그랜저 4D 극장용 광고'는 이달 20일(月)부터 CGV 강변, 왕십리, 영등포, 죽전, 부산 센텀시티 등 5개 4D plex를 통해 상영되며, 추후 전국적인 확산을 위해 전국 CGV 90개점 3D상영관에서 ‘5G 그랜저 3D광고’도 상영할 예정이다.
한편 현대차는 CGV극장에서 4D광고를 통해 가상으로 그랜저를 시승해본 고객을 대상으로 추첨을 통해 주말 48시간 동안 ‘5G 그랜저’를 실제로 시승해 볼 수 있는 ‘특별 VIP 시승 이벤트’도 실시할 계획이다.
‘5G 그랜저 특별 VIP 시승이벤트’는 1~2월 중 총 2회에 걸쳐 진행될 예정이며, 시승을 원하는 고객은 4D상영관 고객에 한해 배포되는 시승 초대권 내의 QR코드를 통해 그랜저 모바일 사이트(http://grandeur.hyundai.com)로 접속해 응모할 수 있다.
(대한민국 중심언론 CBS 뉴스FM98.1 / 음악FM93.9 / TV CH 412)저작권자 ⓒ CBS 노컷뉴스( www.nocutnews.co.kr ) 무단전재 및 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: Thousands stranded at Heathrow despite runway opening
description.content: Thousands of passengers are still stranded at London's Heathrow airport, even though the second runway did re-open last night. About two-thirds of flights are expected to get in and out of the airport today but there will be a reduced timetable until at least Friday.At Gatwick there are still some delays but the backlog of flights is gradually clearing.In Scotland, there are delays and cancellations at Edinburgh, Glasgow and Aberdeen airports. More breaking news

description.hltext_display: Veru Wisterovú čakajú prvé Vianoce s manželom
description.content:
Bývalá partnerka frontmana skupiny IMT Smile Ivana Táslera, Vera Wisterová, zažije tento rok celkom špeciálne svatky. Strávi ich totiž ako vydatá pani.
Moderátorka Vera Wisterová v šatách od Hany Převrátilovej.
Autor: ORANGE
Slovenská moderátorka Vera Wisterová, ktorá sa v októbri tajne vydala za jej amerického priateľa Jeremyho, strávi prvé Vianoce ako vydatá žena. Ako uviedla v rozhovore pre agentúru SITA, najkrajšie sviatky roka strávi pravdepodobne v Londýne. Všetko záleží na pracovných povinnostiach jej manžela. "Nechám sa prekvapiť," uviedla. Z varenia ani príprav si však ťažkú hlavu nerobí. "Nechávam to všetko na ňom, aj jedlo," dodala s úsmevom.
Dvojica svoju svadbu starostlivo chránila. Svoje áno si nakoniec zaľúbenci povedali v ďalekom Izraeli, kde bolo pozvaných asi 120 hostí. Ryšavka bola v minulosti známa vzťahom s muzikantom zo skupiny IMT Smile Ivanom Táslerom, s ktorým tvorili zamilovaný pár približne sedem rokov. Rovnako ako Wisterová, novú polovičku má aj hudobník, na svadbu sa zatiaľ neodhodlal.

description.hltext_display: En pocas horas se "volaron" 12 toneladas de carne
description.content:
En la mañana de ayer se vendió gran parte del stock disponible. También se agotaron los números para comprar los 5.000 kilos que quedan. Mañana jueves ya no habrá ventas y el plan regresará el lunes.
Votá(0)
Muchos de los que hicieron cola ayer se quedaron sin número para hoy. (Walter Moreno)
Notas relacionadas
Diana Chiani - dchiani@losandes.com.ar
Se esperaba mucha gente pero lo cierto es que las expectativas fueron largamente superadas.
Por eso, lo que inicialmente se había planteado para tres días se va a agotar en dos. Esta semana, el programa "Carne para todos" -que venderá un total de 17.000 kilos en Guaymallén y Las Heras- funcionará sólo hasta hoy a pesar de que estaba previsto que el 23 también hubiera un camión con carne apostado en las plazas.
La semana que viene, se reeditará la propuesta -en principio- en los mismos lugares de esta semana pero con la intención de que haya menos demoras.
Con los cortes como nalga y paleta a $ 21 y la molida a $ 18, quienes se armaron de paciencia y esperaron un promedio de seis horas para comprar entre cuatro y cinco kilos de carne se fueron satisfechos; aunque la mayoría esperaba a ver y probar la mercadería antes de dar su ok definitivo.
Tanto en la plaza de Las Heras como en la de Guaymallén, ayer se dieron 600 números y para hoy también se anticiparon los turnos para vender los 5.000 kilos que quedan; por lo que el que no tenga ya su número, mejor no se acerque para no perder tiempo, le dijo a Los Andes, el ministro de Desarrollo Humano, Familia y Comunidad, Carlos Ciurca.
En la plaza San José de Guaymallén -por donde pasaron alrededor de 2.500 personas- la cantidad de gente fue tan grande que los organizadores decidieron dar números para las 600 personas que se podían atender ayer y para las 600 que tendrán su oportunidad hoy.
"Preveíamos 1.000 pero han venido 2.500. No vamos a poder estar los tres días por la magnitud de la demanda, pero lo bueno es que se reeditará la semana que viene", advirtió Rafael Moyano, director de Desarrollo Social de Guaymallén, quien agregó que el punto era ideal para que se acercaran vecinos de San Martín, Maipú y Godoy Cruz; como había sucedido.
En la plaza Burgos de Las Heras, en tanto, también se repartieron 600 números y se adelantaron los de hoy, ya que mucha gente se quedó sin nada y amenazaban con enojarse. "Esto es una prueba piloto que se mejorará con el tiempo", apuntó Alberto Serú, director de Desarrollo Social de Las Heras.
Ambas plazas estaban preparadas para recibir la cantidad de gente que llegó con la intención de comprar carne. Baños químicos, agua y las colas distribuidas en la sombra fueron algunas de las precauciones que se tomaron. Sin embargo, la gente de Las Heras afiló los preparativos para obtener el mayor rédito del beneficio de la carne más barata.
La "Carne para todos" fue una movida que agradó a la mayoría aunque las quejas por la demora en la atención no se hicieron esperar y con razón. Es que quienes habían llegado entre las 6 y las 7 de la mañana pudieron obtener su paquete pasadas las 12 del mediodía.
El principal problema fue que había una sola persona encargada de vender, por lo que la gente debía pasar de a una por vez; acrecentando el tiempo de espera de personas de todas las edades, muchas de ellas con niños.
Según la organización, esto sucedió para no hacer lío con la plata ya que había una sola caja. La empresa encargada de la distribución y venta lo prefirió así pero es probable que después de esta primera prueba puedan ajustarse los mecanismos.
"Si la carne es linda, la verdad es que vale le pena", aseguraron Mabel Arriga (Corralitos) y Alicia Bravo (Villa Hipódromo) mientras esperaban su turno. Junto con Porfirio Tordoya -que había llegado a las cinco y media de la mañana- no perdían el buen humor pasadas las 11 y a pleno rayo del sol.
El grupo, que se había conocido mientras esperaba, coincidía con otra señora sentada cerca de allí (Mariela Gil) y proponía que se vendieran otros productos "para todos": pollo, azúcar y leche.
En Guaymallén, muchos de los que esperaban se desilusionaron por el límite que había para la compra. El día anterior, había corrido el rumor de que no habría tope para la cantidad de carne. "El tema es que si no vienen varios de la familia, no te rinde", expresaba María Zuñiga quien -con parte de su familia- había improvisado un picnic en el césped de la plaza San José, mientras esperaba su turno.
En total, cada cliente podía llevar dos bolsas envasadas al vacío del corte que quisiera; lo que significaba entre 4 y 5 kilos. La idea de limitar la cantidad para llevar por persona, fue para que todos pudieran acceder a la carne. "Me parece bien, así es más solidario", afirmaba Marcela Aruani en la cola de Las Heras.
En un principio, tampoco estaba previsto dar números pero fue la mejor forma de ordenar a la gente que llegó ávida de conseguir carne a un precio razonable. Si el producto era bueno, muchos estaban tentados de volver la semana próxima. Sin embargo -coincidieron las hermanas Lucía y Elba Álvarez, que alivianaron la espera a puro mate- "hay que ver quién puede tener la plata para volver". Por compra, se gastaba entre $ 100 y $ 120.

description.hltext_display: Rolex Watches: Melrose Jewelers Announces Its Last Chance Christmas Sale on Select Rolex Watches
description.content:
Melrose Jewelers: Melrose Jewelers, USA's #1 Online Rolex Watch Retailer, Announces Its Last Chance Christmas Promotional Sale on a Variety of Rolex Watches
SAN FRANCISCO, CA--(Marketwire - December 22, 2010) - Melrose Jewelers (MelroseJewelers.com), USA's #1 online Rolex watch retailer, today announced its Last Chance Christmas Sale on select Rolex watches. Melrose Jewelers is offering up to $200 off select Rolex Datejust watches, and up to $500 off select Rolex President watches in honor of the yearly holiday. The Christmas sale is going on now at http://www.melrosejewelers.com.
Since their inception, Rolex watches have been designed to last forever. In fact, it is quality and timelessness that have been and will be the hallmark of Rolex for years to come. In keeping with the Rolex tradition, there are few better ways to show your appreciation for a loved one than to bestow upon them a gift that will truly last forever.
In fact, AskMen.com ranks wristwatches #1 on their Top 10 List for the best Christmas gift ideas. Since a Rolex is the best watch available, and a wristwatch is the best Christmas gift idea, then buying a Rolex for that special friend or family member is a no-brainer. Furthermore, Melrose Jewelers makes this purchase affordable by selling completely authentic and fully restored pre-owned Rolex watches with a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee and a full authentication and appraisal by the Associated International Gemological Laboratory.
The Top Five Best Selling Melrose Jewelers on sale watch models are the: (Simply visit MelroseJewelers.com and enter the 3 digit code below into the search box)
1) Men's Silver Dial Beadset Bezel Rolex Datejust Super President (923)
2) Men's Champagne Dial Rolex Day Date President (292)
3) Men's Stainless Steel Black Dial Fluted Bezel Rolex Datejust (322)
4) Ladies Champagne Dial Rolex Super President (404)
5) Ladies' Stainless Steel Silver Dial Beadset Bezel Rolex Datejust (601)
The Christmas promotions on the Men's and Ladies Rolex watches include special discounts on the Men's and Ladies Stainless Steel Rolex Datejust and Two-Tone Rolex Datejust watches as well as the Men's Rolex Day Date President and Mens Rolex Day Date Super President watches. The sale is exclusive to Christmas and will only last for a limited time. Purchasing a watch from Melrose Jewelers also entitles you to free overnight shipping via FedEx to ensure that you have the watch in time for Christmas. Purchase a Rolex today in order to give a gift that will last a lifetime. Melrose Jewelers is the nation's leading online retailer of Rolex wrist watches including mens watches and ladies luxury watches and its associates have, collectively, over 220 years of experience in importing, restoring, and retailing Rolex watches and other luxury watches. Melrose Jewelers was founded with one simple premise: Buying Rolex watches or other luxury watches shouldn't be mysterious or complicated. Similar to the innovative yet simple business models of Progressive Insurance, CarMax, or Blue Nile, Melrose Jewelers provides customers with low, no-haggle pricing, luxury Rolex watches that are either new and unworn or pre owned and restored to original factory specifications both inside and outside, and a comprehensive 2-year warranty. Melrose Jewelers also employs a staff of top university-educated Trained Experts that provide customer service that extends from your initial sales call until years after you've received your purchase. Melrose Jewelers is a proud member of the Jeweler's Vigilance Committee, the Manufacturers and Jewelers Association of America, the International Watch & Jewelry Guild, the National Association of Watch Collectors, and the California Sheriff's Association. Melrose Jewelers uses only Conflict-Free Diamonds and those imported through the Kimberley Process as signed into act by U.S. Congress in 2003. Melrose Jewelers is not an authorized agent or affiliated with Rolex Watches, Rolex USA, Rolex S.A., Rolex International, Breitling, or Patek Philippe luxury watches. Rolex Day Date, Rolex President, Rolex GMT Master, Rolex Daytona, Rolex Oyster Perpetual Datejust, Rolex PearlMaster, Rolex Masterpiece, Rolex Super President, Rolex Submariner, Rolex Yacht-Master, Rolex Explorer and Rolex Sea Dweller are all trademarks of Rolex S.A. Melrose Jewelers' watches contain custom, aftermarket diamonds which will void the warranty of new Rolex watches. Melrose Jewelers warranties its watches directly and Rolex S.A. has no obligation to warranty any watches sold by Melrose Jewelers.
Melrose Jewelers, the leading online retailer of the Ladies Rolex President, also hosts the Melrose Jewelers (MJ) Rolex Watch Blog. The MJ Rolex Watches Blog is the world's largest independent forum website about Rolex events and Rolex and other luxury watches in pop culture. With over 300 user-posted articles and new articles and commentary updated daily, the Melrose Jewelers Rolex watches blog contains articles about Rolex watches owned and popularized by Barack Obama, Warren Buffett, Steve Jobs, Cristiano Ronaldo, Sienna Miller, Sean Penn, Courtney Cox, Andy Roddick, LeBron James, Tara Reid, Danica Patrick, Matthew McConaughey, Steven Wynn, Calvin Klein, Jamie Lynn Sigler, Eva Longoria Parker, Tobey Maguire, Michael Dell, Ashton Kutcher, the Jonas Brothers, Rafael Nadal, Roger Federer, Colt McCoy, Sam Bradford, who is an avid fan of the Rolex Daytona Adriana Lima, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Bill Murray, Barry White, Anne Hathaway, Michael Jackson, Tony Soprano, Lindsay Lohan, Eddie Murphy, Anish Kapoor, Tom Selleck, Jennifer Garner, Donald Trump, Jennifer Lopez, Lance Armstrong, John Mayer, Cameron Diaz, Justin Timberlake, Brad Pitt, Drew Barrymore, Matt Lauer, Sophie Marceau, Tim Tebow, Jay-Z, Zara Phillips, O.J. Simpson, Madonna, Ana Ivanovic, Jennifer Aniston, Paris Hilton, Orlando Bloom, Tupac Shakur, Cuba Gooding Jr, Lily Allen, & Wiley. Blog postings on the MJ Rolex Watch Blog are submitted by independent Rolex enthusiasts and not by Melrose Jewelers.
Interested customers and media can visit Melrose Jewelers to find out about the Rolex Watch Band, plus items including: Melrose Jewelers Reviews , Melrose Jewelers Rolex Watch Blog , Melrose Jewelers Rolex , Melrose Jewelers Rolex Watch , Melrose Jewelers Store , Melrose Jewelers Rolex Watch Store , Melrose Jewelers Watches , Melrose Jewelers Watch, Melrose Jewelers press release and Melrose Jewelers address as well as about regional stores including Melrose Jewelers Los Angeles , Melrose Jewelers California , Melrose Jewelers USA , Melrose Jewelers U.K., which is the leading seller of the Rolex Submariner, Melrose Jewelers Mexico , Melrose Jewelers Australia , Melrose Jewelers Japan , Melrose Jewelers UAE and Melrose Canada.

description.hltext_display: ジェイコムウエスト、５年以内の既卒者を採用＝地域採用を強化
description.content:
時事通信社（12月22日 14時04分）
ケーブルテレビ最大手ジュピターテレコム（ＪＣＯＭ）〈４８１７〉グループのジェイコムウエスト（大阪市）は２２日、２００５年３月から１０年３月までに大学や大学院を卒業した既卒者に対して採用活動を行うと発表した。募集するのは、関西地域の営業職で３５〜４０人程度を採用する予定。地域に密着した人材を確保する狙い。
［時事通信社］

description.hltext_display: Metro Bandung : Para Ibu Terkejut Terima Buah Tangan
description.content:
BANDUNG, TRIBUN - Manajemen Grand Hotel Preanger, punya cara sendiri memberi penghargaan kepada para ibu yang menginap di hotel di Jalan Asia Afrika ini, bertepatan dengan Peringatan Hari Ibu, 22 Desember 2010.
Ayunda dan Dara, dari Marketing Communication Grand Hotel Preanger, pelan-pelan menghampiri beberapa ibu yang sedang menikmati sarapan mereka di Preanger Restaurant. Kemudian membagikan buah tangan kepada para ibu.
Tentu saja para ibu ada yang terkejut. Terutama kaum wanita yang berasal dari mancanegara. "Setelah dijelaskan bahwa pemberian buah tangan merupakan bentuk apresiasi terhadap para ibu yang tak kenal lelah memberikan kasih sayang kepada keluarga, barulah mereka bisa tersenyum lepas," kata Ayunda. Pemberian buah tangan kepada para ibu yang menginap di Grand Hotel Preanger pada Hari Ibu, sudah menjadi agenda rutin manajemen. Kegiatan ini merupakan simbol penghargaan kepada para ibu di seluruh dunia. (rry)

description.hltext_display: トヨタ、小型車ヴィッツを全面改良＝燃費２６．５キロ、車体色充実
description.content:
時事通信社（12月22日 14時31分）
トヨタ自動車〈７２０３〉は２２日、主力小型車「ヴィッツ」（排気量１０００ｃｃ、１３００ｃｃ、１５００ｃｃ）を全面改良し、発売した。従来型より車体を２０キロ軽量化。信号待ちなどでエンジンを自動的に止めるアイドリングストップ機能を搭載したタイプでは、ガソリン１リットル当たりの走行距離が最高２６．５キロと、ハイブリッド車に迫る低燃費を実現した。
［時事通信社］

description.hltext_display: 닛산 고객 응대 컨테스트 개최…여..
description.content:
[뉴스핌=김한용기자] 한국닛산(대표 켄지 나이토)은 전체 닛산 세일즈 컨설턴트를 대상으로 실시한 2010 닛산 고객 응대 컨테스트에서 딜러 강남JJ모터스의 이숙진대리를 올해의 세일즈 컨설턴트로 선정했다고 밝혔다. 지난 10월부터 약 2개월에 걸쳐 전국 6개 전시장, 총 100여명의 세일즈 컨설턴트 전원이 예선에 참가했으며, 현장에서 고객을 맞이하는 준비 과정부터 응대과정, 사후관리까지 총 3단계 6개 항목을 심사해 최고점자를 가리는 방식으로 진행됐다. 최종 결선은 각 전시장을 대표해 최고점을 받은 6명의 컨설턴트들이 모인 가운데, 참가자 별로 40분씩 총 6시간에 걸쳐 치열한 경합을 벌이며 진행됐다. 특히, 전시장에서 고객을 응대하는 실제 상황을 시나리오로 구성해 고객 응대 태도와 자사 및 경쟁사 브랜드 제품에 대한 전문 지식, 고객 상담에 대한 전문성까지 평가했다. 여기에 공정성을 높이기 위해 콘테스트 시작까지 평가 대상 차종이 공개되지 않은 상태에서 제품 교육전문가가 고객 역할로 참여해 전문성을 검증했다. 우승을 차지한 강남 JJ 모터스 이숙진 대리는 고객 한 분 한 분의 라이프 스타일까지 이해하며 관리하려 노력하고 있다며 앞으로도 내 가족을 위한 차를 직접 구매한다는 마음으로, 발 빠르게 니즈를 파악하고 이에 부합하기 위한 최고의 서비스 제공할 것이라고 수상 소감을 밝혔다. 닛산 브랜드 세일즈렇뗑??총괄 엄진환 이사는 차량의 품질뿐만 아니라 서비스 및 사후 관리에 대한 고객 분들의 기대수준이 점점 높아져, 세일즈 컨설턴트들의 적극적인 태도와 세밀한 정보제공을 권장하고 있다고 밝혔다. 한편, 강남 JJ 모터스 이숙진 대리, 한미 오토모티브 인천 전시장 나길준 주임, 한미 오토모티브 서초 전시장 조성원 팀장이 각각 2,3위를 차지했다. ▶ 글로벌 투자시대의 프리미엄 마켓정보 뉴스핌 골드 클럽 ▶ 뉴스핌 Zero쿠폰 탄생! 명품증권방송 최저가 + 주식매매수수료 무료[뉴스핌 Newspim]김한용 기자 (whynot@newspim.com)
- Copyrights ⓒ 뉴스핌 & Newspim.com, 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지 - 김한용(기자) whynot@newspim.com

description.hltext_display: Could I Still Be HIV Negative, Even if My Partner Is Positive?
description.content:
My partner is a bottom only, when he and I met we dated for a few months then had sex. We never talked about HIV or any other diseases, I was surprised when he wanted me to enter him without a condo, we continue to have unprotected anal sex. I have wanted to bring up and ask him if he is aware of his HIV status, but have not, for fear he will think I dont trust him. We recently applied for life insurence and I was offered a policy and he was denied. Is it possible that he has HIV and I have not become HIV even though we have unprotected sex?
Hi,
He wanted you to enter him without a "condo"? Well, of course he didn't want you to shove a whole condominium up his butt. Silly boy.
As for having unprotected sex, this is always risky business. As I have repeatedly warned, we must consider all our sexual partners could be HIV infected and therefore take all the necessary precautions to prevent spread of HIV.
It's time you and bottom-boy had "the talk." It's long overdue. This is not a question of "trust," but rather a question of "health"!
Is it possible your partner is positively charged and you have not (yet) acquired the virus, despite being Brokeback Mountain buddies and having unsafe sex? Yes, it's possible. Not every HIV exposure leads to HIV infection (thankfully).
My advice is simple:
1. No more unsafe sex!
2. Discuss HIV status.
3. If your partner is virally enhanced, you'll need HIV testing at both the three- and six-month marks from the date of last exposure (unsafe sex).
Good luck!

description.hltext_display: India reports successful missile test
description.content: India successfully tested a short-range, nuclear-capable missile with a range of 220 miles today, an official said.The army twice fired the surface-to-surface missile Prithvi II from a range in Chandipur in the eastern state of Orissa, said SP Dash, a senior official at the range."The test was successful," the official said.The missile, which would target mainly military installations, can carry a warhead weighing up to 1,100lb (500kg), he said.It has already been tested more than half a dozen times. However, a test of the same missile three months ago failed due to technical problems.India and long-time rival Pakistan routinely test-fire missiles, and usually notify each other ahead of the launches.New Delhi has said it developed its current crop of missiles - including the short-range Prithvi, the anti-tank Nag and the supersonic BrahMos - as a deterrent against neighbours China and Pakistan.India's Agni-II missile, with a range of up to 1,250 miles, can put areas of southern China within striking distance. And the Agni-III, successfully tested last year, can carry nuclear warheads across much of Asia and the Middle East. More breaking news

event_or_fact.property: The missile, which would target mainly military installations, can carry a warhead weighing up to 1,100lb (500kg)

description.hltext_display: Metro Bandung : Ambil Dari ATM, Uangnya Malah Tak Laku
description.content:
BANDUNG,TRIBUN - Azat Sudrajat (24) mengaku kesal dan kecewa saat akan membayar belanjaan di beberapa super market karena ditolak oleh kasir. "Saya belanja ke beberapa mini market dan toko pakaian, ketika akan menyerahkan uang, kasir selalu bilang uangnya sudah tak laku," ujar Azat, Rabu (22/12).
Uang satu lembar Rp 100 ribu milik Azat, warga Sadang Margahayu Kopo Kabupaten Bandung ini ditolak kasir bukan karena palsu tapi seratus ribu tersebut adalah uang edisi bergambar proklamator RI, Soekarno-Hatta. "Saya heran kenapa tidak laku, padahal uangnya baru ngambil dari ATM BNI yang ada di Yogya Pasaraya Jalan Kepatihan, Senin (20/12). Saya ngambil Rp 200 ribu, satu lembarnya uang plastik ini," ujar Azat sambil memperlihatkan uang dan bukti struk pengambilan.
Azat mengaku sempat kaget ketika mengambil uang, masih ada uang Rp 100 ribu plastik. Namun ia tak memikirkan hal itu dan percaya masih berlaku karena keluar dari ATM bank ternama. "Tetapi ternyata malah ditolak kasir," ujar Azat. Azat merasa kecewa karena baginya uang Rp 100 ribu sangat berarti untuk biaya hidup sehari-hari. "Saya ingin uang diganti dengan uang yang masih berlalu, kenapa bank menyediakan uang yang sudah tak berlaku di ATM," ujar Azat. (tsm)

description.hltext_display: Ahora dicen que es la alta demanda la que hace colapsar a los cajeros
description.content:
Desde el Banco Central aseguran que hay suficientes billetes en circulación y que la situación tiende a normalizarse.
Votá(0)
En el Banco Central aseguran que con la llegada de papeles desde Brasil, el dinero circulante es suficiente.
Notas relacionadas
Gabriela Balls - gballs@losandes.com.ar
La reposición continua de billetes ha ido mejorando la disponibilidad de dinero en los cajeros automáticos de Mendoza y, según explicaron los funcionarios del Tesoro del banco Nación, se espera que en los próximos días la situación se normalice.
Aún así, hay algunos factores como la inflación, el aumento exponencial en la demanda de dinero por los aguinaldos y aquel dinero "deteriorado" que sacan del sistema, que siguen influyendo de alguna manera en la merma y faltante en los cajeros.
A estos factores se sumó el rumor de que los billetes importados de Brasil -de $ 100 clase S- son más pequeños que los usados hasta el momento y que los cajeros automáticos no los podían expender. Sin embargo, el subtesorero del Tesoro del banco Nación, Mario Giampaoletti, explicó que "no hay variaciones y que los cajeros automáticos están funcionando con estos billetes de clase S sin ningún problema".
Además este funcionario aclaró que "no hay en Mendoza faltante de dinero" y que desde el banco Central les envían partidas de billetes todos los días. Asimismo, reafirmando esta situación sostuvo que con las partidas de la semana pasada se pagaron los aguinaldos de diciembre de la gente.
Aunque comentó que normalmente el banco Nación reparte y repone dinero líquido a unas pocas sucursales por día, y en este momento de colapso, "deben hacerlo todos los días con casi todas las dependencias bancarias". Pero aún así, dejó claro que la situación se normalizará como máximo en una semana.
Por su parte, el secretario adjunto de La Bancaria, Rubén Pollichino subrayó que está llegando dinero a Mendoza todos los días desde el banco Central. Aunque manifestó que la inflación y el poco rendimiento del dinero es una de las causas principales del faltante en los cajeros.
"Los billetes de $ 100 han perdido el valor, ahora se usan y no rinden para hacer compras, por lo que se usan más", dijo Pollichino, quien además declaró que "se desaparecen de las manos".
El secretario de La Bancaria explicó que "el stock promedio de billetes físicos ha disminuido" y que por ello el banco Central llamó a la licitación internacional de billetes, que se realizó en la Casa de la Moneda de Brasil, para bajar costos en la elaboración del papel.
Según una consulta de Los Andes a varios ejecutivos de bancos de Mendoza, coincidían en que la situación estaría normalizándose en estos días y la reposición entraba en la normalidad.
Legitimidad asegurada
Este operativo de fabricar en Brasil los nuevos papeles serie S, se debe a la reposición necesaria que hace el banco Central ante los billetes que están quemando o que tienen roturas de hasta un 40% del papel.
El tesorero del banco Nación, Juan Carlos Solar, explicó que "es obligación de todos los bancos del país, sin importar la firma, retener y reponer con un billete nuevo aquel que tenga desperfectos". Esta recomendación es para todos los ciudadanos que creen que sólo el banco Nación es el responsable de esta acción y que según recalcó Solar "todos los bancos del país deben hacerlo".
Asimismo, Los Andes presenció una prueba sobre la validez de los billetes y según explicó desde el banco Nación, Rita Ledantés, "es imposible que en los cajeros exista dinero falso, en el Tesoro con una máquina especial ?se prueba cada billete' que será entregado a los cajeros automáticos de la provincia".
"Aquellos billetes que tienen desperfectos o no son válidos se sacan del sistema antes de entrar en el sistema bancario", explicó la jefa de Cajeros Automáticos del banco Nación.

description.hltext_display: Sturm activated by Kings
description.content:
Marco Sturm #16 of the Boston Bruins shoots the puck against the Buffalo Sabres in Game Five of the Eastern Conference Quarterfinals during the 2010 NHL Stanley Cup Playoffs at HSBC Arena on April 23, 2010 in Buffalo, New York. (Bill Wippert, NHLI via )
Updated: 12/21 3:37 pm
The Los Angeles Kings activated forward Marco Sturm from the non-roster injured list on Tuesday.
Sturm, 32, has yet to play a game this season as he began the campaign on injured reserve after having surgery to repair MCL and ACL injuries to his right knee suffered in Game 1 of last year's Eastern Conference Semifinals against Philadelphia.
He is expected to make his season and Los Angeles debut when the Kings take on the Colorado Avalanche at Pepsi Center in Denver.
The native of Germany was acquired by the Kings on December 11 from Boston for future considerations, and over 302 games with the Bruins he totaled 106 goals and 87 assists. In 855 games over 12 seasons with San Jose and Boston, he has amassed 234 goals and 232 assists.
©2010 Sports Network. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.

description.hltext_display: Cobleskill no match for Lansingburgh in Colonial boys basketball
description.content:
Sajae Pryor drives to the basket against Cobleskill-Richmondville Sean Thaxter during Tuesday's Colonial Council game at Lansingburgh.(Mike McMahon/The Record)
TROY — The defensive philosophy has changed and one big piece has moved on, but the results continue to be quite familiar for the Lansingburgh High School boys basketball team as the 2010-11 season begins to take shape.
With 6-foot-10 center and resident intimidator Tyler Hammett having graduated to the college ranks, the Knights have altered their defensive scheme from zone to man-to-man this season. While the adjustment has been somewhat of a work in progress, Lansingburgh has managed to continue its winning ways.
The Knights, who advanced to the Section II Class A final last season, were in cruise control Tuesday night, using a balanced attack and a solid defensive effort to post a 64-46 Colonial Council victory over Cobleskill-Richmondville. Senior guard Salaam Knight paced Lansingburgh (5-0 Colonial, 6-1 overall) with 17 points, 10 rebounds, three assists and three steals. The Knights also received 13 points and seven boards from junior guard Ohmeire Jones.
“It’s certainly a different look than what we featured when we had Tyler at the back of that zone,” Lansingburgh head coach Guy DiBacco said of Hammett, who is now playing at Division II Molloy College. “We had a big safety net back there who averaged 12 boards and five or six blocks a game. Now, we rely more on our guards to get turnovers and get out in transition. We’re not where we want to be yet, but we’re getting there.”
The Knights were never seriously threatened by the Bulldogs (1-4, 1-5). Although they played sluggish for most of the first half, Lansingburgh held Cobleskill to just five field goals in the first two quarters en route to building a 27-15 halftime lead.
With leading scorer Sajae Pryor spending all but 16 seconds of the third quarter on the bench with foul trouble, the Knights turned to Knight, who scored eight of his 17 points in the period to push Lansingburgh’s lead to 49-27 through three quarters.
“I had to step up and get us going a bit,” Knight said. “Sajae is our big scorer, but I am confident I can put up points for us when we need them and my teammates have confidence in me that I will get the job done. This wasn’t our best, but we got the win.”
Knight admitted his team has been a bit slow in grasping the new defensive principals.
“We’ve got to be much more aggressive if we are going to reach our potential. We have only played well in spurts,” he said. “We have the talent and the quickness with our guards to be a really good defensive team, but we have played down to some of our opponents so far this season. We need to have a much more aggressive and attacking mentality. We’ll get there.”
Pryor, who entered Tuesday averaging 24 points per game, was held to just nine against the Bulldogs. He was charged with his third foul and headed to the bench with the Knights leading 18-11 with 5:25 to play in the first half. Pryor sat the remainder of the half and then picked up his fourth foul only 16 seconds into the third quarter. He made a cameo appearance in the fourth quarter before DiBacco cleared his bench. Continued...
Reader Comments »
View reader comments (0) » Comment on this story »
Pryor’s absence was of no consequence, however, as Lansingburgh had little trouble putting Cobleskill away. The one bright spot for the Bulldogs was eighth-grader Bryce Allen, who poured in a game-high 20 points.
“He was was pretty hard to handle tonight and he’s going to be really hard to handle for years to come,” DiBacco said of Allen. “He’s going to be pretty special.”

For The Record
TROY — The defensive philosophy has changed and one big piece has moved on, but the results continue to be quite familiar for the Lansingburgh High School boys basketball team as the 2010-11 season begins to take shape.
With 6-foot-10 center and resident intimidator Tyler Hammett having graduated to the college ranks, the Knights have altered their defensive scheme from zone to man-to-man this season. While the adjustment has been somewhat of a work in progress, Lansingburgh has managed to continue its winning ways.
The Knights, who advanced to the Section II Class A final last season, were in cruise control Tuesday night, using a balanced attack and a solid defensive effort to post a 64-46 Colonial Council victory over Cobleskill-Richmondville. Senior guard Salaam Knight paced Lansingburgh (5-0 Colonial, 6-1 overall) with 17 points, 10 rebounds, three assists and three steals. The Knights also received 13 points and seven boards from junior guard Ohmeire Jones.

Now, we rely more on our guards to get turnovers and get out in transition. We’re not where we want to be yet, but we’re getting there.”
The Knights were never seriously threatened by the Bulldogs (1-4, 1-5). Although they played sluggish for most of the first half, Lansingburgh held Cobleskill to just five field goals in the first two quarters en route to building a 27-15 halftime lead.
With leading scorer Sajae Pryor spending all but 16 seconds of the third quarter on the bench with foul trouble, the Knights turned to Knight, who scored eight of his 17 points in the period to push Lansingburgh’s lead to 49-27 through three quarters.
“I had to step up and get us going a bit,” Knight said. “Sajae is our big scorer, but I am confident I can put up points for us when we need them and my teammates have confidence in me that I will get the job done. This wasn’t our best, but we got the win.”
Knight admitted his team has been a bit slow in grasping the new defensive principals.
“We’ve got to be much more aggressive if we are going to reach our potential. We have only played well in spurts,” he said. “We have the talent and the quickness with our guards to be a really good defensive team, but we have played down to some of our opponents so far this season. We need to have a much more aggressive and attacking mentality. We’ll get there.”
Pryor, who entered Tuesday averaging 24 points per game, was held to just nine against the Bulldogs. He was charged with his third foul and headed to the bench with the Knights leading 18-11 with 5:25 to play in the first half. Pryor sat the remainder of the half and then picked up his fourth foul only 16 seconds into the third quarter. He made a cameo appearance in the fourth quarter before DiBacco cleared his bench.
Pryor’s absence was of no consequence, however, as Lansingburgh had little trouble putting Cobleskill away. The one bright spot for the Bulldogs was eighth-grader Bryce Allen, who poured in a game-high 20 points.
“He was was pretty hard to handle tonight and he’s going to be really hard to handle for years to come,” DiBacco said of Allen. “He’s going to be pretty special.”

description.content:

description.hltext_display: 포스코-출자사, 이웃돕기 성금 100..
description.content:
[EBN산업뉴스 김민철 기자]포스코는 22일 연말 이웃돕기 성금 100억 원을 사회복지공동모금회에 전달했다고 밝혔다.
이 성금은 포스코 80억 원, 포스코건설 10억 원, 포스코파워 5억 원, 포스코특수강 3억원, 포스코켐텍이 2억원을 출연해 조성했다.
포스코는 소외된 이웃을 돕고 상호신뢰 속에 함께 성장?발전하는 사회분위기 조성에 앞장서고자 매년 이웃돕기 성금을 기탁해오고 있다.
이날 정준양 회장을 대신해 성금을 전달한 최종태 사장은 “포스코는 국내 최초로 자회사형 장애인 표준사업장인 포스위드를 비롯해 포스에코하우징? 포스플레이트?송도에스이 등 사회적기업을 설립, 운영하고 있고 포스코 미소금융재단을 통해 소외계층의 자립을 지원하고 있다”고 말했다.
또한 “앞으로도 나눔과 봉사를 실천하는 좋은 기업이 되도록 더욱 노력하겠다”고 설명했다.
한편 포스코는 지난해 포항과 광양, 서울에 포스코패밀리봉사단을 창단한 데 이어 올해에는 인천봉사단을 발대해 지역사회에서 다양한 봉사활동을 펼치고 있다.
또한 지난 6월에는‘포스코패밀리 글로벌 볼런티어 위크(POSCO Family Global Volunteer Week)’를 통해 19개국 4만5천여 명의 포스코패밀리 임직원이 글로벌 봉사활동을 전개하기도 했다./김민철 기자
☞ 포스코 가격 동결 ´의미와 전망´
