description.hltext_display: Фигурантами дела о событиях в Минске стали шесть экс-кандидатов в президенты
description.content: Белорусский правозащитный центр «Весна» в среду опубликовал список из 17 подозреваемых в организации и участии в массовых беспорядках в Минске в ночь на понедельник, в котором – шесть из девяти альтернативных кандидатов в президенты страны, а также руководство избирательных штабов некоторых из них. «На сегодняшний день правозащитниками отслеживаются уголовные дела, возбужденные перед и после проведения акции протеста по результатам президентских выборов. По делу о массовых беспорядках на сегодняшний день известно, что подозреваемыми являются 17 человек. Три человека, задержанные превентивно, подозреваются в особо злостном хулиганстве», говорится в сообщении центра, опубликованном на его официальном сайте . Согласно центру «Весна», список подозреваемых по уголовному делу по статье 293 УК Белоруссии (массовые беспорядки, до 15 лет лишения свободы) выглядит следующим образом: Некляев Владимир – кандидат в президенты Санников Андрей – кандидат в президенты Костусев Григорий – кандидат в президенты Атрощенков Александр – пресс-секретарь предвыборного штаба Андрея Санникова Михалевич Алексей – кандидат в президенты Рымашевский Виталий – кандидат в президенты Северинец Павел – доверенное лицо кандидата Виталия Рымашевского Бондаренко Дмитрий – координатор гражданской кампании «Европейская Беларусь» Халип Ирина – журналистка, супруга Андрея Санникова Радина Наталья – журналистка, редактор интернет-сайта charter97.org Лебедько Анатолий - председатель Объединенной гражданской партии Положанко Анастасия – заместитель председателя «Молодого Фронта» Дмитриев Андрей – руководитель предвыборного штаба Владимира Некляева Федута Александр – политолог, один из координаторов предвыборного штаба В. Некляева Статкевич Николай – кандидат в президенты Класковский Александр – бывший сотрудник милиции Кобец Владимир – руководитель предвыборного штаба Андрея Санникова Закладки:

description.hltext_display: 姫路に「今里焼きそば」専門店－大阪の有名店からのれん分け
description.content:
姫路市船場に12月3日、今里焼きそばの専門店「焼きそば 今里」（姫路市元町、TEL 079-291-3737）がオープンした。
「今里焼きそば」は、今里商店街（大阪市東成区）で評判だったご当地焼きそば。1990年ごろに一度消滅してしまったが、長谷川秀次さんが当時の味を忠実に再現し、1995年に今里焼きそばの専門店として「焼きそば 長谷川」を地元で開いた。その味にほれ込んで毎日のように通っていたという同店店主の真田さんがのれん分けを申し出て修業を積み、今回のオープンにこぎ着けた。真田さんは「車で30分かけて通っていた。1日に2回食べに行くこともあった」と振り返る。
店舗面積は約15坪で、席数はカウンター12席。
麺は「うどん？」と思わせるような極太麺で、具は、牛肉とタマネギの2種類のみ。だしをかけてカリッと焼き上げた麺に後から特製ソースをかけて食べるのが特徴。メニューは、並（470円）、大（570円）、特大（670円）の3種類で、ニラや卵のトッピング、だし巻き（250円）、おでん（100円～）も用意する。
どこか懐かしい味の今里焼きそばを多くの人に広めていきたい」と真田さん。「今後は出前にも対応していく」とも。
営業時間は11時30分～14時、17時30分～23時。火曜定休。
姫路で「世界のマッチデザイン展」－デザインコンペも（姫路経済新聞）しょうゆラーメンによく合うキムチ－姫路「らーめん八角」がキムチを商品化（姫路経済新聞）姫路でハンドメード作家32組の企画展－作家の作品が当たる抽選会も（姫路経済新聞）今里焼きそば（関連画像）

description.hltext_display: Japan belässt Leitzins bei nahezu Null
description.author: EMFIS
description.content:
(www.emfis.com) Wie im Vorfeld bereits erwartet wurde, bleiben in Japan die Zinsen unverändert niedrig. Die Vertreter der Notenbank teilten am Dienstag mit bleibe wie bisher bei 0,0 bis 0,1 Prozent. Die japanische Wirtschaft zeige zwar weiterhin "Anzeichen einer moderaten Erholung, aber die Erholung scheint zu pausieren”, heißt es in einer Erklärung der Notenbank.
Des Weiteren teilte der geldpolitische Rat der Notenbank mit, man werde auch in Zukunft zur Stützung des Marktes bestimmte Wertpapiere aufkaufen und dafür die Fonds der Bank of Japan mit einem Volumen von 35 Bio. Yen (418 Mio. USD) nutzen. Die Währungshüter betonten erneut, den Leitzins so lange nahe Null zu lassen, bis die Deflationsgefahren überwunden sind.

The importantmatter to rememberhereis the fact thatthere is certainly a powerful impediment with your way amongst the mail server and theprospectiveconsumer and that impediment is known as the spam filter. If they do concur then, they wouldreceive emails, which would have to be unmarked as spam so that the mails from this address would never be considered as spam. This might bemore verified by sending a confirmation mail.Free HTML e-mail templates really are aexcellent and cost effectivetechnique todeliver bulk email and when combinedwith thea lot more streamlined operation of working with campaign program can go a long way in boosting the amount ofachievable conversions. It is alsocriticalthat youclean your databases of addresses which have not proven any positive activity for a while as that you arebetter off not investingextrasources on them in terms of bandwidth costs.

description.hltext_display: Fino a quale età si crede ancora a Babbo Natale?
description.content:
In un sondaggio, che ha coinvolto centinaia di genitori che hanno risposto da tutta Italia è stato chiesto fino a quale età avessero creduto a Babbo Natale. La media delle risposte è di 7 anni. Le risposte sono state quasi tutte intorno alla media con un minimo di 4 anni e un massimo di 9. Ma chi è stato il cattivone, chi ha fatto la spia rivelando la vera identità di Babbo Natale?
Inserito da lizard3 il giorno 22/12/2010 alle 9.23 - Voti: 2 - Commenti: 0

description.hltext_display: Suspendidas por mal tiempo las conexiones por catamarán y la flota pesquera se queda amarrada a puerto
description.content: El Consorcio de Transportes de la Bahía de Cádiz ha informado de que las conexiones marítimas por catamarán entre las localidades de Cádiz, El Puerto de Santa María y Rota continúan suspendidas a causa del mal tiempo, motivo por el que la flota pesquera tampoco ha salido este miércoles a faenar.

description.hltext_display: [새로 나왔어요]BAT 코리아 `던힐 ..
description.content:
[이데일리 김대웅 기자] ◇ BAT 코리아는 프리미엄 킹사이즈 수퍼슬림 담배인 `던힐 나노컷 1mg` 를 출시했다.
던힐 나노컷은 지난 4월 나노컷 4mg이 국내 시장에 선보인 이후 8개월 만에 1mg으로 제품 라인업을 강화하게 됐다.
이번 출시되는 `던힐 나노컷 1mg`는 비스듬하게 컷팅된 모서리와 올록볼록하게 작은 도트무늬를 새긴 크림색 패키지로 고급스러우면서도 스타일리시한 제품의 속성을 표현했다. 가격은 갑당 2500원.
◇ 녹십초는 아마존 프로젝트 성분 및 NK153 생명에너지를 함유한 `아마존 관젤 크림` 을 발매했다.
녹십초 한방병원의 NK153 생명에너지 응용 공법으로 제조한 이 제품은 콜라겐을 함유해 혈액순환 강화와 신진대사 촉진에 도움을 주는 마사지용 크림 제품이다.
아사이베리추출물과 까무까무추출물 등 아마존 천연 원료에 저온발효공법을 적용하고, 리포좀화해 피부 깊숙히 빠르게 침투하는 것이 특징이다. 회사 관계자는 "아마존 원주민들로부터 오랫동안 사랑받아 온 비법을 현대 과학으로 승화시킨 제품"이라고 설명했다. ◇ 롯데칠성음료는 커피전문점 엔제리너스커피의 `카라멜 마키아토` 와 `에스프레소 라떼` 를 출시했다.
정통 이탈리안 스타일 에스프레소 커피와 최상급 1A등급 우유가 들어있는 두 제품은 정통 에스프레소의 부드럽고 깊은 맛에 신선한 향기가 살아 있고 풍부한 최상급 우유가 부드러움을 더해주는 것이 특징이다.
또 `카라멜 마키아토`는 향긋한 카라멜시럽의 진하고 달콤한 맛이 더해지고, `에스프레소 라떼`는 커피와 우유함량이 조금 더 많아 커피전문점에서 즐기던 그 맛 그대로 즐길 수 있다.
신제품의 가장 큰 특징은 230ml의 용량에 엔제리너스커피 RTD제품으로는 처음으로 페트로 생산돼 출근길과 도서관 등에서 간편하게 휴대하면서 즐길 수 있다.
예상 소비자 가격은 1500원이다.

description.hltext_display: Ennis helps lead Sabres over Ducks in Buffalo
description.content:
Tyler Ennis scored two goals, Ryan Miller made 21 saves and the Buffalo Sabres beat the Anaheim Ducks, 5-2, at HSBC Arena.
Drew Stafford, Nathan Gerbe and Craig Rivet also tallied for the Sabres, who have won five of their last six at home.
"I think we took advantage of a team whose energy level was low," said Buffalo head coach Lindy Ruff. "(Anaheim) played a heckuva game last night in Boston and they had to come in here in a tough situation."
Corey Perry netted a pair of power-play goals in the third period for Anaheim, which fell to 2-3-0 on its season-high, seven-game road trip. Curtis McElhinney was beaten five times on 42 shots in defeat.
The Sabres lit the lamp three times in the opening period, with power-play goals by Stafford and Ennis bracketing Gerbe's first goal of the season.
Stafford slipped a backhander through the pads of McElhinney to put Buffalo on the board at 4:43. After Gerbe made it 2-0 midway through the frame, Anaheim forward Jason Blake received a five-minute boarding major and a game misconduct. Ennis then potted the rebound of Andrej Sekera's shot on the extended man advantage at 16:57.
The rookie left winger found the back of the net again at the 4:40 mark of the middle stanza.
Perry spoiled Miller's shutout bid at 15:36 of the third period.. Rivet beat McElhinney less than two minutes later before Perry struck again in the waning moments.
"It's always tough going back-to-back into a break. We've been on the road for a long time," Ducks center Ryan Getzlaf said. "Those are all excuses. That doesn't justify anything that we've done on the ice."
Game Notes
Derek Roy and Jordan Leopold both collected two assists for Buffalo...The Sabres had lost four straight to the Ducks...Anaheim forward Saku Koivu appeared in his 900th career game, while Ducks defenseman Andy Sutton played in the 600th of his career.
©2010 Sports Network. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.

It's always tough going back-to-back into a break.; We've been on the road for a long time; Those are all excuses. That doesn't justify anything that we've done on the ice.

description.hltext_display: OSU's freshmen have provided significant impact
description.author: BILL HAISTEN
description.content: Last week, as he informed Oklahoma State players of his decision to accept West Virginia's job offer, offensive coordinator Dana Holgorsen said this to running back Joseph Randle: "I look forward to watching you play for 10 or 15 more years." It was predicted during the preseason that the Cowboys' freshman class might provide an immediate impact, and it did. Outside linebacker Shaun Lewis was the Big 12's co-defensive freshman of the year. Emerging as one of the Big 12's better all-purpose performers, Randle was extremely effective as Kendall Hunter's backup. Two cornerbacks were impressive. Justin Gilbert ranks among national leaders on kickoff returns. Devin Hedgepeth played in every game. In most seasons, a program like OSU's might play no more than a half-dozen freshmen. The rest of the class would be redshirted. This year, however, because last year's senior class had 22 members and the roster required replenishment, 17 first-year freshmen played for the Cowboys. Among the 120 football teams in Division I-A, OSU is one of only five that played as many as 14 first-year freshmen this year. The rookies close their first college season on Dec. 29, when the 16th-ranked Cowboys (10-2) face Arizona (7-5) in the Alamo Bowl at San Antonio. With a flair for big plays, the 5-foot-11, 212-pound Lewis seems destined to become an all-conference linebacker. Defensive coordinator Bill Young believes that Lewis has the potential to become an All-American. "He's just doing unbelievably well," Young says. "For a freshman to step up and play so well, it's really unusual to see that happen. Even in bowl practices, you can see him taking the next step from a leadership standpoint. He's really gaining confidence." Lewis had three interceptions this season. Each was memorable. The first occurred during the final minute of the Sept. 30 conference opener against Texas A&M. The score was tied as A&M drove toward what could have been a game-winning field goal attempt. But Lewis intercepted an overthrown Jerrod Johnson pass, and the Cowboys capitalized with Dan Bailey's field goal as time expired. OSU prevailed 38-35. Lewis had two more interceptions during the Bedlam game. After picking off a Landry Jones pass, Lewis scored on a 52-yard, second-quarter return. Later, after airborne Cowboy cornerback Brodrick Brown executed an incredibly athletic deflection, Lewis collected the tip for another takeaway. Within days of the start of preseason camp, it was apparent that Randle would command playing time. Through 12 games, he has rushed for 450 yards and has 35 receptions for 399 yards. Including his kickoff-return yardage, Randle's all-purpose contribution amounted to 1,108 yards. Gilbert is one of only nine players in college football with at least two kickoff-return touchdowns this season. Up next Vs. Arizona ? 8:15 p.m. Dec. 29 TV: ESPN-25 ? Radio: KFAQ am 1170, KRVT am1270 Original Print Headline: Immediate influence Bill Haisten 581-8397 bill.haisten@tulsaworld.com

description.hltext_display: Медведеву показали Тадж-Махал
description.content: В ходе официального визита в Индию президент России Дмитрий Медведев по пути из Нью-Дели в Мумбаи в среду сделал короткую остановку в Агре и посетил легендарный Тадж-Махал. Экскурсию для российского лидера провели представители Археологической службы центрального правительства Индии, которая отвечает за содержание и реставрационные работы на территории комплекса. Дмитрий Медведев отказался от помощи переводчика и слушал рассказ на английском языке, передает «Интерфакс» . Президент воспользовался возможностью, чтобы собственноручно сделать фотографии архитектурного комплекса. Глава государства внимательно рассмотрел тонкую работу мастеров, которые в ХУП веке построили мавзолей из белого мрамора, инкрустировав стены полудрагоценными камнями. Медведев восхитился и акустикой внутри мавзолея, где эхо длится 13 секунд. Российский лидер оставил запись в книге почетных гостей на русском и английском языках: «Тадж-Махал - уникальное достояние человечества. Спасибо всем, кто его сохраняет». Глава российского государства вынужден был отклонить предложение остаться в Тадж-Махале до вечера, чтобы полюбоваться необыкновенным видом в сегодняшнее полнолуние: программа продолжающегося визита весьма насыщена, российского лидера ждут в индийском технологическом институте и на кинофабрике Болливуд. По принятой в Индии протокольной практике посещение Тадж-Махала - один из обязательных пунктов программы визитов глав государств. Так, в ноябре и декабре сюда приезжали президент США Барак Обама с супругой и президент Франции Николя Саркози с женой. Закладки:

昨日发改委突然宣布，从22日起上调成品油零售价格，汽、柴油涨幅每吨分别达310元、300元。据此，今日零时起，厦门中石化90#汽油涨至6.33元/升,93#汽油涨至6.71元/升,97#汽油涨至7.09元,0#柴油涨至6.59元/升。
今年发改委调油价动作很是诡异。在11月25日调价条件满足情况下，发改委坚持不涨；而在通胀压力高企，调价机制改革未定背景下，业界普遍预测“成品油年内不会涨”后，油价又突然喊涨。
“主要是调价需求已被累积得很高了。”卓创资讯分析师齐玉芹表示，截至12月21日，三地原油价格加权移动变化率已达到+8.7%，大大超出4%的调价红线，时间周期也远超22个工作日。
本次发改委调价幅度依然不大。历数今年发改委的成品油调价动作，幅度稳定在220元/吨―320元/吨，和去年调价幅度相比处较低水平。分析人士指出，小幅涨价一方面释放了市场对涨价的预期，另一方面又不会对通胀形成太大的压力。

description.hltext_display: Markt-Experte Klinzing: "Same Procedure as Every Year!"
description.content:
Bernhard M. Klinzing (Chefredakteur der Frankfurter Börsenbriefs) kann sich zufrieden zurücklehnen: Bereits im Frühjahr hatte er vorausgesagt, dass der Dax die Marke von 7-tausend Punkten nehmen würde. Auch wenn es durchaus Probleme gibt, wie zum Beispiel die Schuldensituation der Euro Probblemkinder, sieht Klinzing ein glänzendes 2011 voraus Ohne neue Impulse wird der deutsche Aktienmarkt am Mittwoch kaum verändert erwartet. Der X-Dax stand gegen 8.10 Uhr bei 7.081 Punkten um 0,04 Prozent über dem Xetra-Daxschluss vom Vortag. Er ist ein außerbörslicher Indikator für den Dax. Der deutsche Leitindex hatte am Vortag bei 7.087,84 Punkten den höchsten Stand seit Anfang Juni 2008 erreicht und seine Bestmarke vom Wochenstart um weitere 20 Punkte nach oben geschraubt. Die Nachrichtenlage bleibe dünn und auch die Vorgabe der Börsen in Übersee gebe keine klare Richtung vor, begründeten Börsianer die kaum veränderte Tendenz. Der Future auf den US-Leitindex Dow Jones gewann 0,05 Prozent seit dem Xetra-Schluss am Vortag. Auch die Agenda verspricht kaum neue Impulse für den Aktienmarkt. Laut Börsianern dürfte aber das " Window-Dressing " im Zuge der Weihnachtsrally weiter das Geschehen bestimmen, wobei mit weiter abnehmenden Umsätzen zu rechnen sei. Am Nachmittag könnten neue Daten vom US-Immobilienmarkt kleinere Impulse geben, darüber hinaus steht die finale Schätzung des US-BIP für das dritte Quartal auf der Agenda. SCHLECHTE NIKE-ZAHLEN BELASTEN ADIDAS UND PUMA Adidas-Aktien standen nach schlechten Nike-Zahlen und einem Interview im vorbörslichen Handel bei Lang&Schwarz unter Druck. Der weltgrößte Hersteller von Sportartikeln verbuchte im zweiten Geschäftsquartal (Ende November) einen Umsatzanstieg um 10 Prozent und einen um 22 Prozent höheren Gewinn im Vergleich zum Vorjahreszeitraum. Nike-Aktien rutschten aber nachbörslich um 5,73 Prozent, was Börsianer auf einen enttäuschenden Bestelleingang für Dezember bis April schoben. Entsprechend sieht ein Händler negative Vorgaben für Adidas-und Puma-Papiere. Der in einem Interview mit der " Börsen-Zeitung "zum Ausdruck gekommene Optimismus von Adidas-Chef Herbert Hainer trete wohl in den Hintergrund. Wesentlich neue Erkenntnisse habe das Interview ohnehin nicht gebracht, meinte der Händler. Im TecDax könnten Aktien der Software AG ,die mit einem Plus von mehr als 40 Prozent zu den Favoriten im bald endenden Jahr zählten, aus Sicht eines Händlers von positiv aufgenommenen Zahlen des US-Wettbewerbers Tibco Software aus den USA profitieren. Der US-Wettbewerber hat seine Bilanz nach Börsenschluss vorgelegt und die Aktie legte im nachbörslichen Handel in Reaktion auf diese Zahlen fünf Prozent zu. Bei Lang &Schwarz reagierten Software-Aktien allerdings mit leichterer Tendenz noch nicht. PFLEIDERER PROFITIEREN VON VEREINBARUNG MIT BANKEN Pfleiderer-Aktien sprangen nach dem Abschluss einer Vereinbarung mit Banken vorbörslich fast zehn Prozent hoch. Der angeschlagene Bau- und Möbelzulieferer muss bis Ende März 2011 seine Bankkredite nicht zurückzahlen. Mit dieser Vereinbarung will sich das Unternehmen Luft verschaffen, um ein neues Konzept für die Zukunft zu entwickeln. Ein Börsianer sagte: "Pfleiderer gewinnt zusätzliche Zeit für sein Restrukturierungskonzept und das sollte den Aktien Platz für eine weitere Erholung schaffen -das Überleben ist damit aber noch nicht gesichert. "Die Aktien waren bis Ende November stark unter Druck geraten und auf 1,702 Euro abgerutscht, erholten sich dann aber etwas.
© 2010 Deutsches Anleger Fernsehen

description.hltext_display: Huckleberry registration is now open for Spring 2011
description.author: Elmarie Hyman, Santa Clarita Valley Homeschooling Examiner
description.content:
I wanted to make sure to let you all know about the registration now being open for classes at Huckleberry Center for Creative Learning for the Spring 2011 semester. That semester only starts Feb. 7th, but some classes are already full and some are almost full.
I always want to let you know about these opportunities, because my kids always thoroughly enjoy the a la carte homeschool classes they take there and they always learn a ton. They also get the opportunity to socialize with other kids and the project-based, hands-on learning, done in a class environment, teaches them several valuable skills.
If you are interested in looking at what they are offering next semester, click on http://www.hucklc.org/classes/spring-2011/class-schedule-spring-2011.html
Also, don't forget that scholarships are available for those who are not able to pay for classes. For more info on that, click http://www.hucklc.org/media/HuckleBerry%20Scholarship.pdf
If you would like to be notified of future articles, please subscribe above.

entity.property: Huckleberry Center for Creative Learning for the Spring

description.hltext_display: 모토로이, 안드로이드 2.2버전 업..
description.content:
- 최대 32GB까지 앱 저장 가능
- 모토쿼티는 내년 1분기 업그레이드
[이데일리 류의성 기자] 모토로라의 스마트폰 모토로이가 구글의 안드로이드 2.2 OS(운영체제)버전(프로요)으로 업데이트됐다.
모토로이(모델 명 XT720) 는 모토로라가 한국 시장을 타켓으로 출시한 첫 번째 스마트폰이다.
기존 모토로이를 2.2.버전으로 업그레이드하면 어플리케이션을 내장 메모리뿐 아니라 SD Card(외장 메모리 카드)에도 저장할 수 있다. 최대 32GB의 어플리케이션 저장 공간을 확보할 수 있기 때문에 그만큼 앱을 더 많이 다운받을 수 있게 된다.
어도비 플래시를 지원해 어도비 플래시 기반의 비디오, 게임, 애니메이션, 인터넷 서비스를 이용할 수 있다.
업그레이드하기 전에 모토로이의 내장 메모리는 최소 5Mb 이상, 외장 메모리는 최소 150Mb 이상의 공간 여유가 필요하다.
회사 측은 프로요 업그레이드는 OS 버전이 변경되기 때문에 사전에 백업해야 할 주요 데이터는 미리 백업받을 것을 당부했다. 또 플랫폼이 요구하는 메모리 크기가 늘어 전체적인 동작 속도가 기존보다 느려질 수 있다고 밝혔다.
모토로이 프로요 버전 업그레이드는 전국 모토로라 서비스센터 또는 PC를 통한 모토로라 홈페이지( www.mymotorola.co.kr )에서도 진행할 수 있다.
한편 모토로이를 제외한 나머지 스마트폰인 모토 쿼티와 모토 글램은 내년 1분기 프로요 버전 업데이트 서비스를 받을 수 있다.
▶ 찌라시는 가라!.. 스마트브리프 하루 두번 무료로 만나보세요.
▶ 이데일리ON, 문자로 시세,추천,진단,상담정보 - #2200
▶ 이데일리 모바일ㆍ실시간 해외지수/SMS 3993+show/nate/ez-i▶ 가장 빠른 글로벌 경제뉴스ㆍ금융정보 터미널, 이데일리 MARKETPOINT
＜ⓒ종합 경제정보 미디어 이데일리 - 무단전재&재배포 금지＞
＜안방에서 만나는 가장 빠른 경제뉴스ㆍ돈이 되는 재테크정보 - 이데일리TV ＞ 류의성(기자) esryu@

description.content:

Depuis, et malgré plusieurs annonces, le projet n?a toujours pas débouché � ce jour. A en croire Digitimes, cette situation pourrait toutefois évoluer significativement dans les prochains mois. Lenovo aurait finalement revu quelque peu sa stratégie. La tablette aurait dorénavant un form factor de 7 pouces. Quant au système d?exploitation, Android 3.0, alias Honeycomb, serait pressenti.
Pour le moment, aucune autre information n?a filtrée. Mais le CES devrait nous apporter plus de précisions. Rendez-vous donc � partir du 6 janvier prochain pour l?édition 2011 du Consumer Electronics Show qui promet d?être riche pour les amateurs de tablettes? [Source : Digitimes]

description.hltext_display: 'Unreasonable' chairman describes rise of Jacksonville-based Acosta Inc.
description.author: Mark Basch
description.content:
Many people would be offended if you told them they were being unreasonable. But Gary Chartrand would consider it a compliment.
Chartrand, the executive chairman and former CEO of Jacksonville-based Acosta Inc., thinks you need an unreasonable leader to grow a company successfully.
“My unreasonable leadership definition is a positive one,” he said.
Chartrand feels so strongly about it that he has written a book on the subject called “Unreasonable Leadership.” The book details how unreasonable leadership sparked the growth of Acosta, a sales and marketing company serving the supermarket industry.
The unreasonableness of Chartrand and his predecessor as CEO, Del Dallas, helped Acosta grow from a Jacksonville company with 26 employees in 1974 to a national leader in its industry today with $1 billion in annual revenue and 17,000 employees in the U.S. and Canada.
“The term 'unreasonable’ describes a leader who can inspire his or her colleagues to stretch and grow to achieve a daunting and seemingly unobtainable mission,” Chartrand wrote in the book.
Instead of doing what is reasonable and expected, the leader needs to take chances and make some seemingly unreasonable requests. In an interview in his office at Acosta’s Southside headquarters, Chartrand said you need “strong convictions and courage.”
“I think the two go hand in hand if you’re going to be an unreasonable leader,” he said.
As an example, the book describes Chartrand’s meeting with a top Minute Maid orange juice executive in 1998 when Acosta needed financing for its expansion plans. After discussing other business, Chartrand asked if Minute Maid’s parent company, the Coca-Cola Co., could provide a $25 million loan to Acosta. He got it.
“Never be afraid to ask. Even if at first it seems too bold or unreasonable,” he wrote.
But Acosta was being unreasonable long before Chartrand joined the company.
“I had a good mentor. Del [Dallas] was an unreasonable leader himself,” Chartrand said.
Dallas took over Acosta in 1974 and started the company on its growth path. Acosta’s basic business is providing sales and marketing support for product manufacturers to get their products on store shelves. Since Acosta’s founding in 1927, it had been confined to Jacksonville, because the industry’s business model consisted of local marketers dealing with local stores.
But when one of Acosta’s major customers, Clorox, was looking for a new marketing representative in Tampa in 1974, Dallas took the unusual step of pursuing that Clorox account, even though Acosta didn’t even have a Tampa office. Acosta won the account.
As the book describes it, Acosta’s move into a new territory shook up the industry.
“It was a very radical idea and a very unusual idea,” said Chartrand. “He [Dallas] was extremely unreasonable for what he did.”
Dallas eventually grew Acosta into a major Southeast regional company. But when Chartrand, who joined Acosta in 1983, took over as CEO in 1996, he embarked on a strategy to make Acosta a national player. He was able to accomplish that through a series of mergers and acquisitions of regional companies around the country.
As Acosta grew into a major national company known by everyone in the food industry, it still remained relatively anonymous in its home city.
“Even in our headquarter city of Jacksonville, Florida, Acosta is not a household name. Most residents who hear it, in fact, instinctively think of the Acosta Bridge,” Chartrand wrote in the book.
Robert Hill, who succeeded Chartrand as CEO two years ago, is hoping Acosta will become more well known locally as its employees get involved in the community. Acosta employs more than 400 people in the Jacksonville area.
“It’s a little bit of a challenge because the name [Acosta] doesn’t mean anything,” Hill said.
Hill believes he is following in the Acosta path of unreasonable leadership.
“I think I’m unreasonable as far as the growth trajectory I expect us to have,” he said.
After giving up day-to-day responsibilities for running the company, Chartrand says he now works on special assignments in his role as executive chairman.
“I have the best job in the world right now,” he said.
Chartrand, who is involved in several community projects, is also hoping to spread the gospel of unreasonable leadership. Chartrand’s book is available for purchase through a website, www.unreasonableleaders.com. Proceeds from the book sales will be donated to the Chartrand Foundation, a family foundation that focuses on public education reform.
“I’ve been incredibly blessed. It’s been a great journey,” he said.
“I think the book is there to say anything is possible in this great country we live in.”
mark.basch@jacksonville.com, (904) 359-4308

description.hltext_display: 현대그룹 "佛 자금은 브릿지..
description.content:
현대그룹이 프랑스 나티시스은행에서 대출받은 1조2000억원 규모 자금에 대해 '브릿지론(Bridge loan)'이라고 해명했다.하종선 현대그룹 전략기획본부 사장은 22일 서울중앙지법에서 현대건설 매각과 관련해 열린 '양해각서(MOU) 해지 금지 가처분 신청' 첫 심리에 참석한 뒤 기자들과 만나 이 같이 밝혔다.
브릿지론은 충분한 자금을 모을 때까지 시일이 걸릴 경우 단기차입 등에 의해 필요자금을 일시적으로 조달하는 대출이다. 자금조달 스케쥴 상 공백을 메워주는 다리(Bridge)를 마련한다는 뜻에서 브릿지론이라 불린다.하 사장은 "나티시스은행에서 빌린 1조2000억원은 일종의 브릿지론"이라면서 "대형 글로벌 인수합병(M&A)의 경우에 일단 브릿지론을 얻은 후 재무적투자자(FI)나 전략적투자자(SI)와 협의가 완결되면 대출 대신 투자의 형태로 대체하는 것이 널리 행해지는 방법"이라고 말했다.하 사장은 나티시스은행 대출경위에 대해 "일찍이 채권단에 공문으로 설명했다"면서 "애초 넥스젠이 투자에 참여하려다가 입찰규정상 다른 컨소시엄 멤버가 인수대금을 못 낼 경우에 대한 연대책임 문제로 넥스젠투자위원회가 투자를 잠정 보류하게 됐다"고 설명했다.이어 "이때 넥스젠이 자신의 100% 모회사인 나티시스에 상황을 잘 설명해 대출이 이뤄진 것"이라며 "언론에도 보도됐고 증권가에서도 말하는 브릿지론과 유사한 대출이 이뤄졌던 것"이라고 덧붙였다.현대그룹은 그동안 현대상선 프랑스법인의 나티시스은행으로부터 대출받았다는 1조2000억원 자금의 성격을 놓고 의혹을 받아왔으며, 채권단이 요구한 대출계약서 제출을 거부해 끝내 MOU가 해지됐다.하 사장은 "한두달이면 대금을 완납하는 스케줄인데 그걸 못 기다리고 채권단이 MOU를 해지했다"면서 "채권단이 제시한 주식매매계약(SPA)에 거액의 현금보증금을 내도록 하는 등 안전장치들이 많은데도 채권단이 한두달을 못 기다리고 MOU를 해지한 것은 부당하다"고 주장했다.그는 최근 현대상선 프랑스법인을 특수목적법인(SPC)으로 삼아 유상증자를 통해 2조원을 조달하기로 밝힌 것에 대해 "대출을 받아 놓았지만 FI, SI를 유치해 대체함으로써 대출금을 인수대금에 사용하는 규모를 줄이려는 것"이라고 설명했다.그러면서 그는 "이번 M&A의 특이점은 컨소시엄 멤버 변경에 대해 채권단의 사전 동의가 필요하다는 것"이라며 "그래서 현대상선 프랑스법인을 컨소시엄 멤버로 넣은 것도 향후 유치되는 FI, SI가 현대상선 프랑스법인의 유상증자를 통해 인수전에 채권단 동의 없이도 참여시키려는 것이었으며, 현대상선 프랑스법인을 사실상 SPC로 활용하는 방안을 처음부터 추진했다"고 밝혔다.현대그룹은 24일 가처분 신청에 대한 2차 심리 이후 추가 소송 여부를 결정할 방침이다.하 사장은 "나름대로 법과 입찰규정에 따라 나티시스 자금 의혹을 해명하기 위해 노력했다"며 "법원의 공정한 판단이 있을 것으로 믿는다"라고 말했다.[뉴스속보부]
[ⓒ 매일경제 & mk.co.kr, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: Un pequeño terremoto sacude el noroeste de Inglaterra
description.content:
Londres, 22 dic (EFE).- Un terremoto de 3,6 grados de magnitud en la escala abierta de Richter sacudió anoche Cumbria, en el noroeste de Inglaterra, si bien no ha causado víctimas, informó hoy el Servicio Geológico Británico (BGS, siglas en inglés).
El seísmo fue sentido por la población poco después de las 23.00 horas GMT en varios condados vecinos, como Yorkshire, Northumberland y el suroeste de Escocia, según la Policía, que ha precisado que el terremoto tampoco parece haber causado daños materiales.
El sismólogo David Galloway, del BGS, dijo a la BBC que en el país se registran algunos terremotos y "tal vez tenemos uno de esta magnitud cada 12 o 18 meses, pero es poco probable que cause daños".
Según los expertos, en la zona de Cumbria, fronteriza con Escocia, ha habido unos seis terremotos en los últimos cuarenta años, de los que dos han alcanzado una magnitud de 3,7 grados -uno de ellos en 1988 y otro en 2009. EFE

description.hltext_display: 开发区蔚蓝彼岸吉房出售
OSU hopes to break even financially at Alamo Bowl
description.author: BILL HAISTEN
description.content: For its involvement in the Dec. 29 Alamo Bowl football game in San Antonio, Oklahoma State gets a $1 million participation fee and $138,900 for expenses. While it might seem like a nice sum, OSU will spend nearly every dollar on the transport, lodging and feeding of essential personnel. Traveling at university expense are 558 people - 122 players, 10 coaches, 78 members of the football support staff, 300 members of the marching band and 48 members of the spirit squad. Athletic director Mike Holder says the total of 558 represents a "substantial reduction" from the number of people who were on the university's tab for previous bowl trips. In 2009, OSU determined that only essential personnel would make bowl trips at university expense. "When we compared what we spent on the Cotton Bowl in 2004 and what we spent last year, the difference was astronomical," Holder said. "We don't take anyone unless they have a real function. We just try to use a little common sense on it." Regardless of a bowl's payout, Holder said, the goal of most participating schools is to break even or, at best, pocket a few dollars. For games involving Big 12 schools, bowl payouts are pooled by the conference and distributed to all members. "We don't want to cut back on anything that would diminish the student-athletes' experience at the bowl," Holder said. "Otherwise, we try to operate prudently. "I think we have a realistic shot at breaking even when we go to a bowl." Original Print Headline: OSU bowlcomes atan expense Bill Haisten 581-8397 bill.haisten@tulsaworld.com

description.hltext_display: Nigéria evacua pessoal diplomático da Costa do Marfim após ataque à embaixada
description.content:
A Nigéria evacuou seu pessoal diplomático na Costa do Marfim, depois de a embaixada nigeriana em Abidjan ser atacada, informa nesta quarta-feira a imprensa local.
O ministro de Exteriores nigeriano, Odein Ajumogobia, disse na noite desta terça-feira em Abuja que a Nigéria busca evacuar seus cidadãos que estão na Costa do Marfim, sem explicar quem e quando realizou o ataque à embaixada nem outros detalhes.
A Nigéria ocupa a Presidência rotativa da Comunidade Econômica dos Estados de África Ocidental (Cedeao) e está envolvida na resolução do conflito pós-eleitoral da Costa do Marfim.
O conflito iniciou após o segundo turno da eleição presidencial de 28 de novembro passado, quando o atual líder, Laurent Gbagbo, se negou a abandonar a Presidência, após dez anos no poder, apesar da Comissão Eleitoral Independente ter proclamado a vitória de seu oponente, Alassane Ouattara, reconhecida pela comunidade internacional.
A Costa do Marfim está à beira do reatamento da guerra civil, que já dividiu o país entre 2002 e 2007, com o sul controlado pelos militares leais a Gbagbo e o norte pelo grupo Forças Novas, que não se desarmou após o conflito.
Em cúpula extraordinária, realizada no último dia 7 em Abuja, os líderes da Cedeao, liderados pelo presidente nigeriano, Goodluck Jonathan, suspenderam a Costa do Marfim do bloco, respaldaram a vitória de Outtara e exigiram a Gbabgbo que deixasse pacificamente o poder para facilitar a transição política no país.
O grupo regional tem prevista uma nova cúpula extraordinária para a próxima sexta-feira em Abuja, a fim de estudar a situação da Costa do Marfim e adotar medidas a respeito.

description.hltext_display: WNPA give top award to adviser
description.content:
Randy Metcalf/The Explorer, Gary Machlis, Ph.D., science adviser to National Park Service Director Jon Jarvis, was presented the Emil W. Haury Award by the Western National Parks Association and board member Karen Wade, right, at an awards event Dec. 2.
Published:
December-22-2010 12:11am
Special to The Explorer
Gary Machlis, Ph.D., science adviser to National Park Service Director Jon Jarvis, has been presented the Emil W. Haury Award by the Western National Parks Association.
The award, presented Dec. 2, is named for the noted anthropologist, archeologist and University of Arizona professor who was instrumental in the founding in 1938 of Southwest Monuments Association, which later became WNPA.
The Haury Award recognizes “outstanding contributions to scientific research in the national parks and monuments,” a release said. The board of directors of the Oro Valley-based cooperating association lauded Machlis for creating “a greater public understanding of the rich natural and cultural heritage preserved in the national parks.”
Machlis is professor of conservation at the University of Idaho, and has written several books on conservation. His research has been widely published in scientific journals. He served as the NPS Visiting Chief Social Scientist and as the national coordinator of the Cooperative Ecosystem Studies Unit Network. Machlis fills a newly created position as NPS science adviser.
The Haury Award was presented at a reception in the WNPA home office in Oro Valley. Other honors that night included superior-performance awards to Bandelier National Monument in New Mexico; to Al Remley, chief of interpretation at San Antonio Missions National Historical Park in Texas; and to Julie-Mann-Cherry, WNPA manager at Golden Spike National Historic Site in Utah.
WNPA is affiliated with 66 national parks in the western United States, operates bookstores in those parks, and has contributed more than $55 million in aid to the parks in support of research, education, and interpretation.

description.hltext_display: 【意见】谢国忠：中国打击通胀只是嘴上说说
description.content:
作者： 2010年12月22日 来源：中国经济网
评论：
条
字号：大|中|小
分享到：
玫瑰石顾问公司董事、独立经济学家 谢国忠(资料图)
编者按：
近日，经济学家谢国忠在其博客发文就中国通胀问题作出解析。谢国忠称，对于当前通胀形势，欧、美、中三国都还在面临着各种问题，所采用的一系列财政举措都不足从根除通胀问题，而中国打击通胀的力度也不够大。对以上情形，谢国忠辛辣指出，三大经济体是在试图蒙混过关，希望不用太大动作就能稳定当前通胀局势，这种做法只会推动通胀到达新的高度，或会引发另一场危机。
以下为其博客全文。
谢国忠：
美国、欧洲和中国仍在希望，不用太大动作即能稳定当前局势，希望通过拖延来解决诸多难题。这种做法正推动通胀至一个新的高度。有些危机难以避免。
21世纪的第一个十年即将过去，金融市场已经准备好收尾了。未来两个星期，交易量会很低，交易员们会去度假，不是去滑雪，就是去暖和点的地方。无疑，2010年是宏观消息主导的一年。大部分时间，市场踩着宏观消息的节拍起伏。这一年结束时，美联储重申量化宽松政策，美国国会通过了一项庞大的财政刺激法案;中国在探讨如何抑制通胀，却坚持不加息;欧洲还在主权债危机中苦苦挣扎。这些事件的意味，将在很大程度上决定2011年的走势。
美国仍在不遗余力地进行财政和货币刺激，以解决经济困境：高失业，高负债，及庞大的财政和贸易赤字。这种做法的理由，是只要经济维持下去，问题会越变越小。这种观点认为，经济出问题，就像汽车抛锚。如果有人帮着推汽车，直到它自己打着火，问题将不复存在了。过去二十年中，人们都这么想，正是如此才导致了 2008年的危机。让问题不断累积，直到最后汽车根本无法启动。前两年的大规模刺激手段效果不佳，美国人的反应是采用更多的刺激。这将导致另一场危机，也许就在未来这几年。
美国财政刺激的目的显而易见，就是想让奥巴马能在2012年连任。他们当然有可能达到目的。但如果要让美国经济能比较体面，令奥巴马得以连任，就需要有三个条件：新兴经济体继续通胀，维持了美国的出口;欧洲的主权债务危机支撑了美元的价值，抵销美联储的量化宽松;原油价格不会飙升，以减少美国刺激政策的效果。
但事情也可能不朝这些方向发展。今年12月，市场最重要的变化，是美国国债收益率上升了 100个基点，国际原油价格超过了90美元/桶。这样的两个水平还不足以引发另一场危机。历史上平均的10年期国债收益率接近6%，目前是3.4%，还比较低。2008年，石油价格曾飙升至150美元/桶。只要国债收益率没超过历史平均水平，油价还没到2008年的高点，美联储还不至于惊慌。
不过，上述两种情况还是有可能在明年发生的。市场逐渐倾向于认为，美联储的真正目的是用货币化手段洗掉美国的债务。在这种情况下，美联储在鼓励美国政府，企业和家庭在短期内重新融资，而且不必担忧长期利率，因为即便美国国债市场崩盘，美联储也不会改变政策。但如果美元发生危机，美联储有可能改变政策，因为这意味着恶性通货膨胀。外国持有的美国国债依然数量巨大。如果外国投资者抛售美国国债，逃离美元，美联储大概没有胆量像1998年俄罗斯做的那样—— 通过恶性通胀违约。
美元得到了欧洲主权债务危机的支撑。2011年，欧洲很可能解决不了危机。如此一来，美元将得到支撑。美联储可能会实行第三轮、第四轮甚至更多的量化宽松政策，而不用担心后果。
美联储的理想状况是，美元逐步贬值，以反映美国的高通胀，及短期利率大大低于通胀率，也即负实际利率。如果美联储能在将5%的负实际利率保持十年，美国的负债可减少40%，会回到历史平均的水平上。
但是，如果欧洲能找到一个解决其主权危机的方案，例如，把救助基金增加一倍，美元有可能大幅贬值。石油价格将因此飙升。这对美国消费者来说，相当于加税，会抵销刚通过的财政刺激的效果。一旦美联储觉的其政策弊大于利，它可能改变政策。
欧洲需要清晰地说出其解决欧元区主权债务危机的做法。欧洲急需一个类似于美国联邦破产法第11章这样的机制(第11章“重组”的根本目的是拯救企业，使企业摆脱无力偿债的困境，重新恢复生机和活力。按照第11章的要求，企业将凭借未来收益支付部分或全部债务，而不是通过出售财产来支付。为此，第11章规定了一系列支持破产公司的条款，以增加其持续经营的可能性。债权人收回资金的努力被中止了，债务人企业将停止支付本金和利息，直到重组计划付诸实施。)。这个方法的症结在于债主们是否愿意放弃部分债权。由于欧洲银行，尤其是法国、德国和瑞士的银行持有大量主权债务危机国的债权，让它们放弃分债权可能引银行业危机。因此，欧元区必须同时解决上述两个问题。
欧元区比美国和日本都要健康。它的国际收支良好，国家和家庭债务水平要比英美低。虽然作出决定的速度慢，但它最终还是会做出决定。我很乐观地认为，欧元区债务危机会在2011年得到解决，如此一来，美元会遭受可怕的打击。
中国正嚷嚷要打击通胀，但暂时看起来，所谓的打击也只是嘴巴上说说。最近央行上调存款准备金率，即是为了展示决心。但央行在出售央票时不太顺。上调准备金率更像是央票替代品，只是更便宜些，而不是打击通胀的新手段。显然，这种数量型政策不太有效。银行系统外的信贷扩张弥补了系统内的收缩。令人费解的是，为何中国没有意识到这一点，改用利率政策呢。
通胀数据统计的准确性存疑，令市场怀疑中国解决问题的决心。如果遏制通胀只是嘴上说说，其目的恐怕是为想让价格上升，抵销过去货币增长，同时不至于让债务人受苦，因为负债的主要是国有企业。
美国、欧洲和中国的事情说明，三大经济体仍在试图蒙混过关，也即，不用太大动作即能稳定当前局势，并希望通过拖延来解决诸多难题。这种做法正推动通胀至一个新的高度。全球经济过渡到高通胀之路不可能一帆风顺，有些危机不可避免。 (原载谢国忠财新博客)

description.hltext_display: 해운업체 "컨테이너 운임 인..
description.content:
떨어진 수익성 만회 위해
내년 유럽·미주노선 운임 250~400弗 올리기로
선박공급 증가 예상따라 화주들 수용 여부 미지수
국내 해운업체들이 내년 선박공급이 늘어날 것이라는 전망에도 불구하고 수익성 회복을 위해 컨테이너 운임 인상에 나섰다. 22일 관련업계에 따르면 한진해운은 다음달 1일부터 아시아~유럽 노선의 컨테이너 운임을 TEU(1TEU는 20피트 컨테이너 1개)당 250달러씩 인상하기로 가이드라인을 정했다.
한진해운은 현재 이를 기준으로 개별 화주들과의 분기별 협상을 벌이고 있다. 현대상선도 오는 1월부터 아시아~유럽과 아시아~지중해 노선의 컨테이너 운임을 각각 TEU당 275달러와 250달러씩 올리기로 내부 방침을 세우고 협상 중이다.
선사들은 유럽뿐 아니라 미주 노선 운임도 더 받을 계획이다. 앞서 한진해운ㆍ현대상선이 속해 있는 태평양 수출항로 운임 동맹인 태평양노선안정화협의체(TSA)는 내년부터 아시아~미주 서부노선 운임을 FEU(1FEU는 40피트 컨테이너 1개)당 400달러 인상하기로 지난달 결정했다. 이에 따라 국내 선사들은 내년 5월 북미항로 정기운임 계약 때 인상분을 반영하기로 했다.
이처럼 해운업체들이 운임인상에 나선 것은 최근 운반비가 급격히 떨어져 수익성이 나빠졌기 때문이다. 실제로 성수기 대비 유럽노선 운임은 최근 부대비용을 포함해 1TEU당 2,500달러선에서 1,700달러선까지 내려앉았다. 해운업계의 한 관계자는 "유럽 노선의 경우 중국 쪽에서 선박 공급이 상당히 많아 운임이 많이 빠졌다"며 "이번 운임인상은 최근 급락한 운임을 다시 회복시키기 위한 것"이라고 설명했다.아울러 내년에 물동량이 증가할 것이라는 기대감도 운임 가이드라인 인상에 영향을 미쳤다. 글로벌 해운시황 분석기관인 클락슨에 따르면 내년 컨테이너와 벌크 물동량은 각각 10.2%, 6% 증가할 것으로 전망된다. 특히 설 연휴를 전후해 물동량이 많을 것으로 업계는 기대하고 있다.
하지만 업계의 바람대로 운임이 오를지는 미지수다. 내년에 물동량 증가분 이상으로 선박공급이 늘어날 것으로 예상돼 화주들이 선사들의 운임인상 요구에 순순히 응해줄 가능성이 높지 않기 때문이다.
특히 컨테이너와 벌크의 운임을 가늠할 수 있는 지표인 HR종합용선지수와 건화물운임지수(BDI)도 지속적으로 낮아지고 있는 추세다. HR지수는 지난 9월 넷째주 735를 기록한 후 11주 연속 하락해 이달 15일 668.4에 머물렀다. 또 BDI는 5월 4,200대에 올라섰다가 12월 현재 1,800대에 머물고 있다.
한편 운임인상 방침을 세운 컨테이너선 업계와 달리 벌크선사들은 이렇다 할 가이드라인을 세우지 못하고 있다. 벌크선사들은 중국의 긴축재정 정책이 얼마나 지속될지, 인도 등 신흥시장의 물동량이 얼마나 늘어날지 가늠을 못하고 있다. 업계의 한 관계자는 "컨테이너와 달리 벌크의 경우 완전경쟁 시장이라고 볼 수 있다"며 "물동량의 증감에 따라 운임의 격차가 상당히 크고 그 때그때 대응해야 하는 측면이 있다"고 말했다.임지훈기자 jhlim@sed.co.kr
[ⓒ 인터넷한국일보(www.hankooki.com), 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: 福州岁末再掀购车热潮 单日最高申报纪录达632辆
description.content:
记者21日从市国税局获悉，时近岁末，福州市民再掀购车热潮。据统计，本月1~15日，国税部门已办理1.6升及以下排量乘用车新车申报2059辆，与正常月份相比增长59.24%。其中13日一天，就办理申报632辆，创历史新高。今年前11个月，福州市共申报小排量乘用车2.85万辆，月均2587辆。

description.hltext_display: Blues top Thrashers in Atlanta
description.content:
Updated: 12/21 10:35 pm
Alex Pietrangelo and Vladimir Sobotka each notched a goal and an assist as the St. Louis Blues took a 4-2 win over the Atlanta Thrashers at Philips Arena.
Alexander Steen and Brad Boyes each had a goal for the Blues, who had dropped four of five coming into the game. Ty Conklin stopped 37 shots in the win.
"We stuck to the details in this game," said St. Louis head coach Davis Payne. "We knew that they were a really good forechecking team with some skill in the back as well. We knew how important that first goal would be especially with both teams playing back-to-back nights."
Bryan Little and Dustin Byfuglien both lit the lamp for the Thrashers, who had won four of six prior to the setback. Chris Mason stopped 23-of-26 shots in the loss.
"You have to dig down and find a way to win," said Atlanta head coach Craig Ramsay. "In the third period we put everything out on the line and it caught up with us. We have to re-group quickly because we're back on the ice in two days."
The Blues got on board 5:07 in as a turnover in the Atlanta zone saw Chris Porter come up with the puck and center it for Boyes, who ripped it past Mason.
Little tied it 1:36 later when he finished a rush by tapping home a rebound of an Evander Kane shot for his 10th goal of the season.
Steen made it 2-1 with 1:21 left in the second when he sent home a wrister from the right circle off a Barret Jackman left-point feed.
Pietrangelo gave the Blues a 3-1 lead just 2:13 into the third when he blasted a shot from the right point past Mason off a faceoff win.
Byfuglien got it back to one when he banged the puck in off the goaltender from behind the net with 7:23 to play.
A penalty to B.J. Crombeen saw Atlanta got on the power play with 1:58 to play and the team pulled Mason for a 6-on-4 advantage, but Sobotka iced the game with his empty-netter with 48 seconds left on the clock.
Game Notes
St. Louis hosts Detroit on Thursday...Atlanta plays in Boston on Thursday...The Blues won both matchups with Atlanta this season. The other came on October 30 in St. Louis as the Blues took a 4-3 shootout win...Both teams went 0-for-4 on the power play.

description.hltext_display: Programa mundial de Alimentos compra 13.000 toneladas de trigo en Afganistán
description.content:
Kabul, 22 dic (EFE).- El Programa Mundial de Alimentos (PMA) de la ONU anunció hoy su mayor compra de trigo en Afganistán, un total de 13.000 toneladas, con vistas a aliviar una potencial escasez aguda de este cereal entre la población.
La cantidad serviría para alimentar a más de 500.000 personas durante tres meses, anunció en un comunicado el PMA, que precisó que ha comprado el trigo al Ministerio afgano de Agricultura con fondos proporcionados por la agencia estadounidense de desarrollo, USAID.
El PMA afirmó además que adquirirá cereal también directamente de manos de organizaciones campesinas y de los propios agricultores, con vistas a desarrollar los mercados agrícolas en el país, que vive golpeado por la guerra y es uno de los más pobres del mundo.
"Estamos entusiasmados y aliviados de que esas compras nos permitan seguir proporcionando ayuda a las familias más necesitadas de Afganistán", expresó en la nota de prensa el representante de la organización en el país, Louis Imbleau.
Según la organización, la adquisición permitirá una distribución más rápida del cereal, por lo que se reducirá el posible impacto de la escasez de trigo, que amenazó la ayuda invernal para un millón de afganos tras las inundaciones sufridas por el país vecino, Pakistán.
Las operaciones del PMA en Afganistán se vieron afectadas seriamente por las inundaciones paquistaníes, porque muchos de los suministros hacia tierras afganas quedaron bloqueados mientras eran transportados al país desde Pakistán.
El Programa Mundial de Alimentos pretende además comprar 24.000 toneladas de trigo a Pakistán con ayuda de otros donantes, como Japón, aunque la organización recordó que sufre una importante escasez de fondos.
Se requiere una donación total de 132 millones de dólares hasta finales de julio de 2011 para mantener las operaciones, estimó el PMA, que se ha fijado como objetivo proporcionar alimentación a 7,3 millones de afganos el año que viene. EFE

description.hltext_display: Dr. Mitchell Karl to Join Vicor Technologies' Scientific Advisory Board and Serve as Associate Medic
description.content:
David H. Fater, CEO of Vicor Technologies, Inc. (OTCBB: VCRT), today announced that Mitchell Scott Karl, MD, will join the Company's Scientific Advisory Board and serve as the Company's Associate Medical Director, a new part-time position. Vicor Technologies, Inc. (OTCBB: VCRT) is a biotechnology company focused on the development of innovative, non-invasive medical devices using its patented, proprietary PD2i® nonlinear algorithm and software. Vicor is currently in the process of commercializing diagnostics that enable physicians to accurately risk stratify specific target populations for future pathological events, including cardiovascular disease patients for death resulting from arrhythmia or pump failure, diabetics for diabetic autonomic neuropathy (DAN), and trauma victims for imminent death absent immediate lifesaving intervention.
"Dr. Karl is a well-respected cardiologist and clinical professor whose experience and knowledge has been an asset to Vicor since he became a consultant to the Company earlier this year. We are extremely gratified to now have him serving as our Associate Medical Director on a part-time basis and as a member of our Scientific Advisory Board," stated Mr. Fater.
As Associate Medical Director, Dr. Karl will assist Dr. Daniel Weiss, Vicor's Chief Medical Officer, in developing the direction of the Company's future scientific focus and adapting that science for clinical use. He will also serve as an additional liaison, in conjunction with CEO David Fater, to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration, potential partner companies, and Vicor's clinical research organization. Additionally, Dr. Karl will assist in the oversight of Vicor's medical and clinical operations, and review/evaluate for publication all pertinent medical manuscripts and publications. Dr. Karl will also assist Dr. Edward Lundy, newly-named Chairman of the Scientific Advisory Board, as needed, with his responsibilities, which include interacting with Vicor's researchers and marketers to help identify new markets for the Company's products and serve, in conjunction with Dr. Weiss, as a spokesperson on medical affairs related to Vicor's target markets. Vicor's Scientific Advisory Board is composed of professionals in the medical, academic, and life sciences arenas.
Dr. Mitchell Scott Karl is a Boca Raton-based cardiologist and a staff cardiologist at Boca Raton Community Hospital. He is also Clinical Associate Professor of Biomedical Science at Florida Atlantic University. He has served on the staffs of Holy Cross Hospital and North Ridge Medical Center in Fort Lauderdale, West Boca Medical Center in Boca Raton, and Delray Medical Center in Delray Beach. Additionally, he was Clinical Associate Professor and, earlier, Clinical Assistant Professor of Pharmacy Practice at Nova Southeastern University. Dr. Karl served his internship, residency and cardiology fellowship training at Montifiore Medical Center of the Albert Einstein College of Medicine. Dr. Karl earned his MD at Downstate Medical Center. He holds an Executive MBA in Medical Management from Nova Southeastern Graduate School and a BA in Psychology, Summa Cum Laude, from Emory University.
About Vicor Technologies, Inc.
Vicor Technologies is a biotechnology company creating innovative non-invasive diagnostics employing its patented, proprietary point correlation dimension algorithm (PD2i®). The PD2i® nonlinear algorithm is a deterministic, nonlinear measure of electrophysiological potentials that predicts future pathological events with a high degree of accuracy in target populations.
Vicor currently has three products employing the PD2i® nonlinear algorithm. The PD2i Analyzer™, which has FDA 510(k) marketing clearance, measures heart rate variability; physicians performing diagnostic tests with the PD2i Analyzer™ are able to receive reimbursement under existing CPT codes. The PD2i VS™ (Vital Sign), in clinical trials under a collaborative effort with the U.S. Army Institute for Surgical Research (http://www.usaisr.amedd.army.mil/), risk stratifies combat and civilian trauma victims. The PD2i CA™ (Cardiac Analyzer), in multiple clinical trials, identifies patients at risk of cardiac death.
Vicor anticipates additional applications employing the PD2i® nonlinear algorithm to enable early detection and risk stratification for a variety of other disorders and diseases. Additional information is available at www.vicortech.com.
Disclaimer
The appearance of name-brand institutions, such as the U.S. Army Institute for Surgical Research, in this media release does not constitute endorsement by institutions of the information, products or services contained therein.
Caution Regarding Forward-Looking Statements
Forward-looking statements in this press release are based on current plans and expectations that are subject to uncertainties and risks, which could cause our future results to differ materially. The following factors, among others, could cause our actual results to differ: our ability to successfully complete the normal range study for PD2i®values; our ability to generate revenues from the sale of the PD2i Analyzer™; our ability to obtain FDA approval of our 510(k) submission to secure a claim for the PD2i CA™(Cardiac Analyzer) to be used in patients undergoing cardiovascular disease testing and our ability to obtain marketing clearance from the FDA for the PD2i VS™ (Vital Sign) for military and civilian applications; our ability to develop additional applications for the PD2i® algorithm; our ability to continue to receive financing sufficient to continue operations and complete critical clinical trials; our ability to continue as a going concern; our ability to successfully develop products based on our technologies; our ability to obtain and maintain adequate levels of third-party reimbursement for our products; the impact of competitive products and pricing; our ability to receive regulatory approval for our products; the ability of third-party contract research organizations to perform preclinical testing and clinical trials for our technologies; the ability of third-party manufacturers to manufacture our products; our ability to retain the services of our key personnel; our ability to market and sell our products successfully; our ability to protect our intellectual property; product liability; changes in federal income tax laws and regulations; general market conditions in the medical device and pharmaceutical industries; and other matters that are described in Vicor's Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2009 and subsequent filings with the Securities and Exchange Commission. Forward-looking statements in this press release speak only as of the date of the press release, and we assume no obligation to update forward-looking statements or the reasons why actual results could differ.

description.hltext_display: 街头廉价蚕丝被或掺假 提防商家掺涤纶等杂质
description.content:
随着天气转冷榕城街头社区内涌现出不少“现场加工蚕丝被”的小作坊160元/500克的“天然蚕丝”，10元的加工费，着实吸引了不少市民。不过，业内人士告诉记者，目前天然蚕丝500克差不多要200元以上，如果低于这个价位，可能掺杂了涤纶等杂质。
记者昨日在仓山一社区路口看到，蓝色的帐篷下，两名带有浓厚的外地口音的姐妹正忙着撕扯旧被子，掏出里面的旧蚕丝来加工。一旁的架子上摆放着蚕丝，以供市民参看，一台大型加工机器在随时待命。操着外地口音的师傅告诉记者，，他们的蚕丝都是“全天然”的，快过年了，希望能多做几单再，回老家，500克售价160元，加工费10元。市民可以选择购买新蚕丝，也可以把家里旧的蚕丝被拿来重新加工。

description.hltext_display: Badajoz está en alerta amarilla por tormentas y precipitaciones
description.content:
Mérida/Madrid, 22 dic (EFE).- Badajoz y Ceuta se encuentran en alerta amarilla por tormentas y precipitaciones de 40 litros por metro cuadrado en doce horas, por rachas máximas de viento de 70 kilómetros por hora, ha informado la Agencia Estatal de Meteorología (Aemet).
Cádiz, Granada, Málaga, A Coruña y Asturias están en alerta naranja (riesgo importante) por lluvias, nieve y fenómenos adversos costeros.
En las provincias andaluzas de Cádiz, Granada y Málaga las precipitaciones pueden alcanzar los 80 litros por metro cuadrado en doce horas; A Coruña se encuentra en alerta naranja por vientos costeros, mientras que Asturias lo está por nevadas que pueden alcanzar un espesor de entre 5 y 15 centímetros.
En Córdoba, Huelva y Sevilla se encuentran en alerta amarilla ante el riesgo de tormentas y precipitaciones de 40 litros por metro cuadrado en doce horas y por rachas máximas de viento de 70 kilómetros por hora, mientras que Almería y Jaén lo están solo por lluvias.
Todo Canarias se encuentra en alerta por fenómenos adversos costeros, mientras que por rachas máximas de viento de 75 kilómetros por hora la alerta se circunscribe a El Hierro, Fuerteventura, Lanzarote, La Palma y Tenerife.
La alerta amarilla se extiende, en este caso por nevadas de hasta 15 centímetros de espesor, a Cantabria, León, Zamora, Lugo y Ourense, mientras que en Pontevedra se esperan fenómenos adversos costeros.
Protección Civil recomienda a los ciudadanos que ante la posibilidad de vientos costeros, hay que procurar alejarse de la playa y de otros lugares bajos que puedan ser afectados por las elevadas mareas y oleajes que suelen generarse ante la intensidad de vientos fuertes. Hay que procurar, además, evitar los desplazamientos por carretera y si es necesario hacerlos, extremar las precauciones por la posible presencia de obstáculos en la vía.

description.hltext_display: Premier Bligh insists on the stability of her leadership in Queensland
description.author: Ricky Roxas
description.content:
Queensland Premier Anna Bligh denies the existence of any challenges to her leadership of the state Labor Party, apparently convinced that politics is the last thing in the minds of people especially during the holiday season. to get the day's most relevant news, data and anlaysis . Sample
Besides, Ms Bligh maintained that too many concerns need to be addressed in Queensland and chief among them is the brewing showdown with federal authorities on state royalty tax questions.
The Premier added that the prolonged wet weathers prevailing in the region also dominate her agenda for weeks ahead as she emphasised that "now is the time for us to be focusing on what Queenslanders want us to do, not to be squabbling among ourselves."
Ms Bligh made her comments amidst reports that some Labor party members are fearful that the ruling party could lose power if the Premier keeps her posts as both party leader and head of the state.
The seeming unpopularity of Ms Bligh could put an end to Labor's almost two-decade rule, which currently holds a 51-seat majority in the state parliament. With the Premier serving out her term, Labor stalwarts are reportedly anxious that most of those seats would be lost come the next state elections though Ms Bligh had already declared in August this year that she would vacate her post if she felt that her tenure has become a liability for the Queensland Labor Party.
Ms Bligh rode to power on her own right and is the first Australian female politician to do so yet that feat may have been reduced to the back memory of Queenslanders as restiveness marred her later policies on the state's power and water issues, as well as the high-profile privatisation of public assets.
Queensland opposition leader John-Paul Langbroek said that Ms Bligh already lost the confidence of Queenslanders, which is why a question on her leadership has been raised by Labor leaders.
However, Langbroek dismissed suggestions that his party may be in for an easy win in the next election, on the back of Ms Bligh's growing unpopularity.
Instead, the opposition leader has emphasised that they are even more cautious despite indications that the opposition would fare well in the elections, noting that the ruling party has yet to be trounced since the elections of November 1986.

description.hltext_display: LG유플러스, 장애가정 돕기 청소년..
description.content:
LG유플러스는 22일부터 1박2일 일정으로 충남 천안의 지식경제부 공무원교육원에서 장애가정 청소년 돕기 행사인 ‘두드림 U+ 캠프’를 개최한다. 이번 행사에는 이상철(사진) LG유플러스 부회장을 비롯해 임직원과 장애가정 청소년들이 각각 100명씩 참여해 고민상담, 퀴즈풀기 등을 한다. 이 부회장은 ‘청소년기의 꿈’이라는 주제로 특강에 나선다.
[ⓒ 인터넷한국일보(www.hankooki.com), 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: Met 'faces toughest period yet'
description.content: The Metropolitan Police is facing its most challenging period since Commissioner Sir Paul Stephenson took over, he has said. Sir Paul, who was deputy commissioner five years ago and took the top post last year, said a combination of violent disorder on the streets, budget cuts, and the forthcoming Olympics were stretching his force.And he acknowledged the student tuition fees protests were being driven by "a real passion about a cause".Sir Paul, interviewed on BBC Radio 4's Today programme, was asked how far the protests, cuts, and other events, were stretching his force.He replied: "When you put all the various challenges that face me and my colleagues in the Metropolitan Police service together, this is as challenging a period as we have ever faced."He stressed he did not doubt the operational capability of the force. But he said: "I think the challenges we are facing, that stretch we are facing, is not as we have known for a long, long time."We can make significant economy savings, but how far we can stretch those savings is a real issue. I am concerned about our current budgetary situation."On the student protests, Sir Paul said: "There's clearly a sense of anger out there that's led to a level of violence."He said some protesters were determined to breach police lines and had come prepared, and added: "I think we have got a sense of a real passion about a cause out there. Within that, there are various levels of passion that lead to extremism."Copyright (c) Press Association Ltd. 2010, All Rights Reserved.

description.hltext_display: Berliner Klinik: Pfleger gibt zu, Kinder sexuell missbraucht zu haben
description.content: Ein 27-jähriger Krankenpfleger hat den Missbrauch von Kindern gestanden. Der Mann soll sich an Jungen auf der Intensivstation vergangen haben. 0 Punkte 0 Kommentare welt.de - Vermischtes

description.hltext_display: 证券资金直接互转 炒股转账提速
description.content:
继一个股票资金账户试点可重新下挂多张银行卡后，眼下证券、期货资金账户又出现了直通互转的便捷转账模式。近日银证期直通业务也在榕亮相，客户发起一个指令，股票账户内的资金就可直接转到同张银行卡对应的期货资金账户内。
据了解，传统的银证和银期转账都是独立的，从证券资金账户转到期货资金账户客户需要分“两步走”，即要先通过银证转账方式把资金转至第三方存管绑定的银行卡内，然后再把银行卡的资金转到期货资金账户。现在银证期三方联动直通后，客户发起一个交易指令就可完成两个账户内的资金账户互转，从而减少操作环节，缩短资金转账时间。三方直通业务可满足行情变化较大对交易时效的要求，也可降低因未及时缴存期货保证金导致强行平仓的操作风险。
除了银证、银期转账模式出现新变化外，炒股资金账户可重新挂钩多张银行卡的模式也在榕亮相。昨日记者了解到，2007年国内全面实行证券资金第三方存管后，证券交易资金账户只能挂钩一张银行卡，实行“一对一”的关系。去年齐鲁证券和华泰联合证券获批“单客户多银行”业务试点资格。在榕的齐鲁证券已率先实现资金账户可下挂三张银行卡。在榕的华泰联合证券福州营业部工作人员表示，目前该营业部在榕暂只能挂钩一张银行卡。
证券资金可多银行存管的模式便于客户资金的归集。客户炒股可不必从其他银行卡取出资金转入第三方存管绑定的银行卡内，通过同一证券资金账户下挂的几张银行卡，资金可实现免费跨行转账归集管理。

description.hltext_display: Forever friends
description.author: ERIC BAILEY
description.content: HONOLULU - Charles Clay and Genesis Cole have celebrated together in high school football stadiums and now have solemnly observed a national memorial at Pearl Harbor. They've only been close for five years and their playing careers will remain bonded one more time on the football field in Friday night's Hawaii Bowl. But the friendship they have developed is one that will last for a lifetime. It's also a relationship that Tulsa fans can forever cherish. Cole played a key part in Clay's decision to attend TU. As late as lunch time on Signing Day 2007, Clay had no idea where he was going to play college football. A little arm-wringing from his new high school teammate and a noon lunch from a loving mother sent Clay to Tulsa, and a phone call to then-TU assistant coach Gus Malzahn sealed the deal. "Three years later - and even this past summer - there were still people asking why I picked Tulsa," said Clay, the son who also shares the name of an Arkansas football star. "It just recently stopped. "People say I made a good decision." 'BEST OF TIMES' Fans of the Little Rock Central (Ark.) High School football team called them the "dynamic duo." Clay wore No. 1 and was a running back for the Tigers. Cole was No. 2 and was a slot receiver and a safety for the state powerhouse. Cole transferred to Central from Little Rock Hall over the summer and the pair became fast friends. "We were the best," Cole said, smiling like he was recalling the good old days. "Those were the best of times." While Cole was getting scholarship offers from smaller universities, Clay was getting major offers. "We weren't getting recruited by the same people," Cole said. "He had bigger schools than I had. I just figured that we'd remain friends and we'd not play together." After a visit to Miami (Fla.), Clay was prepared to move to the beach. "I bought a hat and a T-shirt," Clay said. "I was ready to go. Then I sat with my mom and she told me that she would probably only get to see one game a year. That made me think and then change my mind." Meanwhile, Arkansas began making a push to sign Clay. They courted him to play offense, but warned him he could eventually play defensive end. Meanwhile, Cole began entertaining thoughts about Tulsa. DECISION DAY Even while he was on Arkansas' staff, Malzahn noticed Cole and, when he switched jobs, thought he would be perfect for TU's system. Little did the first-year TU assistant know a package deal was in the works. Cole and Clay really wanted to play together. Clay soured on Arkansas, even though both considered the school on the final days. That left Tulsa - even though Clay hadn't spoken to TU in months. "I think Coach Malzahn called me one day while I was in Walmart," Clay said with a laugh. "I couldn't hear him and said I'd call him back. I never did." On Signing Day, Clay was pestered by friends at school asking when he was going to sign with Arkansas. It was that foregone a conclusion. "It's a one-horse town, this state," said Darrell Seward, an assistant at Little Rock Central. "Arkansas is the only thing people think of." Clay's mom texted wondering if he had made a decision. "It was the hardest decision of my life," Clay said. "I was sitting in class and I texted her back and said I guess I'm going to Arkansas. She told her boss, 'I'll be back, There's something wrong with my baby.' She came and got me out of school and we went to eat." The conversation led to Tulsa being the place where Clay belonged. "I talked to (Tulsa) when I was still eating," Clay said. "That's when I got a chance to talk to (Malzahn). He said 'Are you serious about this? What position would you like to play?' I said offense, and I don't mind getting the ball thrown my way," Clay said. "He told me he'd promise me two things - I would play offense and I would get the ball. "Coach Malzahn told me we were going to shock the world. I called Genesis right away and told him." END OF ROAD Clay has 38 career touchdowns, which is just shy of Tulsa's all-time record. It is safe to say the senior has left his mark at the school. Cole's career hasn't been as prolific. He redshirted his first season and moved from defensive back to wide receiver and didn't play in 2008 or 2009. Those were three difficult years, but it would have been harder if not for having a good friend nearby. "For a long time, I've been struggling in terms of playing," Cole said. "If it wasn't for him, my mom and his mom ... there were times I wouldn't know if I were going to be here the next semester or not. He always said things would get better and it did." He's played in all 12 games this year, with 17 catches for 205 yards. In Tulsa's memorable 28-27 win over Notre Dame, he had an important 32-yard reception, which set up Kevin Fitzpatrick's game-winning field goal against the Irish. In that game, Cole had more total yards on that one catch than Clay had in the entire game (16). Cole's big catch was perhaps more memorable to Clay. "I was screaming and running behind him," Clay said. "I had a little out route. He caught it and turned upfield. I was trying to get up there and block for him. He popped up real quick. I didn't get a chance to celebrate with him." The pair won't play together next season. Clay's eligibility will be exhausted, and Cole will have one more season remaining. "If I have a chance to come back I'll be back here watching," Clay promised. Said Cole: "I may wear No. 9 next year unless they retire it." "They probably will," he added, before sending both off with a laugh. For more Refer goes here. B3 Eric Bailey 581-8391 eric.bailey@tulsaworld.com

description.hltext_display: Spider-Man 3
description.content:
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Pemain : Tobey McGuire
Stasiun : Trans TV
Tayang : Rabu, (22/12) 21.15 WIB
DALAM trilogi ini, Peter Parker sang superhero Manusia Labalaba, bertemu dengan lawanlawan yang sangat kuat selain harus memperbaiki hubungan dengan kekasihnya, Mary Jane.
Kostum Spider-Man dirasuki oleh simbiote alien yang awalnya memberi kekuatan berlipat ganda namun malah membuat sifat Peter menjadi jahat.
Meski berhasil lepas, simbiote itu menempel kepada Eddie Brock, rekan wartawan Peter yang membencinya. Peter juga harus berhadapan dengan Flint Marko, orang yang ternyata membunuh paman Ben yang kini menjadi Manusia Pa

description.hltext_display: OMV-Call mit 153% Tradingchance
description.content:
Laut Analyse von X-pressTrade, dem täglich erscheinenden Newsletter für Trader, könnte der Kurs der OMV-Aktie über beträchtliches Kurspotenzial verfügen. Hier die Analyse: 'Versorger zählten 2010 zu den Underperformern, so auch OMV. Doch der Blick auf den Wochenchart verspricht Besserung, denn Anfang Dezember 2010 wurde der langfristige Aufwärtstrend bestätigt. Zudem bewährte sich die 40-Wochen-Linie als Unterstützung. Nach dem Anstieg über das Zwischenhoch bei 29,35 Euro hat die Aktie nun Luft bis zum Widerstand bei 32,20/32,74 Euro. Ein Ausbruch über diese Barriere würde Aufwärtspotenzial bis zum Widerstandsbereich um 40,00 Euro eröffnen. Stopps bieten sich um 25,80 Euro an.' Auch zu Beginn des heutigen Handelstages legte die OMV-Aktie zu. Wenn sich der Aktienkurs, der sich zurzeit bei 30,72 Euro befindet, wirklich auf den Weg zur 40 Euro-Marke begibt, dann wird sich der Einsatz von Long-Hebelprodukten rechnen. Beispiel Call-Optionsschein:Der HSBC-Call-Optionsschein auf die OMV-Aktie mit Strike bei 32 Euro, Laufzeit bis 10.6.11, ISIN: DE000TB8FXG6, BV 0,1, wurde beim Aktienkurs von 30,72 Euro mit 0,13 - 0,15 Euro gehandelt. Wenn der Aktienkurs innerhalb des nächsten Monats auf 35 Euro zulegen kann, dann wird sich der handelbare Preis des Calls etwa bei 0,38 Euro (+153 Prozent) befinden. Beispiel Turbo-Call:Der DZ Bank-Open End-Turbo-Call auf die OMV-Aktie mit Basispreis und KO-Marke bei 25,016 Euro, BV 0,1, ISIN: DE000DZ26U44, wurde beim Aktienkurs von 30,72 Euro mit 0,58 - 0,60 Euro zum Handel angeboten. Bei einem bald einsetzenden Kursanstieg auf 35 Euro wird der innere Wert des Turbos auf 0,99 Euro (+65 Prozent) ansteigen. Dieser Beitrag stellt keinerlei Empfehlung zum Kauf oder Verkauf der OMV-Aktie oder von Hebelprodukten auf die OMV-Aktie dar. Für die Richtigkeit der Daten wird keine Haftung übernommen.
© 2010 Hebelprodukte.de
Klicken Sie hier, um weitere aktuelle Nachrichten zum Unternehmen zu finden:
OMV AG Aktienkurs/ News

description.hltext_display: Tesco Bank Partners With Blackhawk Network
description.content:
Tesco Bank, which is owned by supermarket chain Tesco PLC (TSCO.LN), said Wednesday it has partnered with financial payments provider Blackhawk Network, a subsidiary of Safeway Inc. (SWY), to deliver a new range of gift cards to Tesco customers.
MAIN FACTS:
-The Gift Card Store has launched in over 600 Tesco stores across the U.K..
-The range includes brands such as: iTunes, Cineworld, Next, Debenhams and Facebook.
-Tesco PLC shares at 0805 GMT up 0.06% at 431.50 pence valuing the company at GBP34.64 billion.
-By Jana Weigand, Dow Jones Newswires; 44-20-7842-9314; jana.weigand@dowjones.com

description.hltext_display: 【专访】光耀东方集团董事长李贵斌分析资产调控
description.content:
记者：我们非常想知道您对资产调控看法今年4月17日出台国十条，今天政策力度空前大，目前看效果怎么样?
李贵斌：这一次宏观调控总的说起来，由于政策叠加效应效果还是比较明显的。明显反映在几个方面，一线城市房价去年升比较高，这一次通过一系列政策，起码房价生长过快势头降下来，有些人几个观点，既然搞市场经济，行政手段干预房地产市场有些人提了一些观点不认可，还有的人我对这个事看法很简单，因为无论市场经济也好，无论具有中国特色社会主义经济也好，宏观调控其实应该是一种常态，也就是说调控不但现在调控，今后还要调控，有问题的时候从国家这个角度来说往上调定优秀政策，房价过高要往下调，西欧一些成熟市场也采取调控，香港700万人口，过于房价上涨过快政府也出手了我认为是一个常态没有什么可以值得大惊小怪，是纯市场经济还是市场干预，这些手段用金融，财政，税收手段多一些好一些，行政手段到一定时候的时候，该出手也要出手，这次效果还是比较明显的。
记者：目前房价上涨势头确实遏制住，但是价格没有太多松动，只是成交量下降特别快，未来一两年之后，政策有某种退出迹象可能还会面临价格的幅度反弹，因为根本供求关系没有解决。
李贵斌：这个事应该分成一种立体层次分析这个事，本身是一个综合的问题，中国改革开放30年，但是前些年解决了温饱问题，现在正在解决衣食住行问题，因为需求房子是有限不是无限的，达到一定饱和量的时候，就是中国再出现一亿套房子需求量没有这么强了，恰恰这一个时期，是中国整个社会发展到现阶段不可避免一个阶段，也就是说你必须正确面对这样一个阶段，老百姓需要房子这么多，科技发展了，经济发展了，再一个社会再一个大变革阶段，城市化进程加快，这个时候怎么办，一方面政策采取了一些措施，就是一些经济适用房，廉租房政府大力盖房子，再一个方面对商品房，因为在整个房地产供求关系上，还是主力面，如何放低加快供应量成了一个非常大的问题，解决不好这个问题，房价往往容易出问题，但是如果要是不用行政手段，不进行宏观调控也容易出问题，因为这个时期可以说，以前或者以后不可能再出现一个时期。
由于这样一个情况，这一段的政策下来以后，我现在我有一个什么想法，因为中国人口比较多，区域之间城市之间发展非常不平衡，如果要单纯的靠中央政府一直统一政策管控你，某些城市恐怕效果也不会很理想，这次经济发展社会发展，是一线城市，我把一线城市看成，上海，广州，深圳这些一线城市，特点是什么，前端时间几个朋友说，看高速列车时速300多公里，下一步还要加快，把城市之间距离时间缩短了，我说你要注意另一个特点，高速火车是一些一线城市人口集聚更快了，我那个城市，有一个亲戚我开发小区住，原来房子是6层房子，一个单元12户，他跟我说，北京房子能不贵吗，我一个楼道，给大学毕业上班小孩5个，外地毕业也上这来上班，北京大学毕业在这上班，大都市聚集，未来可能还有加速的趋势。
想想美国，纽约也好，伦敦也好都有这个特点，这个时候一线城市怎么办，二线城市怎么办，三线城市怎么办，经济发达地区怎么办，欠发达地区怎么办，不一样，出的政策最好尽可能的交给当地政府把房价控制下来，供应量解决，解决这一轮衣食住行，住的问题，城市化进程问题。
记者：都不一样的话，我们分开说，你说北京，上海，广州一线大城市您觉得下一轮房价走势是怎么样?
给我们一个结论的话?
李贵斌：我感觉现在这几个城市，市场还有一个不理性原因，为什么，因为中国这一轮社会变革，这一次城市化建设是盘古开天第一次，人民还不理性，怎么说不理性。
记者：用不理性翻译以下是不是会继续上涨?
李贵斌：目前房子分两块，一块在郊区，郊区房子配套不好，位置不好，我感觉房价很难上，为什么说很难上涨?有钱人真正有钱的人，不上那买房子，环境好在四环，甚至五环以外的房子我认为未来还会涨价，房价确实太高但是还要涨。
记者：那么二三线城市您觉得房价走势怎么样?
李贵斌：总的说起来房价要看这一轮国家宏观调控政策，应该平稳下来，再近一个阶段，我觉得房价有点僵持可能有点回落?
记者：多大幅度百分制多少?
李贵斌：我看就是10%，20%，这个区间之内比较客观一些。这一线城市房子我感觉价格往下落一落。
记者：僵持略有回落这个状态会有多久
李贵斌：跟国家政策有关系，一个是政策力度，再一个调控的核心，无论怎么调最关键又有市场需求，加大供应量，要想加大供应量必须加大土地供应量解决市场需求问题，否则解决不了根本性问题，有些人预测说是未来这一块调整过去以后，有一个报复性上涨。
记者：您怎么看，认同吗?
李贵斌：我感觉什么时候也要相信中国政府，我不相信，为什么，这一次中央调控房价力度太大，决心很大，不仅仅成了一个民生问题，经济问题，成了一个政治问题。
记者：但是你说到根本性问题，我注意你用到根本这个词，土地供应量问题，如果说现在土地制度不发生变化，不把类似小产权房，农村宅基地一系列土地供应加大，不改革土地制度，现在调控政策很多人说只是一个治标不治本办法，比如说限够令，根本问题不解决这个政策力度会延续这么多还那么相信政府吗?
李贵斌：有一个说法听党的话，跟党走，要从现在这个情况看，我觉得小产权房现在呼吁力度比较高，其实小产权方大幅度出现小产权房，将会造成混乱，国家政策土地供应延续过来的政策，确实也满足不了城市化进程需要房子的需要，再一个两难这样一个情况之下，我认为中央有制革职能调整作为大的政策调整，作为革命性的调整就是供给上怎么供，什么价格，到什么程度，现在中国我的耕地要保障多少，都是对的，但是这里面有一条，中国13亿人需要的房子是有限，不是无限的，你早给晚给，早供应晚供应，早晚都要供应，既然早晚供应现在中国人口，各个城市人口用数据可以算出来，遏制房价确实有很大好处，因此现在我听几个专家提意见，一个是现在加大供给力度，一个是把小产权房，可能这两个办法都适应不了，还应该出台更科学的政策，满足加大了建房用地，同时整个土地市场还不会造成混乱。
记者：什么样的政策可以达到这样的目标
李贵斌：我家是农村，我的离县城都很远，我房子三万一平方都卖不出去，住在城边或者县城边，十几万，住到市边上百万，二线城市地价几百万，现在来说由于贫富差距，人们还是分配不公的问题。因此这个土地制度国家要通过比较有利的政策?
记者：什么样的政策，您有具体的吗，什么样政策导致不导致混乱又能加大土地供给。
李贵斌：因为土地价格由政府，国土资源部门，国土部门负责，党和政府有这个权限，政府干什么，政府就是平衡方方面面的关系。

description.hltext_display: 福建今年食品安全情况良好未有重大食品安全事故
description.content:
从21日举行的2010年福建省食品加工与质量安全报告会上获悉，今年以来，福建省食品安全情况良好，未发生重大食品安全事故。
截至目前，全省共查处涉及食品安全的违法行为6286起，查获不合格食品468.92吨，罚没款918.9万元；查处无证食品生产企业88家，取缔了30家食品生产黑窝点。统计数据显示，今年1~11月，全省31项主要食品污染治理指标有29项达到省定年度计划指标要求，比如蔬菜农药残留快速检测超标率为1.09％，水产品养殖环节药物残留抽检超标率为1.63％。
此外，今年福建省还对全省292家牲畜定点屠宰场点进行清理整顿，开展防疫条件审核、健全动物进场验证、屠宰检疫和肉品检验制度，目前已关闭了24家。全省县级以上72家屠宰场列入改造计划，已有44家经过验收。

description.hltext_display: OV starts its solar generating project
description.content:
Randy Metcalf/The Explorer, Enrique Valenzuela, left, and Gary Adams with Solar Structure Systems dig a hole for structure supports in the parking lot of Oro Valley Town Hall. Installation of covered parking and solar panels, along with numerous other projects, is expected to be completed by April 2011.
Parking structures to be covered with solar panels
Published:
December-22-2010 12:11am
Oro Valley has begun construction on an array of solar energy panels above structures being built on the town hall parking lot.
More than 1,000 solar panels will sit atop several covered parking installations. Town officials say when the entire solar project is complete, it would offset energy needs at the town complex by as much as 60 percent.
The energy efficiency and solar components of the project will result in an average savings of $164,000 per year, according to town and industry estimates.
The $4 million project is self-funded through federal energy bonding, an Energy Efficiency Conservation Block grant and energy savings. Local costs are expected to be recovered through energy savings over the next 10 years.
Tucson Electric Power is subsidizing between 50 to 60 percent of the costs for the solar materials as part of its Renewable Energy Credit Purchase Program.
The town will also be issuing $2.4 million in taxable, direct-pay Clean Renewable Energy Bonds to help with the financing of the project.
All the buildings at the town complex would be on the solar power system except for the library, according to Bayer Vella, a planner with the town who’s spearheading the projects as Oro Valley’s conservation and sustainability administrator.
A total of six covered parking areas will be constructed and affixed with the solar panels through March or April of next year.
Vella said the bulk of the construction was planned during December, when many employees are on vacation and activity around the town complex is at a minimum.
No town council meetings were scheduled during the month, which also minimizes the impact from a lack of parking.
Town employees were encouraged to car pool to work, and use alternative transportation, during construction. The town also plans to provide transit services to town hall for employees from an off-site parking lot at the El Conquistador Country Club.
“We ask for the public’s patience during this construction period and assure all of our residents we are doing everything we can to minimize the inconvenience,” said Mayor Satish Hiremath. “The long-term benefits of this project will have a positive impact on everyone. We thank the public for their patience.”
For more information about the town’s energy efficiency project, contact Vella at 229-4810, or at bvella@orovalleyaz.gov.

description.hltext_display: Lluvia y temperaturas sin cambios
description.content:
Santander, 22 dic (EFE).- La Agencia Estatal de Meteorología prevé para hoy, miércoles, en Cantabria cielos muy nubosos o cubiertos, con precipitaciones ocasionales, moderadas en el interior y débiles en el litoral, que podrían estar acompañadas de tormentas.
La cota de nieve irá en descenso hasta quedar en 1.200 metros al final del día, las temperaturas se mantendrán sin cambios y helará de forma débil en zonas altas de la cordillera.
El viento soplará de componente este flojo, fijándose por la tarde del nordeste tendiendo a norte moderado con intervalos de intensidad fuerte. EFE-Cantabria

description.hltext_display: 가스公, 이라크 가스전 따내…내년..
description.content:
한국가스공사가 이라크 아카스 가스전 개발권을 따냈다. 한국가스공사는 내년 1월 초 이라크 국영석유회사와 아카스 가스전 개발 본계약에 서명할 것이라고 22일 밝혔다.
이에 따라 가스공사는 1ㆍ2차 이라크 가스전 입찰 때 주바이르 광구와 바드라 광구 개발권을 확보한 데 이어 이라크 광구 개발에 연속 참여하는 성과를 거두게 됐다. 이라크 서부 시리아 국경 근처에 위치한 아카스 가스전 개발 계획은 2003년 미국의 이라크 침공 이후 체결되는 세 번째 규모의 에너지 사업 계약이다.
아카스 가스전 매장량은 3.3TCF(원유 환산 시 5억9000만배럴) 수준으로 가스공사는 내년부터 개발에 들어가 하루 최대 400MMSCF(7만2000배럴)의 천연가스를 생산할 계획이다. 앞으로 20년간 2.6TCF(4억6000만배럴)를 생산할 계획으로 가스공사는 앞으로 20년간 원유로 환산할 경우 연간 64만배럴의 원유를 확보하게 된다.
가스공사는 아카스 가스전과 함께 이라크 바그다드 동쪽에 위치한 만수리야 가스전 개발 사업에도 참여하는 계약을 추진 중이다.
만수리야 가스전은 매장량 2.7TCF(4억9000만배럴)로 평가되는 개발 광구다. 만수리야 가스전 개발 본계약을 체결할 경우 가스공사는 앞으로 20년간 원유 환산 시 추가로 연간 16만배럴의 원유를 확보할 수 있게 된다.
[박봉권 기자]
[ⓒ 매일경제 & mk.co.kr, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: 福州津泰路商业街投资调查 均价10-12万/m2
description.content:
津泰路自上个世纪90年代初期改造后，曾是福州最繁荣的商业街之一，这里经营各类时尚名品，是福州时尚人士必逛的一条商业街。由于租金高昂，投资回报率很高，也是人们梦寐以求的投资圣地。时过境迁，在福州商业地产遍地开花的今天，津泰路商业街还能延续它的辉煌吗？
福州津泰路商业街(简称“津泰路”)全长897米，以津泰路为主轴，东起五一路，西至八一七路，南临津泰河。整个街区分为四个部分：八一七路至东泰路区域、东泰路至仙塔街区域、仙塔街至五一路区域，及安泰中心区域。
作为福州最赚钱的老商业街区之一的“津泰路”，这里曾是一铺难求，是很多人梦寐以求的投资圣地。“津泰路”是福州成熟商业街区的代表，它有着稳定的人流量、固定的客源和独具一格的业态，投资者如何在这么成熟的商业街区里挑选回报率最高的商铺呢？
时报根据多家中介商提供的“津泰路”市场成交数据，来分析该街区目前商铺市场情况，为投资人士提供参考。
“津泰路”商铺好转让吗？
据房产提供的数据显示，今年1~11月份，福州全年二手商铺的成交量大概在30000m2左右，其中“津泰路”商铺成交量占5%左右，成交面积大概在1500-2100m2。
双安房产总经理郑爱新表示，从数据看，“津泰路”商铺的成交量并不大，主要原因是“津泰路”总商铺的存量比较少。据双安房产提供的数据显示，津泰路附近的商铺只有300间，加上安泰中心的100多间商铺，总量仅500间左右。在这么少的数量情况下，一年成交面积在1500-2100m2算是不错的。
哪些商铺售价最高？
据骊特房产提供的数据显示，“八一七路至东泰路区域”的两旁沿街商铺，平均售价15万/m2，是“津泰路”中售价最高区域；“东泰路至仙塔街区域”的两旁沿街商铺，平均售价13万/m2；“仙塔街至五一路区域”的两旁沿街商铺，平均售价10-12万/m2；“安泰中心区域”的商铺，平均售价7-9万/m2。
房产提供的数据也很相近。双安房产数据显示：“津泰路”商铺均价是10-12万/m2；安泰中心区域商铺均价是7-9万/m2。根据不同区域和面积的商铺，麦田房产给出的均价范围是7~15万/m2。
多大面积的商铺最好转让？
房产提供的数据均显示，今年1~11月份，“津泰路”商铺中，成交率最高的是面积20-50m2的小商铺，占“津泰路”商铺总成交量的60%。其次是面积70-100m2的商铺，占20%；排名第三位的是面积100-150m2的商铺，占10%；其他面积的商铺占10%。
哪一区域商铺最好卖？
房产提供的数据显示，在今年1-11月“津泰路”商铺成交量中，“东泰路至仙塔街区域”的两旁沿街商铺交易量最大，占比达45%；其次是“八一七路至东泰路区域”和“仙塔街至五一路区域”的两旁沿街商铺，各占20%，而“安泰中心区域”的商铺仅占15%。
骊特房产业务部经理孙美双表示，“东泰路至仙塔街区域”的两旁沿街商铺交易量最大的主要原因是，与八一七路至东泰路区域(街头)相比，东泰路至仙塔街区域(中段)出让的商铺数量最多，而且价格适中，容易成交。同样，与仙塔街至五一路区域(街尾)相比，中段的人流量比较稳定，且业态合理。
50m2以下的商铺最好租
记者从多家中介商处了解到，在“津泰路”的商铺中，最好租的商铺与最畅销的商铺类似，地点是位于东泰路至仙塔街区域(中段)，面积是50m2以下的小商铺，每月的租金是500元/m2左右。
双安房产数据显示：“津泰路”的商铺，面积40-50m2的最好租，月租金为400-500元/m2。安泰中心商铺也比较好出租，因为它的商铺面积多是20-30m2，月租金为200-300元/m2。
从麦田房产收集的数据看，“津泰路”每个区域的租金情况是：“八一七路至东泰路区域”(街头)的两旁沿街商铺租金最贵为900元/m2；“东泰路至仙塔街区域”(中段)的两旁沿街商铺租金为500-700元/m2；“仙塔街至五一路区域”(街尾)的两旁沿街商铺租金为500-400元/m2；而“安泰中心区域”的商铺的租金为300元/m2左右。

description.hltext_display: ผลการศึกษาล่าสุดของ IATA แนะนำทางเลือกที่เหมาะสมในระยะยาวคือ ให้ใช้สนามบินสุวรรณภูมิเป็นส
description.content:
PTTAR* เตรียมสรุปแผนการลงทุน ในโครงการผลิตน้ำมันเครื่องบินสะอาด (Green Jet fuel) และการลงทุนขยายการผลิตแบบคอขวดของหน่วยอะโรเมติกส์ และโครงการผลิตเบนซีนต่อเนื่องขั้นปลายในช่วงกลางปีหน้า โครงการต่างๆดังกล่าวคาดว่าเงินลงทุนจะสูงถึง 1.2-1.3 พันล้านเหรียญสหรัฐ การลงทุนในโครงการใหม่คาดว่าจะสร้างมูลค่าเพิ่มให้บริษัทได้ในอนาคต อย่างไรก็ดีเรายังไม่สามารถประเมินมูลค่าเพิ่มดังกล่าวได้ในปัจจุบัน เนื่องจากยังมีข้อมูลไม่เพียงพอ ยังคงคำแนะนำ ถือ ราคาเป้าหมาย 41.50 บาท
SCC* ซื้อถ่านหินล่วงหน้า เพื่อป้องกันความเสี่ยงจากผลกระทบของต้นทุนถ่านหินที่อยู่ในช่วงขาขึ้น
22 Dec 10 09:33
SCC* ซื้อถ่านหินล่วงหน้า เพื่อป้องกันความเสี่ยงจากผลกระทบของต้นทุนถ่านหินที่อยู่ในช่วงขาขึ้น โดยต้นทุนถ่านหินของบริษัทที่คาดจะขยับขึ้นประมาณ 15-20% YoY เป็น US$80-85 ต่อตัน จะกระทบต่อความสามารถในการทำกำไรของบริษัท เนื่องจาก ถ่านหินคิดเป็นสัดส่วนประมาณ 50% ของต้นทุนรวม และใช้ในธุรกิจซีเมนต์และกระดาษเป็นหลัก อย่างไรก็ตาม เราประเมินว่าการเดินเครื่องเต็มกำลังใน 3 ธุรกิจหลักของ SCC จะช่วยลดผลกระทบจากต้นทุนที่อยู่ในช่วงขาขึ้นและทำให้ EBITDA Margin และกำไรสุทธิปี 2554 ยังอยู่ในระดับเหมาะสมที่ 15.1% 30,849 ล้านบาท ตามลำดับ ดังนั้น เราคงแนะนำ ซื้อ ราคาเหมาะสมปี 2554 ที่ 370 บาทต่อหุ้น
สมาคมพัฒนาผู้ประกอบการธุรกิจค้าปลีกทุนไทย ระบุธุรกิจค้าปลีกในไทยปีหน้าคาดว่าจะโต 2 หลัก
22 Dec 10 09:32
สมาคมพัฒนาผู้ประกอบการธุรกิจค้าปลีกทุนไทย ระบุธุรกิจค้าปลีกในไทยปีหน้าคาดว่าจะโต 2 หลัก โดยห้างสรรพสินค้าจะโตดีสุด หนุนโดยการฟื้นตัวทางเศรษฐกิจ การปรับขึ้นค่าแรงขั้นต่ำ และของข้าราชการและนักการเมือง นอกจากนี้การเลือกตั้งจะเป็นอีกปัจจัยหนุนกระแสเงินเข้ามาหมุนเวียนอยู่ในระบบ ทั้งนี้คาดว่า BIGC* และ ROBINS จะได้ประโยชน์จากกำลังซื้อที่ปรับดีขึ้น 22 Dec 10 09:32
ผลการศึกษาล่าสุดของ IATA แนะนำทางเลือกที่เหมาะสมในระยะยาวคือ ให้ใช้สนามบินสุวรรณภูมิเป็นสนามบินเดี่ยว (Single Airport) โดยให้สนามบินดอนเมืองยกเลิกบริการเที่ยวบินแบบประจำทั้งหมด พร้อมพัฒนากิจกรรมเชิงพาณิชย์อื่นๆแทน และเร่งลงทุนเพิ่มเติมในท่าอากาศยานสุวรรณรภูมิเพื่อรองรับปริมาณผู้โดยสารที่คาดจะเพิ่มขึ้นเป็น 60-65 ล้านคนต่อปี ขณะเดียวกันสำหรับในระยะสั้น – กลาง แนะนำให้เปิดใช้สนามบินดอนเมืองรองรับเที่ยวบินเช่นในปัจจุบัน พร้อมลงทุนในสนามบินสุวรรณภูมิควบคู่กันไป อย่างไรก็ตามผู้บริหาร AOT* เผยขณะนี้ยังไม่ตัดสินใจว่าจะดำเนินการตามคำแนะนำของ IATA หรือไม่ ขณะเดียวกันอยู่ระหว่างรอผลการศึกษาของ UN’s International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) ในเดือน ก.พ.54 ทั้งนี้เรามีมุมมอง Neutral ต่อประเด็นข่าวดังกล่าวเนื่องจากในปัจจุบัน AOT ได้ใช้สนามบินสุวรรณภูมิเป็นหลักเช่นคำแนะนำของ IATA อยู่แล้ว

description.hltext_display: 國泰期貨台指選擇權盤後－指數高檔震盪創新高 內資法人作帳行情續發燒(鉅亨網)
description.content:
◆盤勢分析
市場傳出許多企業併購消息與中國可能出手援助歐元區債務危機的談話，提振美股持續走高，三大指數創下兩年來最高收盤價，美股道瓊指數收在11533.16點，上漲55.03點漲幅為0.48%。台股開盤上漲19.48點，盤中區間狹幅震盪，終場加權指數上漲32.7點，收在8860.49點，成交值 1299.88億元。
電子股方面，成交比重提升至六成，高價股宏達電、碩禾、大立光與TPK力守紅盤，LED、手機、光學鏡頭與PCB族群也有所表現，類股緩步墊高。傳產股方面，受到工機具減稅影響下，機電股上銀登高漲停，航運類股在貨櫃及散裝等股上漲，成為傳產資金的停駐點。金融股方面，成交比重減少到 8.92%，整體表現呈多空拉鋸，而近來強勢之金控股今天呈整理走勢。整體而言，台股指數仍創波段新高，但本週六適逢國外長假，盤勢可能呈橫盤整理，操作建議投資人拉回偏多佈局。
期貨部份，指數開盤上漲12點，盤中呈狹幅震盪走勢，但盤中仍創波段新高，一月期指上漲5點收在8850點，收黑K棒。技術面來看，KD指標高檔鈍化、MACD指標持續向上、RSI指標高檔震盪，後勢仍偏多看待，建議投資人採拉回偏多進行操作。
選擇權部份，一月份買賣權最大未平倉合約在於履約價9000的買權與8300的賣權合約，為預期一月份結算區間。在波動率方面買權、賣權皆減少，OI方面買權、賣權皆增加，一月合約P/C ratio數值小降至1.11，維持中性偏多看法，建議投資人採拉回買進買權多頭價差策略因應。

description.hltext_display: Bukan Malin Kundang
description.content:
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Pemain : Ringgo Agus
Stasiun : SCTV
Tayang : Rabu, (22/12) 22.33 WIB
RYAN, Ado dan Luna, anak kuliahan yang suka jahil. Hobi mereka yang suka menjahili orang kini kena batunya. Suatu hari Ryan dengan semena-mena mengikat seorang Nenek-nenek renta di atas tiang listrik untuk lucu-lucuan saja. Nenek yang emosi lantas mengutuk Ryan.
Setiba di rumah, Ryan menemukan Patung Batu perempuan yang berwujud Ibunya. Dengan bantuan internet dan ke’sok-tahu’an mereka, kejadian ini mereka hubungkan dengan legenda Malin Kundang, tapi bedanya yang menjadi batu bukan anaknya tapi ibu

description.hltext_display: สมาคมพัฒนาผู้ประกอบการธุรกิจค้าปลีกทุนไทย ระบุธุรกิจค้าปลีกในไทยปีหน้าคาดว่าจะโต 2 หลัก
description.content:
PTTAR* เตรียมสรุปแผนการลงทุน ในโครงการผลิตน้ำมันเครื่องบินสะอาด (Green Jet fuel) และการลงทุนขยายการผ
PTTAR* เตรียมสรุปแผนการลงทุน ในโครงการผลิตน้ำมันเครื่องบินสะอาด (Green Jet fuel) และการลงทุนขยายการผลิตแบบคอขวดของหน่วยอะโรเมติกส์ และโครงการผลิตเบนซีนต่อเนื่องขั้นปลายในช่วงกลางปีหน้า โครงการต่างๆดังกล่าวคาดว่าเงินลงทุนจะสูงถึง 1.2-1.3 พันล้านเหรียญสหรัฐ การลงทุนในโครงการใหม่คาดว่าจะสร้างมูลค่าเพิ่มให้บริษัทได้ในอนาคต อย่างไรก็ดีเรายังไม่สามารถประเมินมูลค่าเพิ่มดังกล่าวได้ในปัจจุบัน เนื่องจากยังมีข้อมูลไม่เพียงพอ ยังคงคำแนะนำ ถือ ราคาเป้าหมาย 41.50 บาท
SCC* ซื้อถ่านหินล่วงหน้า เพื่อป้องกันความเสี่ยงจากผลกระทบของต้นทุนถ่านหินที่อยู่ในช่วงขาขึ้น
