22 Dec 10 09:32
ผลการศึกษาล่าสุดของ IATA แนะนำทางเลือกที่เหมาะสมในระยะยาวคือ ให้ใช้สนามบินสุวรรณภูมิเป็นสนามบินเดี่ยว (Single Airport) โดยให้สนามบินดอนเมืองยกเลิกบริการเที่ยวบินแบบประจำทั้งหมด พร้อมพัฒนากิจกรรมเชิงพาณิชย์อื่นๆแทน และเร่งลงทุนเพิ่มเติมในท่าอากาศยานสุวรรณรภูมิเพื่อรองรับปริมาณผู้โดยสารที่คาดจะเพิ่มขึ้นเป็น 60-65 ล้านคนต่อปี ขณะเดียวกันสำหรับในระยะสั้น – กลาง แนะนำให้เปิดใช้สนามบินดอนเมืองรองรับเที่ยวบินเช่นในปัจจุบัน พร้อมลงทุนในสนามบินสุวรรณภูมิควบคู่กันไป อย่างไรก็ตามผู้บริหาร AOT* เผยขณะนี้ยังไม่ตัดสินใจว่าจะดำเนินการตามคำแนะนำของ IATA หรือไม่ ขณะเดียวกันอยู่ระหว่างรอผลการศึกษาของ UN’s International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) ในเดือน ก.พ.54 ทั้งนี้เรามีมุมมอง Neutral ต่อประเด็นข่าวดังกล่าวเนื่องจากในปัจจุบัน AOT ได้ใช้สนามบินสุวรรณภูมิเป็นหลักเช่นคำแนะนำของ IATA อยู่แล้ว

description.hltext_display: PTTAR* เตรียมสรุปแผนการลงทุน ในโครงการผลิตน้ำมันเครื่องบินสะอาด (Green Jet fuel) และการลงทุนขยายการผ
description.content:
ลิตแบบคอขวดของหน่วยอะโรเมติกส์ และโครงการผลิตเบนซีนต่อเนื่องขั้นปลายในช่วงกลางปีหน้า โครงการต่างๆดังกล่าวคาดว่าเงินลงทุนจะสูงถึง 1.2-1.3 พันล้านเหรียญสหรัฐ การลงทุนในโครงการใหม่คาดว่าจะสร้างมูลค่าเพิ่มให้บริษัทได้ในอนาคต อย่างไรก็ดีเรายังไม่สามารถประเมินมูลค่าเพิ่มดังกล่าวได้ในปัจจุบัน เนื่องจากยังมีข้อมูลไม่เพียงพอ ยังคงคำแนะนำ ถือ ราคาเป้าหมาย 41.50 บาท
SCC* ซื้อถ่านหินล่วงหน้า เพื่อป้องกันความเสี่ยงจากผลกระทบของต้นทุนถ่านหินที่อยู่ในช่วงขาขึ้น
22 Dec 10 09:33
SCC* ซื้อถ่านหินล่วงหน้า เพื่อป้องกันความเสี่ยงจากผลกระทบของต้นทุนถ่านหินที่อยู่ในช่วงขาขึ้น โดยต้นทุนถ่านหินของบริษัทที่คาดจะขยับขึ้นประมาณ 15-20% YoY เป็น US$80-85 ต่อตัน จะกระทบต่อความสามารถในการทำกำไรของบริษัท เนื่องจาก ถ่านหินคิดเป็นสัดส่วนประมาณ 50% ของต้นทุนรวม และใช้ในธุรกิจซีเมนต์และกระดาษเป็นหลัก อย่างไรก็ตาม เราประเมินว่าการเดินเครื่องเต็มกำลังใน 3 ธุรกิจหลักของ SCC จะช่วยลดผลกระทบจากต้นทุนที่อยู่ในช่วงขาขึ้นและทำให้ EBITDA Margin และกำไรสุทธิปี 2554 ยังอยู่ในระดับเหมาะสมที่ 15.1% 30,849 ล้านบาท ตามลำดับ ดังนั้น เราคงแนะนำ ซื้อ ราคาเหมาะสมปี 2554 ที่ 370 บาทต่อหุ้น
สมาคมพัฒนาผู้ประกอบการธุรกิจค้าปลีกทุนไทย ระบุธุรกิจค้าปลีกในไทยปีหน้าคาดว่าจะโต 2 หลัก
22 Dec 10 09:32
สมาคมพัฒนาผู้ประกอบการธุรกิจค้าปลีกทุนไทย ระบุธุรกิจค้าปลีกในไทยปีหน้าคาดว่าจะโต 2 หลัก โดยห้างสรรพสินค้าจะโตดีสุด หนุนโดยการฟื้นตัวทางเศรษฐกิจ การปรับขึ้นค่าแรงขั้นต่ำ และของข้าราชการและนักการเมือง นอกจากนี้การเลือกตั้งจะเป็นอีกปัจจัยหนุนกระแสเงินเข้ามาหมุนเวียนอยู่ในระบบ ทั้งนี้คาดว่า BIGC* และ ROBINS จะได้ประโยชน์จากกำลังซื้อที่ปรับดีขึ้น
ผลการศึกษาล่าสุดของ IATA แนะนำทางเลือกที่เหมาะสมในระยะยาวคือ ให้ใช้สนามบินสุวรรณภูมิเป็นสนามบินเดี่ย
22 Dec 10 09:32
ผลการศึกษาล่าสุดของ IATA แนะนำทางเลือกที่เหมาะสมในระยะยาวคือ ให้ใช้สนามบินสุวรรณภูมิเป็นสนามบินเดี่ยว (Single Airport) โดยให้สนามบินดอนเมืองยกเลิกบริการเที่ยวบินแบบประจำทั้งหมด พร้อมพัฒนากิจกรรมเชิงพาณิชย์อื่นๆแทน และเร่งลงทุนเพิ่มเติมในท่าอากาศยานสุวรรณรภูมิเพื่อรองรับปริมาณผู้โดยสารที่คาดจะเพิ่มขึ้นเป็น 60-65 ล้านคนต่อปี ขณะเดียวกันสำหรับในระยะสั้น – กลาง แนะนำให้เปิดใช้สนามบินดอนเมืองรองรับเที่ยวบินเช่นในปัจจุบัน พร้อมลงทุนในสนามบินสุวรรณภูมิควบคู่กันไป อย่างไรก็ตามผู้บริหาร AOT* เผยขณะนี้ยังไม่ตัดสินใจว่าจะดำเนินการตามคำแนะนำของ IATA หรือไม่ ขณะเดียวกันอยู่ระหว่างรอผลการศึกษาของ UN’s International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) ในเดือน ก.พ.54 ทั้งนี้เรามีมุมมอง Neutral ต่อประเด็นข่าวดังกล่าวเนื่องจากในปัจจุบัน AOT ได้ใช้สนามบินสุวรรณภูมิเป็นหลักเช่นคำแนะนำของ IATA อยู่แล้ว

description.hltext_display: 论智能电网安全建设重点
description.content:
http://www.cww.net.cn2010年12月21日 10:15 通信世界网
作 者：启明星辰 滕文静
随着智能电网建设的逐步展开，信息安全已成为智能电网安全稳定运行的重要基础，建设统一、合理、安全的信息化设施是智能电网的重要保障。本文介绍了两个信息安全建设重点，业务网络的合规审计和Web服务器防护。针对网络特点部署相应的安全审计和防护产品，对于电网防御能力的提升有着重要价值。
1 信息安全对智能电网的意义
统一坚强智能电网，其特点是统一和坚强。统一是一种管理模式，也是国家电网公司一直以来努力的方向。实现电网的统一管理，即各环节、各子网的互联互通，能大大降低管理成本和内部消耗；与此同时，也会带来潜在的风险，如果没有足够的安全措施，一旦某个网络出现问题，其他网络必然会受到影响；坚强包括2个方面：一个是具有全面的防御能力，另一个是完善的自我修复能力。统一是基础，坚强是保障。
智能电网是一种高度自动化的数字化电网，在开放系统和共享信息模式的基础上，可以通过宽带通信系统、自动控制系统以及分布式智能设备等，实现电网中各部门的协调和实时互动，以及实时市场化交易，以达到优化电网的管理和运营目的。作为物联网时代最重要的应用之一，智能电网将给人们的工作和生活方式带来极大的变革，但是智能电网的开放性和包容性也决定了它不可避免地存在信息安全隐患。针对智能电网的运营特点，其安全需求包括物理安全、网络安全、数据安全及备份恢复等多个方面。在此，主要讨论网络及数据安全。
2 智能电网的安全建设重点
智能电网的安全建设，首先需要提高的就是防御能力，即抗攻击能力。针对电网的攻击来源于两个方面：一方面是来自外部的网络攻击、病毒破坏、研究成果遭窃取、电力设施破坏或者篡改电网数据以获利等诸多危害；另一方面是源于内部：局域网用户利用工作之便，随意越权访问或者修改某些重要数据，访问非法网站、发布非法言论等违规上网行为将会严重威胁企业信息安全，也会给电网带来不可估量的损失。
针对主要威胁来源，须采取相应措施、维护信息安全。首先进行常规安全建设，例如：在电网各个子网和安全域分别部署入侵检测和漏洞扫描类产品，了解每台计算机的漏洞和面临的威胁。对于有高危漏洞的计算机，及时安装补丁和防病毒软件，进行系统加固。在网络边界或者内部枢纽地带，还需要部署常规的防病毒、防火墙、身份认证等产品。基础建设完毕后，需要对电网的核心业务区域进行重点防护。电网的核心业务区域，包括各个主要业务系统、数据库服务器以及对外提供服务的网站服务器等，是电网信息资源的集中地带，其安全性非常重要。在此，主要讨论业务网络的合规审计和Web服务器防护这两种方法。
2.1 业务网合规审计
外部人员的恶意访问可以通过在网络边界部署防火墙、UTM等产品进行防护，但是内部人员违规操作带来的风险同样巨大，尤其是针对数据库、文件服务器的非法数据获取或篡改，严重威胁企业信息安全，影响企业声誉。国家主管安全机构已充分认识到这个问题的严重性，出台相关政策加强对内部违规行为的审计。公安部等级保护要求，二级以上信息系统中的网络安全、主机安全、应用安全均要求进行安全审计。因此，需要针对网络特点采购相应的安全审计产品，审计主要集中在运维操作审计和数据库访问审计上。

description.hltext_display: 11月厦楼市量大跌价小涨 购房人本地占比再超六成
description.content:
11月厦门房价又涨了！厦门市国土房产局最新发布的房产信息显示，11月厦门住宅成交均价较10月上涨了289元，为10434元/平方米。全市住宅成交面积为22.46万平方米，较10月少了两万多平方米；全市住宅成交套数为2233套，比10月少了662套。总体来看，11月厦门楼市呈现量跌价升之势。
值得注意的是，延续10月的上升趋势，11月厦门本地购房人群比例再超外地并微有上调，显示限购令等政策调控效果正在逐步显现。
四区房价下跌 岛内均价骤降2千多
厦门市国土房产局发布的数据显示，虽说11月厦门全市房价较10月略有上涨，但在厦门六区中有四区出现下跌，其中岛内两区还出现了较大降幅。
11月岛内商品住宅均价为16003元/平方米，较10月下降2073元。其中，思明区11月成交均价为16596元/平方米，比起10月骤降了2281元之多。湖里区均价为15855元/平方米，也较10月下降了1818元。
岛外四区中，集美区均价7640元/平方米，较10月上涨了900元；翔安区7849元/平方米，小涨80元，与10月基本持平。此外，同安与海沧均价有所下降，同安均价6302元/平方米，较之10月每平方米少了159元，而海沧降幅较大，均价7822元/平方米，较之10月少了755元。
而从今年来的房价走势看，岛内房价今年来虽然起伏较大，但总体呈“一浪高过一浪”之势。特别是今年10月，曾经创下18076元/平方米的高峰，也是目前最高的均价。
而岛外房价今年来走势则相对平稳，自2月最低价7032元/平方米后一路上涨，至5月达到最高点，为9121元/平方米；此后几个月销售价格趋势线几乎成了“直线”，均未上8000元/平方米。11月岛外均价为7387元/平方米，较10月每平方米上涨了195元。
调控渐显威力 本地购房人数持续上升
值得注意的是，延续10月的上升趋势，11月厦门本地购房人群比例为66%，而厦门以外地区购房人群比例为34%。11月厦门本地购房人群比例不但再超外地，而且较10月微有上调，显示限购令等政策调控效果正在逐步显现。
数据显示，11月厦门全市共计成交商品住宅2233套，比10月少了662套。其中，厦门本地人群买走了1526套，面积为14.94万平方米；而厦门以外的人群成交总套数707套，面积为7.52万平方米。
11月厦门商品住宅岛内销量占比为35%，较10月多了8%。而已然成厦门楼市“销售主力军”的岛外在连续三个月持续上升后，在11月 “急刹车”，降至65%。
具体就各区成交量来看，11月厦门商品住宅六区销量比中，集美区以33%的比例再登榜首，较10月的28%多了5个百分点，这是集美区连续两次销量比第一，为岛外销量的主力军。销量比较10月上涨的还有湖里区和海沧区，湖里区占比由10月的18%上涨到11月的28%；海沧区11月的销量比为11%，上升了4%。
相较10月，厦门六区中下降的有三区，即思明区、同安区和翔安区。其中翔安区降幅最大，由10月份的21%将至6%，为11月销量比最低的区域；思明区与同安区销量比较10月基本持平，分别为7%和15%，降幅为2%和1%。

description.hltext_display: 현대건설 인수하려는 현대차그룹, ..
description.content:
[뉴스엔 김종효 기자]
현대그룹의 현대건설 인수가 무산되면서 인수 주도권을 갖게된 현대차그룹(이하 현대차)에 대해 월스트리트저널(이하 WSJ)이 인수 반대 의사를 표시했다.
현대건설 채권단은 12월 22일 외환은행에서 열리는 실무자회의에서 현대차의 지위 등을 논의한다.
사실상 이날 회의를 통해 현대차에 우선협상대상자 지위가 결정될 것으로 보인다. 채권단 내에 협상을 자꾸 늦춰서는 안된다는 공감대가 형성돼있기 때문이다.
앞서 채권단은 현대차가 현대건설을 인수하면 현대건설이 보유한 현대상선 지분(8.30%)을 시장이나 연기금 등 제3자에 분산 매각시켜 현대그룹의 현대상선 경영권이 위협받지 않도록 하는 중재안을 내놨었다.
현대그룹은 채권단의 중재안을 전혀 받아들이지 않겠다는 입장이지만 채권단은 주주협의회 일정을 강행하겠다는 방침이다. 채권단은 현대그룹이 이에 반발해 소송을 제기하면 이행보증금도 돌려주지 않을 계획이다.채권단 관계자는 "이행보증금은 현대그룹이 양해각서(MOU) 위반으로 모두 몰수해야 맞다"면서도 "하지만 사태의 원만한 해결을 위해 전액 혹은 일부를 돌려줄 가능성을 열어뒀다"고 밝혔다.하지만 현대차에 유리하게만 흘러가는 분위기는 아니다.
WSJ는 현대차가 현대건설을 인수하려하는 이유를 "단지 옛 현대그룹 제국에 대한 향수"라고 말하며 "시너지가 거의 없는 전략이다"고 폄하했다.또 "현대차그룹은 주주들에 왜 또 거대 건설사를 인수하려는지를 설명해야 한다"고 비난했다. 이미 현대엠코 등 대형 건설사가 있음에도 현대건설을 인수해 어떤 이익을 얻는지를 설명하라는 얘기다.WSJ는 이어 "여유자금이 있다면 주주들이나 자동차 연구와 개발, 사업 확장에 쓰라"며 "현대건설 인수전에서 손을 떼는게 정몽구 회장의 회사 및 주주들에 더 이익일 것"이라고 의견을 냈다.마지막으로 "현대건설 인수는 정몽구 회장의 가문에 있어서는 이익일지라도 기업에 있어서는 잘못된 선택"이라고 쐐기를 박았다.김종효 phenomdark@newsen.com
기사제보 및 보도자료 newsen@newsen.comcopyrigh

description.hltext_display: 歐洲大雪 港接回滯英學生(中央商情網)
description.content: （中央社記者王曼娜香港2010年12月22日電）受歐洲大風雪影響，香港多個來往歐洲的班機被迫取消或延誤，不少港人滯留當地。國泰航空公司今天安排4個班機，優先接回滯留英國的400名香港學生。香港機場管理局表示，由於歐洲大風雪，香港今天有3班來往英國倫敦班機被取消，另有4班來往英國及德國的班機延誤。國泰航空表示，倫敦機場受到暴風雪影響，運輸量大減，從18日至今，共有15班國泰班機被迫取消，目前約2800名乘客滯留倫敦機場，但因部份乘客已取消或更改行程，還要進一步確認實際滯留人數。另外，在香港政府協調下，國泰今天安排4個班機從倫敦返港，優先接回滯留倫敦機場的400多名香港學生，他們大多數是在英國讀書的中學生，首批返港的是年紀較小、沒有人同行的13至16歲學童。

description.hltext_display: Campaign spending down overall in ’10 LD 26 race
description.content:
Per-candidate spending on the rise
Published:
December-22-2010 12:11am
Candidates for the Arizona Legislature in District 26 spent a combined total of nearly $400,000 in the 2010 campaign.
Records filed with the Arizona Secretary of State’s office show that candidates spent an average of $79,868 on their campaigns, more than $9,000 more per candidate than in the 2008 race.
Overall spending in 2010, however, was less than in 2008, when more than $560,000 was spent. In 2008, eight candidates were vying for the three legislative posts. This time, there were five hopefuls.
Spending by independent groups also was down in comparison to 2008. The groups, with no official ties to individual candidates, have been criticized in the past as exerting unfair influence over the outcome of elections.
Independent groups spent a total of $168,592 in District 26 this election cycle, as compared with $358,711in 2008.

description.hltext_display: Washington thumps New Jersey
description.content:
Michal Neuvirth was strong with 35 saves and five different Washington players scored a goal, as the Capitals defeated the New Jersey Devils, 5-1, at Verizon Center.
Andrew Gordon and John Carlson both notched a goal and an assist for the Capitals, who are showing signs of life with two straight wins after an eight- game winless skid during which the club went 0-6-2. Jay Beagle, Jason Chimera and Mike Knuble also scored in the victory.
Patrik Elias scored the only goal for the struggling Devils, who have lost three straight and fell to 1-8-0 in December.
New Jersey goaltender Marty Brodeur allowed five goals on 28 shots.
"We seem to be making the same mistakes over and over again, and we are losing the same way," said Devils captain Jamie Langenbrunner. "For whatever reason, things are not clicking -- we're looking for an easier way to win hockey games, and there is no such thing in this league."
The only goal of the opening period was scored by Gordon, whose one-timer redirection from the right post flew into the cage following a pass from the base of the left half-wall by Marcus Johansson at the 16:41 mark.
Elias' power-play tally, his seventh goal of the season, knotted the contest 4:56 into the middle stanza. Langenbrunner held control in the slot and, facing away from the net, slid a soft pass to the top of the right circle for Elias, whose one-timer lit the lamp.
From there, it was all Washington.
After Beagle gave the Caps a 2-1 lead at the midpoint of regulation, Washington moved ahead by two at the 12:39 mark of the second stanza. Chimera was sent in on a partial breakaway after a nice feed from Gordon and, with Devils blueliner Mark Fayne draped on his back, lifted a wrister over the shoulder of Brodeur for his fifth goal of 2010-11.
"It was one of those nights where it was nice to get some breathing room and not be forced to fight tooth-and-nail to the end," said Chimera.
With 3:29 to play before the second intermission, the Caps made it 4-1 on Carlson's one-timer. Alex Ovechkin attempted a slap shot from the right side of the slot, but the puck was tipped away by a defenseman before Carlson moved in and beat Brodeur with a blast from atop the near circle.
With nearly eight minutes to go in the third period, Knuble capped the scoring with a deflection goal -- Tom Poti's shot from the right side was redirected home by Knuble from the top of the crease.
Game Notes
Since a victory at Chicago on November 3, the Devils have dropped nine straight road games...It was Ovechkin's 27th assist of the season...The Capitals halted a five-game home winless skid...Washington improved to 5-2-1 against the Atlantic Division...New Jersey ended 1-for-4 on the power play, while the Caps went scoreless on their five chances with the extra skater.
©2010 Sports Network. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.

description.hltext_display: 資産買入基金の総額は20日時点で約25兆円＝日銀
Overcoming BCS past is OU's hope
description.author: JOHN E. HOOVER
description.content: NORMAN - It was the end of the 2007 season, after a mugging by West Virginia in the Fiesta Bowl, that Oklahoma coach Bob Stoops looked inside his own coaching, inside his Oklahoma program, and didn't like what he saw. "Very disappointing," he called the Sooners' 48-28 loss to the Mountaineers. "Embarrassing. Absolutely no discipline whatsoever. That has to be a reflection on me. I'm obviously not doing a very good job of getting players to understand how to play smart. ...We really need to look at what we need to do differently. Obviously, I need to do things differently as a head coach." Three seasons later, the Sooners are still riding that BCS bowl losing streak, now up to five in a row. This time, No. 9 OU (11-2) is a 17-point favorite to beat No. 25 Connecticut (8-4). That's the largest point spread in the 13-year history of BCS bowls. But Stoops and his Sooners have been in this position before. Heading into the 2006 Fiesta Bowl, Boise State was everybody's Little Darling, just 10 years removed from membership in the NCAA's Division I-AA, a cutesy little Wild West program that had finally worked its way onto the big stage. Now it's UConn that's been in Division I-A for only a decade, an inspirational underdog, a feel-good rise to power for a school better known for its women's basketball program. So, other than sleeping in a new hotel (the Scottsdale Plaza instead of the Fairmont Scottsdale Princess Resort) and practicing at a new field (Scottsdale Community College instead of Pinnacle High School), what is Oklahoma doing differently this time around? "There's only so much you can do," Stoops said on Tuesday. "You have to practice at a certain time. You have a function to go to; you can't tell the bowl you're not going to it. You do what you can, but in the end, you have to play better. You get opportunities to make plays and you better make them, and you can't turn over the ball. That's the bottom line." OU's five-game BCS game losing streak includes the 2003-04 Sugar Bowl, a 21-14 national championship loss to LSU in New Orleans; the 2004-05 Orange Bowl, a 55-19 loss to USC in Miami; and the 2008-09 BCS National Championship Game, a 24-14 loss to Florida in Miami. "Three of them were national title games," Stoops said, "so you lose to the best team in the country." Then there's the little matter of the Fiesta Bowl, where twice OU was a significant favorite - 8 points against Boise State, 7 1/2 against West Virginia - and both times sleepwalked through the first half. OU trailed the Broncos 28-10 midway through the third quarter, and trailed the Mountaineers 20-6 at halftime. One popular theory is that because those games weren't for the national championship, players weren't inspired to play and coaches weren't inspired to coach. The idea is that Stoops always puts so much emphasis on winning the Big 12 Conference, and when that goal is achieved but the team falls short of the national title game, the bowl game doesn't really resonate with anyone. Oklahoma this year is back in the same scenario - Big 12 champs, but out of the national title game a long time ago - but this time with that BCS cloud overhead. Is that motivation enough? "Since I've been here, we've been to three and haven't won any of 'em," said defensive back Quinton Carter. "This is a huge game on a huge stage, and I think we need to prepare better and go out there with a winning attitude." Of course, players in 2007 said the same thing. Three straight BCS losses, uninspired performance in the Fiesta Bowl, things needed to be better, and on and on. Quarterback Sam Bradford said pre-bowl practices had "definitely been more intense" leading into the West Virginia game, and running back Allen Patrick said things were "more up-tempo" because Stoops was "tired of hearing it just as much as we are." Carter, a senior, is one of just six current Sooners with Fiesta Bowl experience. Carter and Jeremy Beal are the only two players left who played against Boise State. "We've been down there twice and we got out butts whooped," Carter said. "It's a huge stage and we need to come to play." Fiesta Bowl Oklahoma vs. Connecticut 7:30 p.m. Jan. 1, 2011 ? Glendale, Ariz. TV: ESPN-25 ? Radio: KMOD fm97.5, KTBZ am1430 For more Bosses, community keep Stoops. B3 John E. Hoover 581-8384 john.hoover@tulsaworld.com

description.hltext_display: 兩岸醫衛協議文本 呈交陸委會(中央商情網)
description.content: （中央社記者馮昭台北2010年12月22日電）海峽交流基金會董事長江丙坤今天下午3時率第6次江陳會海基會協商代表團向陸委會報告，並將海峽兩岸醫藥衛生合作協議文本呈交陸委會，由行政院大陸委員會主任委員賴幸媛代表接受。在海基會協商代表團報告前，賴幸媛致詞表示，兩岸醫藥衛生協議是兩岸15項協議中，條文最多、非常具體可行的協議，充分達到政府設定的3目標：維護國人健康安全、保障消費者權益、兼顧產業發展。賴幸媛表示，這次來不及簽署的兩岸投資保障協議是因為協商代表團認為需要更充足的時間討論，以爭取最有利的結果，這表示在兩岸協商中，政府堅持「以台灣為主、對人民有利」的承諾，不會為簽署而簽署。賴幸媛表示，在兩岸協商過程中，政府不僅可主導議題，也可循序漸進促進台灣經濟發展，一步一步落實保障民眾權益的目標。協商團隊用實際行動「顧主權、顧安全、顧生存、顧產業」的成果，在各民調獲得高度支持。賴幸媛表示，第7次江陳會重點推動議題包括投保協議，還有海峽兩岸經濟合作架構協議(ECFA)後續協商，有具體進展就會納入海基、海協兩會會談並簽署協議。

description.hltext_display: `엠팡`에 가면 `10만원대`에 제주..
description.content:
엠팡은 제주도 2박3일 패키지 여행권을 10만원대에 내놨다.
22일 소셜쇼핑몰 엠팡(mpang.mk.co.kr)은 46만원이던 제주 패키지여행 이용권을 57% 할인해 19만9,000원에 판매한다.
엠팡 사이트에서 예약 가능한 랜딩티켓을 2만9,000원에 구입할 수 있으며, 패키지여행 예약일자가 확정되면 나머지 금액 17만원을 여행사에 직접 결제하면 된다. 패키지가 아닌 에어텔도 선택 가능하다.
이 상품에는 왕복항공권, 특급호텔2박, 조식과 중식 제공, 차량료, 관광지 입장료, 여행자보험료가 포함됐다.
항공사는 제주항공, 이스타항공, 티웨이항공, 진에어, 호텔은 제주 네이버후드 호텔, 오리엔탈호텔 밀 동급호텔 중 스케줄에 따라 변경된다.
예약 가능기간은 23일부터 내년 3월 31일까지며, 쿠폰은 1인당 1장씩 사용 가능하다.
[매경닷컴 김윤경 기자]
[ⓒ 매일경제 & mk.co.kr, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: Obsesi Mendapat Apartemen Idaman
description.content:
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Judul : Dream Home
Sutradara : Pang Ho-cheung
Pemain : Josie Ho, Eason Chan
Genre : Horor
Produksi : 852 Films
Cheng Lai-sheung (Josie Ho) adalah karyawan yang bekerja sebagai petugas layanan pelanggan sebuah bank di Hong Kong, yang menawarkan produk pinjaman kredit lewat telepon kepada nasabah. Ia sangat mengidamidamkan apartemen mewah di Victoria Harbor dengan pemandangan menghadap laut. Apartemen itu membuatnya terobsesi. Bahkan ia rela bekerja sambilan sebagai penjaga butik serta menolak ajakan rekan kantornya untuk berlibur demi menabung mengumpulkan uang.
Harga properti di Hong Kong termasuk salah satu yang paling tinggi dan hampir mustahil diraih oleh seseorang dengan penghasilan pas-pasan seperti Cheng. Apalagi di tengah pasar saham yang tak stabil, hal itu sangat berimbas pada fluktuasi harga properti. Pemilik bisa saja tiba-tiba menaikkan harga. Obsesi memiliki apartemen itu membuat Cheng gelap mata. Ia bahkan sanggup membunuh agar niatnya tercapai.
Sindiran Halus Josie Ho, aktris utama film ini, yang juga bertindak sebagai produser, menggaet sineas kenamaan Mandarin, Pang Ho-cheung, sebagai sutradara. Pang Ho juga menulis skenario dari film yang berjudul asli Wai dor lei ah yut ho ini. Pang Ho sangat menyukai film-film bergenre slasher dan sexploitation kelas B Hollywood. Oleh karena itu, banyak bertebaran adegan dewasa dan gore yang sangat ekstrem.
Teramat sadis, kejam, serta membuat jijik dan ngilu. Yang lebih parah, ekspresi Josie yang terlihat tanpa emosi, kaku, lebih terkesan kikuk. Seperti dalam adegan membungkus kepala wanita yang hamil dengan plastik lalu menyedot udara yang tersisa dengan pembersih debu atau menembak polisi yang sekarat. Di balik visualisasi sadis mengerikan itu, film ini juga memuat sindiran serta kisah nyata tentang permasalahan harga properti.
Seperti imbas krisis ekonomi Amerika Serikat pada 2008 lalu yang dipicu oleh kasus gagal bayar angsuran kredit perumahan (subprime mortgage). Ada sedikit kejanggalan lucu atau bloopers yang dapat diketahui penonton yang mengerti bahasa Melayu atau Indonesia. Pada satu adegan, muncul figuran pembantu rumah tangga yang jelas terdengar berbahasa Indonesia cukup fasih. Sayang, ia menjadi korban Cheng.
Saat menyaksikan end credit title, jelas terpampang nama figuran itu ialah Dewi Ariyanti, nama yang sangat Indonesia, namun tertulis perannya ialah sebagai pembantu asal Filipina. Sekilas, film ini mengingatkan pada genre slasher Asia seperti film Hong Kong lainnya, Invitation Only, yang diperankan Maria Ozawa, Ichi The Killer dari Jepang, atau dari Rumah Dara/Macabre dari Indonesia karya Mo Brothers.
Bagi Anda yang belum sempat atau ketinggalan menyaksikan Dream Home ini saat menjadi surprise movie pada gelaran Indonesian International Fantastic Film Festival (INAFF) 2010 November kemarin, film ini akan diputar kembali di bioskop-bioskop Blitz Megaplex.
ryb/

description.hltext_display: Swiss Franc (CHF) Technical Major Currencies (2010-12-22)
description.content:
Rate this Story
0
0
Print
Email
Share
Order Reprints
Text Size
Morning Report
The ongoing negative pressure on the pair yesterday has pushed the pair towards 0.9560, which are forming support for the sideway range show above. Meanwhile, The solid retest level for breached support that has currently turned into resistance at 0.9725 - attempting to move to the upside twice, alongside SMA 50 which is forming resistance for intraday trading as well as the minor descending channel that controls present trading. All these factors play a role in pushing the pair to the downside, but in return the positivity of momentum indicators and signs of a bullish technical pattern's neckline have met the initial retest level; therefore, these factors play a role in causing doubt around whether the bearish direction will continue or not. We recommend keeping an eye on upcoming trading, specifically for critical levels between 0.9560 and 0.9655 that hold the keys to insure the following pair's direction.

description.hltext_display: Nya tågproblem i dag
description.content:
TT inrikes i dag 08:57 | Uppdaterad i dag 09:02
Efter en mycket kall natt i hela landet är ett nytt område med snö på väg in över norra Götaland och Hälsingland. Kraftiga förseningar väntas i tågtrafiken i dag också. Flygtrafiken till och från London ska fungera som normalt . (TT)
Foto: Scanpix
Efter en mycket kall natt i hela landet, med -36 grader i Idre, är ett nytt område med snö på väg in över norra Götaland och Hälsingland. Kraftiga förseningar väntas i tågtrafiken i dag också. Flygtrafiken till och från London ska fungera som normalt i dag.
SMHI har utfärdat en klass 1-varning för att omkring en decimeter snö kan komma fram i Hälsingland under morgonen och förmiddagen.
Trafikverket har satt in extra resurser för att gårdagens snöproblem ska undvikas även i dag. Trots det väntas kraftiga förseningar även i dag. På grund av växelfel kommer tågen på sträckorna Halmstad-Göteborg och Halmstad-Malmö, det vill säga Västkustbanan, att drabbas av kraftiga förseningar.
Även på sträckan Charlottenberg-Laxå är det problem med tågväxlar vilket orsakar störningar.
Ett 20-tal tåg i Mälardalen kommer att ersättas av buss och en del passagerare har blivit ombokade till andra avgångar.
Flygtrafiken till och från London ska återupptas i nära nog normal omfattning i dag.
Situationen i London är fortfarande kaosartad, SAS har närmare 6 000 svenskar strandade där.
För att få hem så många som möjligt planerar SAS att byta till större flygplan.
SAS har kallat in extra personal för att svara på frågor och sköta ombokningar för alla de som drabbats, men väntetiderna har varit mycket långa.
När det gäller Paris, Amsterdam och Frankfurt är man i stort sett i kapp med strandade passagerare eftersom trafiken har kunnat upprätthållas, om än med förseningar och inställda flyg.
Snöröjningen på Londonflygplatsen Heathrow har fått mycket hård kritik.

description.hltext_display: Tågproblem i Västsverige
description.author: TT Tidningarnas Telegrambyr
description.content:
Efter en mycket kall natt i hela landet, med -36 grader i Idre, är ett nytt område med snö på väg in över norra Götaland och Hälsingland. Kraftiga förseningar väntas i tågtrafiken i dag också. Flygtrafiken till och från London ska fungera som normalt i dag.
SMHI har utfärdat en klass 1-varning för att omkring en decimeter snö kan komma fram i Hälsingland under morgonen och förmiddagen.
Trafikverket har satt in extra resurser för att gårdagens snöproblem ska undvikas i dag. Trots det väntas kraftiga förseningar i Västsverige. På grund av växelfel kommer tågen på sträckorna Halmstad-Göteborg och Halmstad-Malmö, det vill säga Västkustbanan, att drabbas av kraftiga förseningar.
Även på sträckan Charlottenberg-Laxå är det problem med tågväxlar vilket orsakar störningar.
Ett 20-tal tåg i Mälardalen kommer att ersättas av buss och en del passagerare har blivit ombokade till andra avgångar.
Flygtrafiken till och från London ska återupptas i nära nog normal omfattning i dag.
Situationen i London är fortfarande kaosartad, SAS har närmare 6 000 svenskar strandade där.
För att få hem så många som möjligt planerar SAS att byta till större flygplan.
SAS har kallat in extra personal för att svara på frågor och sköta ombokningar för alla de som drabbats, men väntetiderna har varit mycket långa.
Snöröjningen på Londonflygplatsen Heathrow har fått mycket hård kritik.

description.hltext_display: Dos jóvenes detenidos por el hurto de teléfonos móviles y otros objetos
description.content:
Zaragoza, 22 dic (EFE).- Dos jóvenes de 26 y 23 años han sido detenidos en Zaragoza como supuestos autores del hurto de teléfonos móviles y otros objetos.
C. C. S., de 26 años, y edad, y N. D. D., de 23 años, fueron detenidos a las 18.40 horas de ayer en la Avenida de San José y fueron puestos a disposición judicial acusados del hurto de un teléfono móvil.
A los dos jóvenes les fueron intervenidos otros cuatro teléfonos móviles, un reloj y otros objetos que llevaban ocultos. EFE

description.hltext_display: DIW erwartet im 4. Quartal 0,7 Prozent BIP-Wachstum
description.content:
Berlin (BoerseGo.de) - Im vierten Quartal 2010 soll den Erwartungen des DIW Berlin zufolge das deutsche Bruttoinlandsprodukte um 0,7 Prozent steigen. Das Wachstum liege damit erneut deutlich über dem Durchschnitt der letzten Jahre, teilte das Wirtschaftsforschungsinstitut am Mittwoch mit.
Im Oktober habe die Industrie mit 3,2 Prozent merklich zugelegt. Überproportional gewachsen sei insbesondere die Produktion von Investitionsgütern. Die hohen Auftragseingänge der letzten Monate deuteten auf eine weiterhin zunehmende Nachfrage hin, so der Bericht weiter.
"Dieser schwungvolle Verlauf der Konjunktur sollte jedoch nicht zu Euphorie verführen", warnte DIW-Konjunkturexperte Vladimir Kuzin. Deutliche Anzeichen einer leichten Abschwächung seien bei den Bestellungseingängen bereits erkennbar.
Bemerkenswert seien die gestiegenen Auftragseingänge bei den Konsumgüterproduzenten, schreibt das DIW weiter in seiner Pressemitteilung. Im September und Oktober wurden Zuwächse von jeweils 0,8 und 2,4 Prozent verzeichnet. Allerdings stamme der Großteil der Neubestellungen aus dem Ausland und komme damit vor allem der Exportwirtschaft zugute.
"Hoffnungen auf einen schnellen Übergang zum binnenorientierten Wachstum wären deswegen übertrieben", interpretierte DIW-Konjunkturexperte Ferdinand Fichtner die Daten. "Trotz der günstigen Entwicklung des privaten Verbrauchs bleiben die Exporte weiterhin ein wichtiger Treiber der deutschen Wirtschaft", so Fichtner weiter.

description.hltext_display: Wenger afviser Bendtner-tilbud
description.content:
Italienerne ville låne danskeren indtil sommer, hvor de derefter havde en købsoption på 9 millioner pund, eller hvad der svarer til 79 millioner kroner.
Men Nicklas Bendtner, der fornylig luftede sin utilfredshed med at sidde på bænken, skal ingen steder. Manager Arsene Wenger har nemlig afvist tilbudet. Det skriver den engelske avis The Sun.
Arsene Wenger har bebuddet, at han ikke vil hente forstærkninger i vinterens transfervindue, og at han derfor vil have sin trup intakt, og ikke sælge ud og dermed ødelægge holdets bredde.
Noget tyder derfor på, at den 22-årige angriber må indstille sig på, at han minimum vil være Arsenal-spiller indtil næste sommer.

description.hltext_display: 推FTA 經濟部：美澳紐優先(中央商情網)
description.content: （中央社記者曾依璇台北2010年12月22日電）台灣積極與其他國家洽簽自由貿易協定（FTA）。經濟部次長梁國新今天說，經綜合考量，優先推動與美國、澳洲、紐西蘭、日本、東南亞國家及歐盟洽簽FTA或經合協議。梁國新於立法院外交及國防委員會報告時說，決定洽簽FTA或經濟合作協議時，要考量雙邊貿易關係密切，有利台商拓展對外市場；是台灣重要投資夥伴，透過強化投資帶動貿易發展；有利確保台灣取得產業發展所需資源的貿易夥伴，還要有利台灣對外經貿關係整體布局。因此，梁國新表示，綜合考量後，經濟部目前優先推動的目標對象包括美國、澳洲、紐西蘭、日本、東南亞國家及歐盟。列席報告的外交部次長沈呂巡表示，依據世界貿易組織（WTO）統計，目前共有207個自由貿易協定生效實施，亞太地區就多達82個，可見東亞區域經貿合作蓬勃。但因洽簽FTA耗時，中國國民黨籍立法委員周守訓建議，台灣加入「跨太平洋戰略經濟夥伴協定」（TPP）比簽署FTA容易，要加入TPP，可從美國著手，因為美國也不希望台灣被邊緣化；另外，新加坡及紐西蘭對台灣友善，也有意願與台灣加強合作，也是嘗試管道之一。

description.hltext_display: SKT, 3D 뮤지컬 제작
description.content:
SK텔레콤은 22일 프랑스 파리에서 록 뮤지컬 모짜르트, 락 오페라를 입체(3D) 영화로 만들어 내년 상반기에 국내를 비롯해 프랑스, 스위스, 벨기에 등지에서 상영한다고 밝혔다. 이 작품은 지난해 9월에 프랑스에서 초연 이후 100만 관객을 동원한 흥행작이다.
3D 영화 제작은 한국, 프랑스, 미국 등의 11개 전문업체가 투입돼 이뤄진다. 해외 판매는 판권을 보유한 SK텔레콤이 담당한다. SK텔레콤 관계자는 “직접 가지 않으면 볼 수 없는 해외 공연을 물리적 거리를 뛰어넘어 각국에서 볼 수 있도록 3D 영화를 만들기로 했다”며 “고가의 뮤지컬을 저가로 감상할 수 있을 것”이라고 말했다.
최연진기자 wolfpack@hk.co.kr
[ⓒ 인터넷한국일보(www.hankooki.com), 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: Un pequeño terremoto sacude el noroeste de Inglaterra
description.content:
Londres, 22 dic (EFE).- Un terremoto de 3,6 grados de magnitud en la escala abierta de Richter sacudió anoche Cumbria, en el noroeste de Inglaterra, si bien no ha causado víctimas, informó hoy el Servicio Geológico Británico (BGS, siglas en inglés).
El seísmo fue sentido por la población poco después de las 23.00 horas GMT en varios condados vecinos, como Yorkshire, Northumberland y el suroeste de Escocia, según la Policía, que ha precisado que el terremoto tampoco parece haber causado daños materiales.
El sismólogo David Galloway, del BGS, dijo a la BBC que en el país se registran algunos terremotos y "tal vez tenemos uno de esta magnitud cada 12 o 18 meses, pero es poco probable que cause daños".
Según los expertos, en la zona de Cumbria, fronteriza con Escocia, ha habido unos seis terremotos en los últimos cuarenta años, de los que dos han alcanzado una magnitud de 3,7 grados -uno de ellos en 1988 y otro en 2009. EFE

description.hltext_display: Little to like in 'Little Fockers'
description.content:
Home» Arts/Entertainment » Movies »
Robert De Niro, left, and Ben Stiller reprise their roles as bickering in-laws Jack Byrnes and Greg Focker in ‘Little Fockers.’
( UNIVERSAL PICTURES )
Zoom | Photo Reprints
FORT WORTH STAR-TELEGRAM
You know a comedy franchise has hit rock bottom when, within the first 15 minutes of a movie, you've been forced to watch an obese man receiving an enema and a 2-year-old boy projectile vomiting into the face of his dad.
So it goes with Little Fockers, the third and (let's all cross our fingers here) presumably last installment in the series about the put-upon nurse Greg Focker (Ben Stiller) and his ex-CIA agent father-in-law Jack Byrnes (Robert De Niro).
Greg and his wife, Pam (Teri Polo), are now happily, if busily married in Chicago, with their twins' third birthday fast approaching. But our hero faces temptation in the form of Andi Garcia (Jessica Alba), a knockout pharmaceutical sales rep who wants Greg to become a spokesperson for a new male sexual enhancement drug called Sustengo.(And yes, they beat that joke about how she shares a name with the actor Andy Garcia far into the ground).
Jack, meanwhile, is facing mortality: He's recently suffered a heart attack, which -- for reasons that make about as much as sense as everything else in this slapdash effort -- only Greg knows. The assorted plot points converge in one of those "I-can't-believe-I'm-actually-watching-this" moments, when Jack has a negative reaction to Sustengo, requiring Greg to inject his aroused private parts with a shot of adrenaline.
As much as De Niro probably earned to endure Little Fockers, he should have asked for another $5 million for this scene alone.
The plot of Little Fockers, of course, is really just an excuse to assemble a bunch of familiar faces and allow them to schtick it up. At least on that score, Little Fockers obliges. Barbra Streisand, as Greg's sex therapist mother, and Dustin Hoffman, as his "menopausal" father, endearingly hover around the edges, and Owen Wilson -- who's long been the best part of this series -- once again returns as Pam's ex-boyfriend Kevin, a Zen-preaching investment banker who's forever in the throes of a spiritual crisis.
LITTLE FOCKERS
Directed by Paul Weitz. Written by John Hamburg and Larry Stuckey. A Universal Pictures release, opening today at Rave Franklin Park, Fallen Timbers, and Levis Commons. Rated PG-13 for crude humor, strong language, and sexual content.
Running time: 98 minutes.
Critic's rating: *
Jack Byrnes................... Robert DeNiro
Greg Focker......................... Ben Stiller
New to the mix -- though large chunks of their performances seem to have been left on the cutting room floor -- are Laura Dern, playing the headmistress at a tony preschool where Greg and Pam want to enroll the twins, and Harvey Keitel, as Greg's do-nothing contractor.
Yet there's absolutely nothing at stake here: We know Greg would never cheat on Pam, and we know Jack's suspicions eventually will be allayed and father-in-law and son-in-law once again will come to an uneasy truce. Clearly in a state of desperation, director Paul Weitz and screenwriters John Hamburg and Larry Stuckey pile on the puerile sight gags and struggle to come up with new ways to humiliate a bunch of performers who have been humiliated plenty in Meet the Parents and Meet the Fockers.
By the time Greg and Jack have a bloody fistfight in a children's playground ball pit, Little Fockers is no longer running on fumes -- it's empty.
Permanent Link http://www.toledoblade.com/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=/20101222/ART09/12210345/-1/RSS05 STORY:201012210345

description.hltext_display: Quick stops 23 shots, Kings blank Avalanche 5-0
description.content:
DENVER — Jonathan Quick stopped 23 shots for his third shutout of the season, Dustin Brown had two goals and two assists, and the Los Angeles Kings beat Colorado 5-0 on Tuesday night to end the Avalanche’s six-game win streak.
Rob Scuderi had a goal and an assist, Brad Richardson scored a goal, and Anze Kopitar and Drew Doughty had two assists apiece for the Kings.
Craig Anderson had 27 saves for Colorado, which was shut out for the first time this season. The last time the Avalanche were blanked was a 3-0 loss at Los Angeles on Feb. 13 — a span of 55 games.
The Kings took a 1-0 lead in the first period on Scuderi’s first goal of the season. Anderson saved Scuderi’s initial shot from the point, but the puck ricocheted to the right circle where Scuderi picked it up and slid a backhander past Anderson with 7:34 left.
It stayed that way until early in the second period. Doughty took a shot from the top of the right circle that Richardson deflected past Anderson with the blade of his stick to make it 2-0 with 13:29 remaining.
It was Richardson’s fifth goal, and fourth against Colorado.
Both goalies made big saves. Quick stopped Matt Duchene on a chance midway through the second, and Anderson made key stops late in the period. The last came on Kopitar’s shot from the left with a minute remaining in the period.
Duchene nearly spoiled the shutout midway through the third but his wrist shot from the left circle rattled off the post, and Quick covered up the rebound.
Brown iced the game with two goals in the third period, his 12th and 13th. Justin Williams scored a power-play goal with 2:11 left, his 12th goal of the season.
NOTE:
St. Louis is the only team that has not been shut out this season. ... Brown has 22 points in 20 games. ... The Avalanche had scored at least three goals in their previous eight games.

description.hltext_display: Longtime OV clerk retiring after 30-year run with town
description.content:
Randy Metcalf/the Explorer, Oro Valley Town Clerk Kathi Cuvelier plans to retire in January after 30 years with the town. When hired in 1980, she was the town’s 10th employee.
Kathi Cuvilier
Published:
December-22-2010 12:11am
On a cool January morning in 1980, 27-year old Kathryn Armstrong reported to work in a converted home on Calle Concordia that served as Oro Valley’s town hall.
It was a big step for the divorced single mother who had worked mostly secretarial jobs to that point.
This job, a deputy town clerk for an emerging municipality, required a level of trust and responsibility she had never experienced — attending public meetings, taking minutes to be kept in perpetuity, and understanding the legalities of official government business.
Kathi had little idea then that she had embarked on a journey that would last 30 years, and along the way install her as a department-level manager with the town.
Along the way she also remarried, adopting the name that most people know her by today: Kathi Cuvelier.
After 30 years on the job with the town, 27 as the town clerk, Cuvelier plans to retire in January.
“I was the 10th employee, so we were able to get health insurance,” Cuvelier said.
Cuvelier grew up in the Northwest, graduating from Canyon Del Oro High School in 1971. The school had a secretarial program where she studied typing and learned the now-lost art of shorthand.
Since joining the town, Cuvilier has seen breakneck growth following incorporation in 1974, going from a tiny hamlet of a few thousand people to a full-fledged town of more than 40,000 people.
Along the way, Cuvelier also has acquired a verifiable expertise in local government and elections law.
“I became an expert in recall law not because I wanted to,” Cuvelier said.
The role was forced upon her, because between 1993 and 2000, the town had numerous recall elections. Cuvelier described the era as Oro Valley’s “dark days.”
Municipal clerks in the state preside over the logistics of local elections, and Cuvelier’s peers among the Arizona Municipal Clerks Association have come to rely upon her know-how.
“She’s the epitome of what we look to when we say we’re a helping community,” said Darcie McCracken, president of the clerks’ association and deputy clerk for the City of Glendale. “She’s very well-respected in the clerks’ community.”
It wasn’t always like that, Cuvelier admits. In fact, at the first public meeting that she had to work alone, she was terrified.
The event was a planning and zoning hearing on a proposed rezoning. A divide had emerged in the young town about whether to allow smaller residential lot sizes, effectively opening the door for the town to change from its rural founding.
“I had never been at a contentious meeting where people were mad or angry,” Cuvelier said. “I was just a wreck.”
When the meeting ended, her boss reviewed her notes and assured Cuvelier that she had done a fine job. That boss, it turns out, would come to play a larger role in Cuvelier’s life than either could have imagined.
Many people know Patricia Noland as the elected clerk of the Pima County Superior Court and a former state legislator. In 1978, she was Oro Valley’s town clerk, town manager and building official, and did just about any other job the small community needed.
Noland offered Cuvelier the job as deputy clerk in 1980. The decision still amazes Cuvelier.
“I had no idea what a municipality was or what a town council did,” Cuvelier said.
That didn’t matter to Noland.
“I liked her demeanor,” Noland said.
That Cuvelier became an expert in her field doesn’t surprise Noland. But she’s a little shocked that Cuvelier has stayed with the town all these years.
“She’s hung in there,” Noland said. “That’s just the type of person she is.”
Another relationship Cuvelier has hung in there on is her nearly 26-year marriage to Keith. Noland introduced them to one another.
“That’s two life-changing things,” Noland joked.
Cuvelier’s long tenure with the town has come to represent something more to her colleagues than a standard work relationship.
“She was the one who always made it feel like a family atmosphere,” said Oro Valley Deputy Chief of Police Larry Stevens. Stevens, who has worked for the town nearly as long as Cuvelier has, said she also has always been the one constant at the town.
“It’s going to be strange, because whenever I couldn’t find some information about the town, Kathi always could,” Stevens said. “I don’t know who that person will be now.”
Throughout her time with Oro Valley, Cuvelier has worked for 42 town council members and seven mayors.
Former Mayor Paul Loomis served on the council for 12 years.
“She’s always been a bright personality out there, her attitude has always been fabulous,” Loomis said. “She was a great face for the town.”
Loomis said he came to rely heavily upon Cuvelier’s expertise during his time as mayor. He said the clerk’s job is one of the most important jobs at any town.
“She was a pleasure to work with,” Loomis said.
Cuvelier said she intends to stay active in retirement. She’s planned a few trips for next year, and wants to volunteer her time at a local hospice.
Her final day with town is scheduled to be Jan. 3, 2011.
Julie Bower named next town clerk
Oro Valley has hired a new town clerk.
Julie Bower begins her duties Jan. 3, according to a release. She succeeds longtime Town Clerk Kathi Cuvelier, who is retiring after a 30-year tenure with Oro Valley.
An Iowa native, Bower moved to Tucson in 2008. She has been working as the deputy court administrator for the Tucson City Court. Prior to that, she worked in the court system in Lone Tree, Colo., followed by deputy city clerk position and then the city clerk for the City of Littleton, Colo., from 1994 to 2008.
“I’m looking forward to returning to the clerk’s office,” Bower said. “I enjoy working with city councils, and I’ve been very impressed with what I’ve seen in Oro Valley.”
“Julie is bringing strong, broad experience from other organizations in Clerk duties coupled with years of management in human resources and information technology that support a clerk’s role which will be extremely valuable,” said Jerene Watson, town manager. “Her reputation as a highly-regarded employee in both her former communities in Colorado and in Tucson is a strong indicator of what her contribution will be to our team and this town.”
Bower is a designated certified municipal clerk, and has been awarded a master municipal clerk status by the International Institute of Municipal Clerks. Bower expects to complete her bachelor’s degree in public administration in the next few years.
She and her husband, Kevin, reside in Tucson; they have two grown daughters and a granddaughter.

description.hltext_display: 中菲貿易前10月成長逾4成(中央商情網)
description.content: （中央社記者林行健馬尼拉2010年12月22日專電）在中國與東南亞國家協會（ASEAN）自由貿易協定（FTA）上路之後，中國與菲律賓的經貿關係更加密切。今年前10個月，雙邊貿易總額達到227億美元，成長40.2%。中國駐菲國大使劉建超今天在記者會上說，中國與東協FTA於1月正式啟動，雙邊將近有9成的7000項貨物享受零關稅待遇，同時服務業貿易協定與投資協定也陸續跟進。根據中國大使館的資料，今年前10個月，中國對菲出口總額是94億美元，成長40%；中國自菲進口總額為133億美元，成長40.4%，菲國享有貿易順差。中國現為菲國的第3大貿易夥伴。在投資方面，今年前9個月中國對菲國投資為7300萬美元，較去年同期成長316%，成長幅度居東協地區第2高。菲國對中國投資達6300萬美元，成長177%。

description.hltext_display: VW, GM, Toyota & Co: Was die Autobranche in diesem Jahr bewegte
description.content:
Die deutschen Autobauer machen die Krise vergessen. BMW, Daimler, Volkswagen und die Konzerntochter Audi präsentieren sich in diesem Jahr in alter Stärke. Dem US-Konzern General Motors gelingt die Rückkehr an die Börse, in Europa tut sich GM aber schwer. Der weltgrößte Autobauer hat hingegen gewaltige Probleme. Was die Branche 2010 bewegte.
« Zurück
1
...
BMW, Audi und Daimler wieder auf Erfolgskurs
Die deutsche Autoindustrie kann ihr Glück gar nicht fassen. Nur ein Jahr nach der Krise überschlagen sich vor allem die Premiumanbieter Daimler, BMW und Audi mit Erfolgsmeldungen. Zwischen Juli und September fährt BMW das höchste Quartalsergebnis der Firmengeschichte ein.
